description: Located in the Sloan's Lake neighborhood of Denver, CO, High Ride incorporates cardio, weights, and resistance to provide a full body workout. A combination of music, lighting, and energy help to create a positive and rewarding experience for each rider. You will do some side to sides, tap backs, 4 corners, and push-ups - It’s a party on a bike! The experienced and motivated instructors will guide you through an energizing 45 minute workout whether you’re an expert or a beginner. All classes are held in High Ride’s cycle room that is dark with blacklights for a club like feel. Get your sweat on with High Ride Cycle!

featured_reviews.class_name: The High Ride - 1711 Sheridan Blvd, Denver CO 80214
featured_reviews.review: Great energy in the class and amazing teacher who cares and you can tell loves her job! It was a nice paced class where 75% of people could keep up which i think is awesome (vs instructors who go so fast that 30% are keeping up ;). Lots of rap and class went quick!

class.name: The High Ride - 1711 Sheridan Blvd, Denver CO 80214

The High Ride - 1711 Sheridan Blvd, Denver CO 80214
The High Ride - 1711 Sheridan Blvd, Denver CO 80214

classes.description:
Class will be held at our new location: 1711 Sheridan Boulevard, Denver, CO 80214
Get ready for a dance party on a bike! In our High Ride classes, we ride to the beat of the music. Instructors incorporate tap backs, push-ups, figure eights, and side to sides to provide a full body workout. All classes also incorporate weights for an upper body workout. Come get your sweat on!
classes.name: The High Ride - 1711 Sheridan Blvd, Denver CO 80214

description:
ABOUT 
Get ready to sweat! Get ready for intensity. Never do the same workout twice. Featured in SHAPE, Women’s Health, 5280, ABC and FOX News, Pearl Street Fitness makes good on its promise to offer intense full body workouts that will always keep you guessing, make you laugh with one another while you sweat, and leave you wanting more. The classes perfectly blend proven methods of HIIT conditioning and strength training.

HOW IT WORKS
You'll get a butt-kicking workout, small class size, personalized attention and modifications. Focus: Upper M/Th, Lower T/F, Full W/We.

WHAT YOU WILL GAIN
Come for the workout, stay for the experience. Pearl Street Fitness workouts create change within your bodies, develop amazing mental strength, and the grit that it takes to make a pearl.

featured_reviews.review: Had been a minute since I’ve been here on my rotation of workouts...however, I left dripping sweat, inspired, and every muscle shook (even on leg day). Good combo of cardio and weights! Cory is super fun too and is attentive so people don’t hurt themselves doing squats wrong ;)

classes.description:
Wash Park location! 1107 S Pearl St.
Pearl Street Fitness makes good on its promise to offer intense full body workouts that will always keep you guessing, make you laugh with one another while you sweat, and leave you wanting more. The class perfectly blends proven methods of high intensity HIIT conditioning, strength training, and cardio to rev your metabolism, target fat loss and tone lean muscle. You'll love the butt-kicking workout, small class size, personalized attention and modifications, and back to basics no-nonsense approach. Get ready for the Pearl Street Fitness difference. 
Note: Expect a full body workout with a more defined attention and focus on upper body conditioning Mon/Thur, lower body conditioning Tues/Fri and a full body blast Wed/Sat/Sun.

This class will keep your mind and body guessing so you never plateau. We recommend taking this class 2-3 times per week
classes.name: PSF Conditioning

description: TransFORM Colorado is one of Denver's official providers of the LaGree Fitness Method. Lagree is a Pilates style that leaves you with toned and elongated muscles, lower body fat composition and improved endurance. They offer the best equipment available, a premier training staff and a state of the art sound system to get you in the zone.

featured_reviews.review: Brutal! Great low/no? impact cardio conditioning. Works the hell outta ya and its done in a flash. Jillian is a delight. Just wish they had some air circulation/fans...can start to feel a little claustrophobic (they pull blackout shades down and have lights that pulse to the music...not sure why this is part of the experience).

classes.activities: Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Pilates, Strength Training
classes.description: The Lagree Fitness Method will compliment every facet of your life. The method delivers substantial results, FAST: expect 45 minutes of high energy and intensity, mega calorie-burning and serious muscle shaking. This no impact method incorporates strength, balance, flexibility, and resistance and cardio training in every single exercise performed. The end result is toned and elongated muscles, lower body fat composition and improved endurance.
classes.name: LaGree

classes.description: This class is meant to make you SWEAT, and burn an INSANE amount of calories in a short period of time. This class is 30 minutes, performed on a versa climber. You will need training shoes (sneakers that you would wear to the gym) and a towel (if you sweat a lot), and water bottle. Expect loud music, a dark room with a light installation that reacts to the beat of the music, and a very high intensity, interval based class.
classes.name: Climbing

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class. 

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: Do you want to go to a class with Denver’s happiest, funniest, most fun instructor ever?! Then here is your class! Laura has the most amazing energy in town and it’s contagious; you cannot possibly leave in a bad mood or not revitalized! Super hard, sweaty, and down right fantastic way to start your weekend!

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with them, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. With high-performance custom bikes, amphitheater seating, enhanced lighting, concert-quality sound and two massive high-def flat screens, they set the scene for an immersive, exhilarating experience. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts and class rank. 

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: First Cycle Bar class, it was very cool and a killer workout, I wish I had of updated my profile before the class because they track your performance and do different challenges such as men vs women, my profile defaulted to being female (I’m not)

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description: Your fitness journey begins here. Compass Fitness provides an exceptional community and energy driven fitness experience. Lead by a crew of reputable Denver trainers, the gym offers personal and group training including:  HIIT, boxing and kickboxing, strength training, and athletic conditioning—all housed under one roof.

featured_reviews.review: This particular class was a good one. Getting back to basics with traditional barbell work. Heavy lifts to hit all the key groups. Really like that the core goal of this class is strength. Good compliment to the HIIT classes.

classes.description: Full-body, strength based, functional movements, with a hint of cardio. Just to keep things spicy. Your body and mind will be challenged in unique ways each and every time you experience this class. Full Direction = Full Body Focus.
classes.name: Compass -> Full Direction

classes.description: Because hitting and kicking other people is frowned upon. Hit some heavy bags instead. This full body workout will push your capacity in the areas of strength, endurance, and conditioning! Gloves and wraps are provided, or you are more than welcome to bring your own.
classes.name: KNOCKOUT

description:
WHAT IS BARRE3 
barre3 classes follow a thoughtful sequence for body-shaping results and long-term postural benefits. Your barre3 workout optimizes every moment with moves that adapt to your body for maximum results. 
WHO IT'S DESIGNED FOR 
barre3 is for everyone. They don’t believe in a one-size-fits-all approach to exercise. Instead, they empower each individual to modify postures and develop body awareness for lasting results. 
HOW IT WILL BENEFIT YOU
The barre3 signature approach to teaching gives clients a rewarding endorphin high and a deep muscle burn—without pain in areas of the body prone to injury.
AMENITIES
Showers, lockers and cubbies. Showers are stocked with natural products and towel service is provided. The in-studio boutique offers high-end, fair-trade apparel.

featured_reviews.review: Different then the usual barre class - a lot more aerobics then static movements. Not totally my favorite but was still a great class, hard work out, and really felt it later. Instructor was theatrical but very nice and encouraging, will totally take another class w her !

classes.description: Barre3 is a 60-minute workout that mixes athleticism, grace, and the latest innovations designed to balance the body. Inspired by ballet barre, yoga and Pilates, their instructors guide you through a specific sequence of movements that tone and lengthen all major muscle groups, rev your heart rate and strengthen your body.
classes.name: barre3

classes.description: Barre3 45 is a full-body mindful workout that delivers remarkable results from the inside out. In 45 minutes, you’ll be guided through sustained holds, muscle-burning micro-movements, and heart-pumping cardio bursts. The barre3 signature approach will leave you feeling balanced in body and empowered from within.
classes.name: barre3 45

description: FITC is a commented focused fitness experience based on real-time needs. Our team use a wide variety of equipment, movement patterns, and formats to generate a new experience with each class. Come join us for some serious sweat and overall good time that will leave you feeling BETTER than when you first walked in.

featured_reviews.review: Paige was energetic and provided a ridiculous great sweat to add to your day! Amazing tunes as well :) she is there to help and provide guidance if need be and there to push you too if you need encouraging. Add this to your workout routine 100% :)

classes.description: This class is designed to increase cardiovascular and core endurance within an energetic and upbeat atmosphere.
classes.name: Meta Circuit

description:
The River Yoga, located in the heart of Denver, is more than a beautiful space. We are a community, a place to grow, a place to be, a hOMe. Our schedule is designed for every body, mind and spirt. Class styles include power vinyasa yoga, taught in hot, warm and non-heated rooms, yin yoga, Yoga Basics and candlelight yoga flow. Additionally, we offer class formats that are completely unique to The River, including YogaCross (30 mins HITT + 30 min yoga), Align & Burn: Yoga Bootcamp, Inversions Conditioning and Deep Stretch & Meditation. We look forward to seeing you on the mat soon.

** Second location coming soon to FIVE POINTS at 2560 Welton St., Denver, CO 80205 **

featured_reviews.review: LOVE Samy. So kind and a great instructor. This class was so welcoming and personal. So relaxing. Only FYI is I wouldnt call it yoga basics- its definitely a restorative class. I hope to make myself go back as I know its so good for stress!

class.name: Power Vinyasa, Hot with Micro Meditation

classes.description: Challenging. Playful. Empowering. A challenging and up-leveled physical practice for the yogi who wants to push beyond their comfort zone. Expect to stretch your body and mind in this vinyasa practice with posture variations, binds, arm balances and inversions. Learn to go with the flow, push your edge and evolve your practice. Some yoga experience recommended.Heat: None added.
classes.name: Advanced Power Vinyasa

classes.activities: Relaxation, Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Meditation, Yoga
classes.description: Invigorating. Empowering. Transformative. An invigorating flow class that will strengthen your body, focus your mind and empower your spirit. Instructors are encouraged to bring their unique teaching style, music and personality to this to this class. You will never practice the same sequence twice! Learn to go with the flow, find your edge and practice at your own level. All levels.Heat: 94 degrees Micro Meditation Enhance your asana practice by adding an optional 5-15 minute “micro meditation” after class. This meditation is self-guided, but timed by the instructor and can consist of mindful stillness, quiet reflection and/or extended savasana. You are encouraged to stay for the full 15 minutes, but may take as much or as little of this sweet space as needed. Commit to completing your practice with a few extra minutes of meditation and see what you discover along the way. No prior meditation experience is necessary. No additional cost to attend. Heat remains as set for class beforehand.
classes.name: Power Vinyasa, Hot with Micro Meditation

class.name: Power Vinyasa, Hot with Micro Meditation

classes.activities: Relaxation, Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Meditation, Yoga
classes.description: Grounding. Meditative. Nurturing. This soothing class includes long holds, supported postures and intentional stretches. All movements are aimed at releasing tension, preventing injury and promoting active recovery. Class will include approximately 15 minutes of seated or supine meditation with some guidance from the instructor. Experience meditation in motion as you nurture your body, mind and spirit. All levels.Heat: None added
classes.name: Deep Stretch & Meditation

classes.description: Invigorating. Empowering. Transformative. An invigorating flow class that will strengthen your body, focus your mind and empower your spirit. Instructors are encouraged to bring their unique teaching style, music and personality to this to this class. You will never practice the same sequence twice! Learn to go with the flow, find your edge and practice at your own level. All levels.Heat: 94 degrees

classes.description: Calming. Fluid. Restorative. Set to softer music and the glow of candles, Candlelight vinyasa blends a traditional vinyasa practice with an indulgent and restorative wind down to ease every muscle and quiet your mind. Expect to move your body with a gentler flow to begin and complete your practice with an extended cool down, complete with deep prop-assisted stretches and floorwork. The perfect nightcap for your body and spirit at the end of a long day! All levels.Heat: 84 degrees
classes.name: Candlelight Vinyasa, Warm

description:
A combination of cardio, strength training, and Pilates - our classes will strengthen, lengthen, and tone your body like no other workout!
40 minutes of heart pumping, muscle quivering, body strengthening moves on the Proformer set to fun, motivating music to keep you working hard! Pilates Evolution is a NEW EVOLUTION of Pilates that includes effective intensity, cardio and endurance training, which are key elements in improving your body composition. ****Classes are challenging.  Private sessions are recommended for beginners and anyone with an injury.***PLEASE arrive 5 minutes early to class if you are new to our studio. It is important for your safety that you are introduced to the equipment before class starts.  If you are late you will be denied entry to class. Safety First! :)

featured_reviews.review: Super challenging workout. Very core intensive but my legs were very sore after too! Highly recommend that youve done a pilates reformer class once or twice before you attend just so you know the machine. But if not you could still make it through the class!

classes.description:
A combination of cardio, strength training, and Pilates - our classes will strengthen, lengthen, and tone your body like no other workout!
40 minutes of heart pumping, muscle quivering, body strengthening moves on the Proformer set to fun, motivating music to keep you working hard! Pilates Evolution is a NEW EVOLUTION of Pilates that includes effective intensity, cardio and endurance training, which are key elements in improving your body composition. Perfect for men and women of all age groups, Pilates Evolution is the key to your year round beach body. 
IMPORTANT!
****Classes are challenging.  Private sessions are recommended for beginners and anyone with an injury.
***PLEASE arrive 5 minutes early to class if you are new to our studio. It is important for your safety that you are introduced to the equipment before class begins. If you are late, we reserve the right to deny your entry into class.
classes.name: Pilates Evolution Cherry Creek

description:
We are a rebel tribe. Our REBEL Workout team is comprised of students and teachers, all looking to re-envision health and movement. Challenging and form focused, our workouts complement your lifestyle. Effectively taking everything into consideration, we learn how to craft a workout specifically for your body. Sweating under one roof, our hearts pound in sync.

Our effective small group training methods combine a variety of functional training and HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) techniques. A diverse workout stimulates the body, without letting you plateau. Working in a personalized group training environment, we employ high intensity interval training, functional strength movements, and dynamic power workouts along with cycle, barre and yoga.

classes.description: This 50 minute classes challenges every major muscle group in the body, REBEL pushes limits, testing your strength, will, and mental toughness. An ever-changing combination of movements, exercises and equipment, REBEL delivers a mind-blowing strength and cardio session. Kettle bells - check. TRX straps - check. Battle ropes - check. Did we mention weight sleds? Heart pumping and sweat streaming, Rebel will put hair on everyone’s chest. So bring it, beat it, and brag about it!
classes.name: REBEL

classes.description: Maximize calorie burn, build core strength and increase stamina in MOTOR(CYCLE). A mash-up of cycling, strength training and conditioning drills, where no two workouts are ever the same. Get ready to mix it up with weights, resistance bands, kettle bells, TRX straps and a whole lot more. After class, shake it off in our “whimpering room.”
classes.name: MOTOR (CYCLE)

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Cycling, Barre
classes.description: Build endurance, strength, and long lean muscles. Dynamic cardio sequences get your heart pumping on the bike and at the barre, targeting the seat, legs, abs, and arms, for sculpted and elongated muscles and a trim and toned physique. There’s never a dull moment as you hit maximum calorie burn - zoning out is not an option.
classes.name: BIKE & BARRE

description:
Mecha's RESISTANCE classes follow the Lagree Method to build deep core strength, long and lean muscles, balance and flexibility, improved concentration, and a body that is less prone to injury.

Our CARDIO+ classes utilize VersaClimbers, Schwinn Airdyne Bikes, SkiErgs, and more. Everything we do is low-impact and friendly to your joints and connective tissue.

Please arrive at least 5 minutes before the class starts. If it's your first time at Mecha, you must arrive at least 10 minutes early. Late entry to class is not allowed.

featured_reviews.review: One of the toughest and most rewarding classes I've taken on here and ever. Mia knew what she was talking about and made sure to not only give great safety/form cues but also motivated us to push harder. Will definitely be back

classes.description: Our RESISTANCE classes use the Megaformer machine to build deep core strength, long and lean muscles, balance and flexibility, improved concentration, and a body that is less prone to injury. In 50 minutes, every muscle will be worked and every move will push you to your limits.
classes.name: RESISTANCE

classes.description: AMPED classes provide a fast-paced, high energy, and high-intensity 30-minute workout on a variety of low-impact cardio machines. Some floor work will be included in most classes as well. AMPED classes are perfect for those who want quick CARDIO+ workout or a warmup for a RESISTANCE class.
classes.name: AMPED

classes.description: The CARDIO+ PUMPED CIRCUIT will work your body from head to toe. You will move through various low-impact cardio and strength based HIIT stations working your entire body. This fast-paced circuit will make you hustle for that muscle. (45 minutes)
classes.name: PUMPED CIRCUIT

description: With 6 different types of Barre classes, a variety of props, ever-changing routines and customized playlists and lighting, The Barre Code's classes are a truly unique fitness experience.

featured_reviews.review: Favorite instructor at barre code. She is so good and also makes you feel great w what you’re accomplishing! I wouldn’t say barre code is for beginners it’s pretty fast pace w advanced moves but can catch on! Love this place !

classes.description: Strengthen your muscles as you shake and burn with dynamic full-range movements and targeted isometrics in our cornerstone class. Socks are required for this class.
classes.name: Barre Code

classes.description: HIIT is back & better than ever; full of variety, challenging props, and endless opportunities to push. Different variations of cardio intervals paired with functional strength training will test your mind & body to the limits!
classes.name: HIIT

description: Endorphin is a community that embraces a lifestyle of challenging movement to continually improve mental and physical health with a wide variety of classes.

featured_reviews.review: Brandon executes a killer spin class. Amazing EDM music that you ride along the beat to! Its also nice because you hold sprints and jumps longer to really feel each muscle burn. A must if you like spin, cardio, or a fun workout!

classes.description: Great for all levels, this is a non-stop, high-intensity strength and conditioning workout that combines multiple exercises targeting and taxing every muscle group. The class can take multiple formats; however, the underlying strategy is the same -- you’re going to be working your butt in short intervals with limited breaks. The bell rings, and you’re moving to the next station or exercise. Get in shape, whether you’re brand new to fitness or you’re a regular gym rat.
classes.name: HIIT

classes.description: Fun, hard-hitting, innovative, indoor cycling like nowhere else in the world! Get full-body sculpting, work your core, and take your performance to the max. Our Ryders & EastBridge studios feature the Real Ryder bikes, our LoHi studio features Stages bikes, and our Broadway Next Door studio features the Schwinn Carbon Blue bike. SPD clips shoes or sneakers both work on all bikes. All levels welcome.
classes.name: Functional Indoor Cycling

classes.description: This gentle practice uses props to support practitioners in resting poses for several minutes at a time, allowing for deep stretching without introducing strain to the body. It's a great complement to an active lifestyle, and it is also a very calming practice that allows practitioners to reset psychologically and let go of mental stress. Appropriate for beginners and all levels.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

description:
Please show up at least 10 minutes prior to class. Most CorePower Yoga studios will close the doors at the start of class because the instructors who check users in must teach, so you may risk getting locked out.

Ready to sweat? CorePower Yoga’s unique and physically challenging styles of yoga combine heat, music, movement, breath and community to create a one-of-a-kind workout.

featured_reviews.review: Love Ashleys classes because she includes a variety of poses, including lots of balancing which is so good for us. The only thing to be careful of is when the room is so hot you can almost over stretch the hip flexors. Today its a bit hard to flex the left hip.

classes.description: Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your practice like never before.
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2: Low Heat

classes.description: Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your practice like never before.
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2

classes.description:
Unroll your yoga mat for an invigorating full-body flow where you’ll explore the yoga postures and fundamental principles of Vinyasa yoga. Our C1 class is set to inspiring tunes, and is a foundation-building yoga class that will work every muscle through movement and breath at a moderate, but intuitive pace.

What to Bring:  For C1, C1.5, C2 & C3 classes, bring a bottle of water, a towel and a yoga mat. Wear fitted workout clothes, ideally ones that wick away moisture.

*While no heat is added during C1 classes, the practice room can reach temperatures up to 85 degrees due to earlier yoga classes.

Unheated*
No Added Humidity
Beginner Friendly
classes.name: C1 - CorePower Yoga 1

classes.description:
When muscle meets yoga, Yoga Sculpt is born. Boost metabolism and build lean muscle mass as you move to upbeat tracks. You’ll combine free weights with CorePower Yoga 2 sequencing and cardio to intensify each yoga pose while mixing in strength-training moves like squats, lunges and bicep curls. See it in Action (https://vimeo.com/139247672).

What to Bring: A bottle of water, a towel and a yoga mat. Weights will be provided.

*Humidity may be added in dry climate regions

92-95 Degrees
No Added Humidity*
Yoga Experience a Plus
classes.name: YS - Yoga Sculpt

classes.description:
A true blend of balance, core strengthening and flexibility, Hot Power Fusion combines the meditative, detoxifying qualities of hot yoga with the intensity of power yoga to help you deepen your yoga practice. Set to motivating music, you’ll focus on yoga postures that open the shoulders, hips and spine while strengthening your core and upper body.

What to Bring: A bottle of water, a towel and a yoga mat. Wear fitted workout clothes, ideally ones that wick away moisture.

100-103 Degrees
Added Humidity
Beginner Friendly

This class is practiced in candlelight.
classes.name: HPF - Hot Power Fusion: Candlelight

description: Meet your best with Barre Forte LoHi's imaginative, kick-ass barre, sculpt and HIIT fitness classes for athletes of all levels. First Class is $10 for new clients and they offer a New Client Special: One Month of Unlimited classes for $90 when purchased after your first class. From a fun and elegant atmosphere to their deeply committed instructors, it is their mission to ensure that new and seasoned clients feel like they belong, both in and outside of class. While they strive to create a comfortable environment, their workouts are designed to take you outside of your comfort zone and transform your body. Barre Forte’s modern, open LoHi studio offers a wide variety of group workouts seven days a week. Located at the base of the Highland Bridge next to Colt and Gray.

featured_reviews.review: One of the best barre classes I’ve been to. Melissa is very in-tuned w the emotional aspects of working out and challenging yourself further in class. I wouldn’t recommend for beginners. She will be doing the work out w you the whole time - rip af - so you definitely feel the drive to keep going. Great class !!

classes.description: The perfect option to get a that barre burn in fast and effectively - Get ready for our studio's signature barre class - condensed to just 40 minutes to better fit your schedule!
classes.name: Barre Express

classes.description: Their signature barre workout is designed to trim, tighten and tone your entire body with an emphasis on defining your glutes and legs. By using small, controlled movements, isometric holds and high repetition, you can develop a strong and lean physique in record time.
classes.name: Barre Forte

description:
Fierce45® is Denver's Premiere High Intensity Pilates Studio that combines high-intensity, low impact and mindful movement for one of the most efficient workouts! At Fierce45, they have perfected the art of high-intensity-resistance-training to bring you the best full-body workout ever. Utilizing only one-of-a-kind resistance machines and body weight exercises, each session provides the most effective cardio, strength, and balance exercises possible. With heart-pumping music that matches your sky-high heart rate and your #FierceFam sweating next to you, your body and mind will drop into a meditation in no time. 

Fierce45 is not just a workout, it’s a movement!

featured_reviews.review: It was my first time here, and Jordan is an amazing instructor. She took extra time to explain the moves, adjusted and gave cues for adjustments, and made me laugh. My legs were still shaking after class, and I will definitely return for more! The required socks for purchase cost nearly 11 dollars, which I found a bit ridiculous for socks with no toes.

classes.description: Ready to sweat? This 45-minute full body workout will push your muscles to fatigue with low-impact and high-intensity movements. Using slow, continuous, constant motions, this class will work your mind and body in the best way.
classes.name: Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates

description: The River Yoga, now has two studios located in the heart of Denver. The River is more than a beautiful space. They are a community, a place to grow, a place to be, a hOMe. Their schedule is designed for every body, mind and spirt. Class styles include power vinyasa yoga, taught in hot, warm and non-heated rooms, yin yoga, Yoga Basics and candlelight yoga flow. Additionally, they offer class formats that are completely unique to The River, including YogaCross (30 mins HITT + 30 min yoga), Align & Burn: Yoga Bootcamp, Inversions Conditioning and Deep Stretch & Meditation. They look forward to seeing you on the mat soon.

featured_reviews.review: The class was fantastic! It was my first time going to this studio, and as a Deaf person, I depend on visual cues and teacher demonstrating. Although the teacher didn’t demonstrate, the studio was small enough for me to see others as my cue and I appreciated how the teacher modified me although we never properly introduced one another. Thank you, Katy!

classes.description: Join us to celebrate the sun by practicing yoga on the pool deck of The Lydian. Meet in The River (Five Points) lobby 15 minutes to class start time and we will head up together. Invigorating. Empowering. Transformative. Sunny! An invigorating flow class that will strengthen your body, focus your mind and empower your spirit. Instructors are encouraged to bring their unique teaching style, music and personality to this to this class. You will never practice the same sequence twice! Learn to go with the flow, find your edge and practice at your own level. All levels.
classes.name: Vinyasa on the Rooftop Patio

classes.description: Invigorating. Empowering. Transformative. An invigorating flow class that will strengthen your body, focus your mind and empower your spirit. Instructors are encouraged to bring their unique teaching style, music and personality to this to this class. You will never practice the same sequence twice! Learn to go with the flow, find your edge and practice at your own level.All levels.Heat: 94 degrees
classes.name: Power Vinyasa, Hot

classes.description: Playful. Empowering. Strengthening. This high powered class is designed to physically and mentally prepare you for yoga inversions and arm balances. Instructors offer modifications and variations of inversion entry and encourage students to playfully push their edge. By combining yoga postures, strength conditioning and repetition, this class is bound to build confidence, strengthen your core and have you upside down! Class size is LIMITED. Please pre-register to save your mat space. Some yoga experience recommended.Heat: No additional heat
classes.name: Inversions Conditioning

classes.description: Structured. Strengthening. Accessible. Turn up the heat with this highly structured class to increase focus, stability, joint health, muscle strength and flexibility. A set sequence of static/isometric poses will be used to help burn away stress and tension, while taking you out of your mind and into your body. No chaturungas here! This class focuses on a mix of standing and supine postures, making it more accessible for those with wrist, shoulder or back issues as well as anyone who struggles with quick transitions. All levels. Great for students with wrist, shoulder or back issues. Heat: 100 degrees

classes.description: Grounding. Meditative. Nurturing. This soothing class includes long holds, supported postures and intentional stretches. All movements are aimed at releasing tension, preventing injury and promoting active recovery. Class will include approximately 15 minutes of seated or supine meditation with some guidance from the instructor. Experience meditation in motion as you nurture your body, mind and spirit. All levels.Heat: None added *Love Your Brain friendly classes are taught by LYB certified teachers and are perfect for yogis have experienced TBIs. LYB six week series graduates can take this class for $5! Payment must be taken at studio at the time of class.
classes.name: Deep Stretch & Meditation *LYB Friendly

classes.description: Calming. Fluid. Restorative. Expect to move your body with a gentler flow to begin and complete your practice with an extended cool down, complete with deep prop-assisted stretches and floorwork. The perfect nightcap for your body and spirit at the end of a long day! All levels.Heat: 84 degrees

description:
Barre3 is a full-body, balanced workout combining strength conditioning, cardio and mindfulness that will leave you feeling balanced in body and empowered from within. The transformative power of our workout is more than just physical. Barre3 isn't just about the hour you spend strengthening and balancing your body; it's about the empowerment you carry with you the other 23 hours of the day.

Barre3 offers childcare in their Play Lounge during the times listed below for an additional fee ($5 drop-in per child):

M/W/F:  8:30am, 9:45am, 11:00am, 4:45pm
T/TH: 8:30am, 9:45am, 12:15pm, 4:45pm
Sat: 8:30am, 9:45am

Bring your kids to class with you! Reservations are required, call (303) 656-6702 to reserve.

featured_reviews.review: Love the facility clean, bright, organized, not cluttered. Always welcomed with a smile and clear instructions (which props will be needed). Laura was super friendly and gave clear instructions and helpful mods. Barre3 is always brightening, ahhhh.....

classes.description: Barre3 is a 60-minute workout that mixes athleticism, grace and the latest innovations designed to balance the body. Inspired by ballet barre, yoga and Pilates, our instructors guide you through a specific sequence of movements that tone and lengthen all major muscle groups, rev your heart rate and strengthen your body.

description: BIG Power Yoga practices an energetic, inspired, sweaty and fun Baptiste Power Vinyasa Yoga. BIG's mission is to empower as many people as possible to live their biggest lives possible.

featured_reviews.review: I’ve taken lots of classes at BIG, and this was hands down my fave. Nathan is originally out of BIG’s Texas location and was here as a guest teacher. He brought the community of yogis together in a way I haven’t experienced in a yoga class before. Great workout and community experience!

classes.description:
Our signature, full-spectrum yoga practice that will leave your whole body, mind and spirit feeling strong, revitalized, energized, and restored. We promise you will sweat, work hard, let go and leave connected to how powerful you are. 

Powerful Flow is heated to 95 degrees with 50% humidity. It is a vinyasa class with a balanced focus on alignment and flow. Class is designed to be challenging, engaging, and empowering for all levels of practitioner from beginner to advanced.

Is this your first visit to BIG? Plan to arrive 15-20 minutes early to register at the front desk and get yourself set up for success. We've got mats and towels for you to borrow for your first time, on the house!

description:

CorePower Yoga offers a truly unique yoga practice based on intuition rather than tradition. CorePower Yoga heals, detoxifies and exhilarates the body and mind with emphasis on movement, balance, and intention. CorePower Yoga has created a dynamic, challenging program that combines strength, sweat, and spirituality.

featured_reviews.review: Really liked the set up of this class and how it focuses on balance and some key yoga postures. Gives you a chance to really focus on the movements and grow in the practice

classes.description: Hot Power Fusion (HPF) blends powerful elements of CorePower Yoga’s Hot Yoga and Power Yoga classes. It encompasses the meditative and detoxifying qualities of Hot Yoga with the intensity of Power Yoga. Practiced in a heated, climate-controlled environment, this class focuses on opening the shoulders, hips and spine as well as strengthening core and upper body. Set to music, this class is energizing and fun and appeals to anyone who appreciates a healthy sweat.
classes.name: HPF - Hot Power Fusion

classes.description: Ready to sweat? CorePower Yoga 2 (C2) is a rigorous yoga class with demanding strength postures that will have you moving, breathing and sweating! True to its name, a C2 class focuses on building and engaging your core strength to support you in more advanced postures. Set to energizing music in a heated, climate-controlled room, CorePower Yoga 2 strengthens, balances, detoxifies and exhilarates the body and mind. "This class torches calories" - Shape Magazine
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2

classes.description: A total body workout, CorePower Yoga Sculpt classes are set to energizing music and designed to tone and sculpt every major muscle group. This class complements your regular yoga practice while boosting your metabolism and pushing your strength and flexibility to new heights. Free weights are added to the CorePower Yoga 2 (C2) sequence, creating resistance and intensifying each pose. Strength-training exercises such as squats, lunges, bicep and tricep curls are incorporated to build lean muscle mass. You will see visible results in your body. It is recommended that you take at least one CorePower level 1 or 2 (C1 or C2) class before a Yoga Sculpt class.
classes.name: YS - Yoga Sculpt

description: Samadhi Center for Yoga and Meditation offers balance of body, mind and soul in a nurturing, supportive and beautiful environment.

featured_reviews.review: I love Cheryls Forrest inspired classes. They are not generic vinyasa flow and it is so refreshing! Always leave feeling accomplished and find Im oddly sore the next day. She works all the tiny muscles and you dont realize how hard theyre working while youre doing it.

classes.description: Gentle vinyasa yoga is appropriate for students who enjoy and desire a slower paced yoga practice. These classes are designed to give detailed instruction and to be less physically challenging than other vinyasa classes. Gentle vinyasa yoga classes will allow the student to gain strength and flexibility at their own pace with safety and alignment as the main focus.
classes.name: Gentle Vinyasa Yoga

classes.description: Align and Flow classes marry clear alignment direction with strength building, flow and breath work to provide a well balanced class. These classes weave a philosophic and/or spiritual theme into the sequencing so all levels of yoga practice can be accessed. Expect to be challenged and opened in your body, mind and spirit.
classes.name: Align & Flow

classes.description: Prana Vinyasa Yoga movement meditation cultivates: Inner and outer strength and fluidity Skill and intuition Vital energy and relaxed being Activation and receptivity through balanced and creative fluid sequences (vinyasas) A catalyst for transforming old patterns and paradigms of the body, self, and the world to discover the potency and creativity within Prana Vinyasa classes are ritual sadhanas and breath-inspired journeys that offer a complete spectrum (ha-tha) of rhythms from meditative and rejuvenating to the challenging and empowering. The wave of a class is created through cycles of effective and creative sequences (vinyasas) linked together through the breath wave. Every class is well rounded: following the mandala of the body and asanas- to create whole body transformation of strength and fluidity, circulation, and centering. Drawing on a base of over 27 Namaskars, classes offer a means to explore the fullness of one’s self from solar to lunar while being centered in the flow of breath.
classes.name: All Levels Prana Vinyasa Yoga

classes.description: ALL LEVELS Welcome A quiet yet profound and highly therapeutic style of yoga that is available to all students at all levels. The power of Yin is in its long-held relaxed floor postures. This kind of stretch stimulates the deep, connective “Yin” tissues of the body, affecting not only the physical body, but also energetic aspects of the self. Yin yoga strengthens the flow of prana (life force) or chi, maintains the health of the meridian system of the body, and as an additional bonus contributes to the mindfulness necessary for a successful meditation practice. It is a logical balance to dynamic, muscular, “yang” forms of yoga and/ or strenuous exercise. It is excellent for students looking to advance deeper into their practice as individuals are challenged to sit in the pure presence of awareness.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

classes.description: Rejuvenate your natural rhythm & harmony, improve strength & flexibility, dissolve tension, and experience a deep sense of well-being that will support you.
classes.name: Candlelight Vinyasa

classes.description:
Join us each month to receive the renewing tidal wash of your own magnificence in our 
FULL MOON MEDITATION 
Included in Class Packages and Memberships
or just a $16 drop-in!
What ARE your deeper hopes and intentions? When you let go the ideas in your mind, what lays below the surface, in the depths, waiting for your acknowledgement so the fulfillment may be set in motion?
Kimberly Braun
Minister, M.A., Meditation Coach, Reiki Master, Catalyst, Activator, Guide
Kimberly has been devoted to meditation from the age of 5, with over ten of her years spent as a monastic nun. Her Masters in theology was completed in 2001 in Washington D.C., and is concentrated upon the adult spiritual journey. She is a retreat and workshop facilitator, meditation
classes.name: FULL MOON MEDITATION

description: FAB Method is a unique, fast-paced fitness program combining the best of contemporary Pilates with cardiovascular conditioning. Clients will lengthen, strengthen, define and reshape their muscles and body to fun pumping music. Their signature 50-minute class focuses on full-body conditioning. They also offer specialized classes, jumpboard classes and private training. Whether it’s your only workout or enhancing your current cardio, weight-training or sports passions, you will perform stronger and look leaner!

featured_reviews.review: This was my first ever Pilates class and it humbled me. I was the only person in class so I got 1:1 attention from the instructor and quivered and shook throughout the hour. The studio is beautiful and the equipment is clean.

classes.description: This class features an intermediate, challenging format that targets your FAB core, abs, arms, legs and buns.
classes.name: FAB Advanced

classes.description: This class offers an introduction to the FABFormer and method. Don't let the level fool you, this workout will challenge you!
classes.name: FAB Full Body

description:
FIT36® high intensity interval training (HIIT) is the next level in fitness – no traditional fitness plan can match the efficiency of this 36-minute workout.
 
FIT36® run their 36-minute circuits for two weeks at a time.  This quick muscle-memory plan allows your body to go from unable to able to expert on these movements in a two-week span, and once you’ve mastered them, the instructors shake up the circuit and start over again.  Movements include everything from kettlebells to TRX and beyond, and are completed in intervals to build strength and improve athleticism.

featured_reviews.review: Kristen was wonderful! I need to modify my workouts, and she knew just what to do! I felt very welcome, and the circuit training was a great change up to the workouts I do at home.

classes.description: Power workouts are the foundation of the FIT36 program. Alternating between "push" and "pull" movements, they will challenge you to increase your strength and cardio conditioning through dynamic functional movements that challenge opposing muscles. Your trainer will help you master the correct form before motivating you to increase weight or repetitions, helping enable you to safely and effectively POWER your fitness to the next level.
classes.name: POWER Push

description: Endorphin is a community that embraces a lifestyle of challenging movement to continually improve mental and physical health with a wide variety of classes.

featured_reviews.review: I enjoyed this class. Ray took the time to introduce himself and was very nice. I was able to set up my bike on my own because I have used this type of bike in a few other cycling classes. They have monitors on the bikes which I greatly appreciated (not every studio does). Ray led a challenging yet accessible class. He was motivating and encouraging without veering into that "rah rah" cheerleader/motivational speaker/life coach style that is so commonplace in indoor cycling classes nowadays. The music was a good mix of alt rock with a couple of pop songs and oldies thrown in. I would definitely come here again.

classes.description: A fantastic workout for all levels, this combination class of cycling and High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) off the bike promotes losing body fat...fast. We will tax every major muscle group while maximizing cardiac capacity, ensuring the highest calorie burn possible. Come ready for anything and everything! Our Ryders and Lowry studios feature the RealRyder bikes, our LoHi studio offers Stages bikes, and our Broadway studio features the Schwinn Carbon Blue. SPD clips shoes or regular sneakers work on all bikes. All levels are welcome and instructors help with setting up the bikes and proper form. We recommend beginners arrive early for a quick briefing on the flow of class.
classes.name: Warriors

classes.description: Fun, hard-hitting, innovative, indoor cycling like nowhere else in the world! Get full-body sculpting, work your core, and take your performance to the max. Our Ryders & EastBridge studios feature the Real Ryder bikes, our LoHi studio features Stages bikes, and our Broadway Next Door studio features the Schwinn Carbon Blue bike. SPD clips shoes or sneakers both work on all bikes. All levels welcome.
classes.name: Functional Indoor Cycling

description:
Epic Ryde offers functional workouts for real life activities.
Our studio is about empowering people of all fitness levels to create, reach, and exceed their goals. 

Movement with a purpose! At Epic Ryde, we have a stadium full of AWESOME indoor bikes and offer “real” cycling classes. Our bikes provide a dynamic cycling experience, cutting edge technology and the ability for you to track your true power resulting in accurate readings on calories burned and effort levels during your workout.

We also offers functional group fitness classes off the bike. We incorporate a variety of fitness modalities and the latest in full body strength training. All of our classes focus on functional movement and making you better at your day to day activities and helping you reach your fitness goals.

featured_reviews.review: Caleb is a great instructor. I loved how interactive he was, from the killer dance moves to walking around to check on each of us. I really enjoyed the color technology/display as it pushed me to work harder. Thanks for a great sweat sesh, Ill definitely be back for more!

classes.description:
Short on time?  Express Ryde is a 45 minute class packed full of climbs, sprints, intervals and more.  Perfect for those looking to get a great, challenging workout in less than an hours time.  
This class is great for building endurance on the bike.
classes.name: Express Ryde

classes.description: A blend of Cycling & TRX. 30 minutes on the bikes and 30 minutes of strength training on the TRX. Epic Mix is the best of both worlds. You get the cardiovascular workout your heart needs and the strength training workout your muscles are craving. Epic Mix is a total body workout that engages your entire body. If your looking for something beyond just the ryde, this class will have your whole body feeling Epic.

At Fierce45, they have perfected the art of high-intensity-resistance-training to bring you the best full-body workout ever. Utilizing only one-of-a-kind resistance machines and body weight exercises, each session provides the most effective cardio, strength, and balance exercises possible. featured_reviews.class_name: SOexperience Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates
featured_reviews.review: The headphones helped me tap into my body. Caitlin’s cues were great, and music was awesome!

description: Fun, challenging, and seriously effective workouts for women.

featured_reviews.review: I like how this instructor took time to explain some steps before we started. It was hard to hear once the music got going though. It’s not that she wasn’t loud enough, it sounded muffled - like maybe there is an issue with the mic or something.

classes.description: It's the sexy sweat you know and love: Cardio Dance and sculpting moves set to a bomb playlist . . . only the moves are Hip Hop focused. featured_reviews.review: Cycled through 5 stations for 4 rounds of different workouts each round. Would have appreciated a little warm up/cool down incorporated into the hour but overall a great workout and Sarah did a great job explaining and encouraging.

classes.description: In the mood for a solo workout? Jump on the treadmill or any of our other cardio equipment! Or utilize our full weight room!

Each workout will consist of core training, and total body resistance exercises.

featured_reviews.review: Aliza gave great tips, helped me learn more about the machine and was gentle at the same time. Definitely one of my favorite instructors Ive had. She also did some arms and back which I appreciate since Pilates can neglect it sometimes

classes.description:

40 minutes of heart pumping, muscle quivering, body strengthening moves on the Proformer set to fun, motivating music to keep you working hard! description:
The Barre Standard is a community inspired studio focused on delivering challenging barre-based workouts in a comfortable and empowering studio environment. 

The Barre Standard classes are for all bodies and fitness levels. They take an alignment-first, athletic approach to the traditional barre principle by combining innovative strength training routines with unique choreography to challenge the body and mind. The Barre Standard is fiercely passionate about community and empowering one another to live life to its highest standard.

featured_reviews.review: My first time tonight and I absolutely loved the class. I enjoyed the incorporation of yoga movements with weights. Kind of like a yoga sculpt class but more sculpt than yoga! I highly recommend this class, but the trainers and studio are great!

classes.description: The signature Barre Standard class combines an intense blend of barre, strength training, pilates and yoga into a 60-minute, total-body workout. Each class will consist of targeted isometric holds and heavy repetition to safely bring each muscle group to fatigue.

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: Wasnt as much of a vinyasa class, but it was good for intermediate to advanced yogis who are looking to further their poses. There was a lot of focus on arm balancing poses and inversions.

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Power Vinyasa adds a contemporary twist to this creative style by focusing heavily on building strength and fortitude under pressure. Expect an intense workout that may include fast transitions, long series of linked postures, core routines, and arm- and leg-shaking holds and balances. Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism.
classes.name: Power Vinyasa Level 2

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism. Vinyasa classes labeled “2” explore complex movements including classic arm balances layered over solid foundations. These classes begin to encourage practitioners to explore getting upside-down, may incorporate more intense breathing practices, and incorporate deeper backbends, hip opening, twists, and forward folds. We recommend that students seeking to take these classes feel confident, safe, and strong throughout classic sun salutations.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 2- Heated

classes.description: Forrest Yoga is renowned as an intensely physical and internally focused practice that emphasizes how to carry a transformative experience off the mat and into daily life. The practice challenges students to access their whole being and to use Forrest Yoga as a path to finding and then cleansing the emotional and mental blocks that dictate and limit their lives. Expect challenging flow sequencing, unique posture variations, and a strong emphasis on breath awareness.
classes.name: Forrest Level 2

classes.description: This class is heated above 80 degrees. Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Power Vinyasa adds a contemporary twist to this creative style by focusing heavily on building strength and fortitude under pressure. Expect an intense workout that may include fast transitions, long series of linked postures, core routines, and arm- and leg-shaking holds and balances. Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 2-3 - Heated

classes.description: A cooling, patient, and deeply intense practice, Yin is a perfect complement to dynamic and muscular styles popular in America today. Yin stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of postures through long holds (between one and ten minutes). By emphasizing actions of ligaments, bones, and joints rather than muscles, these classes encourage an entirely different sort of openness from more active and movement-oriented practices. Suitable for all levels, Yin promotes a sense of slow, deep unwinding and release.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

description:
Fierce45® is Denver's Premiere High Intensity Pilates Studio that combines high-intensity, low impact and mindful movement for one of the most efficient workouts! At Fierce45, they have perfected the art of high-intensity-resistance-training to bring you the best full-body workout ever. Utilizing only one-of-a-kind resistance machines and body weight exercises, each session provides the most effective cardio, strength, and balance exercises possible. With heart-pumping music that matches your sky-high heart rate and your #FierceFam sweating next to you, your body and mind will drop into a meditation in no time. 

Fierce45 is not just a workout, it’s a movement!

featured_reviews.review: Loved everything about this class and place! Easy street parking (midday weekday class), aesthetically interesting, rapid-fire instruction with helpful cues on positioning, approachable equipment. Erika is great — easiest to follow along when she posed the moves herself (first time at this studio). Only minor issue was the length of time to check in, but that was due to a system glitch on a purchase.

class.name: Explicit Music Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates

classes.description: Ready to sweat? This 45-minute full body workout will push your muscles to fatigue with low-impact and high-intensity movements. Using slow, continuous, constant motions, this class will work your mind and body in the best way.

classes.description: Same full-body 45-minute workout, dirtier music. Feel your heart pounding to the beat of your favorite songs without the filter.

featured_reviews.review: I thought this wouldn't be nearly as good as dedicated yoga studios since they have so many different activities, but I was pleasantly surprised. Nice space and a very welcoming, helpful teacher. Can't wait to check out their other yoga classes.

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Barre

This faster-paced class includes high-intensity movements to increase your cardiovascular endurance followed by low-intensity active recovery periods in between exercises. If you’ve got some energy to burn, this is the class for you. *This class is intended for intermediate to advanced barre practitioners. Don't forget to bring a mat!

classes.description: This gentle practice uses props to support practitioners in resting poses for several minutes at a time, allowing for deep stretching without introducing strain to the body. It's a great complement to an active lifestyle, and it is also a very calming practice that allows practitioners to reset psychologically and let go of mental stress. Appropriate for beginners and all levels.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

description:
FIT36® high intensity interval training (HIIT) is the next level in fitness – no traditional fitness plan can match the efficiency of this 36-minute workout.
 
FIT36® run their 36-minute circuits for two weeks at a time.  This quick muscle-memory plan allows your body to go from unable to able to expert on these movements in a two-week span, and once you’ve mastered them, the instructors shake up the circuit and start over again.  Movements include everything from kettlebells to TRX and beyond, and are completed in intervals to build strength and improve athleticism.
 
Heart rate monitors are available to keep you in the proper anaerobic zone throughout the workout, and you can track your performance on the big screen.
 
Each FIT36® studio is independently owned and operated.

featured_reviews.review: Im giving it five stars bc I genuinely like this gym very much. That being said, I do not like a partner workout. No two people are perfectly matched and it should really be an autonomous workout. Also, because there are no towels provided, and no mandate to bring one (though I do), all the equipment is drenched. Add to that the people working out barefoot, and it can get pretty dicey.

classes.description: Power workouts are the foundation of the FIT36 program. Alternating between "push" and "pull" movements, they will challenge you to increase your strength and cardio conditioning through dynamic functional movements that challenge opposing muscles. Your trainer will help you master the correct form before motivating you to increase weight or repetitions, helping enable you to safely and effectively POWER your fitness to the next level.

She gives fantastic alignment cues, makes every pose accessible, and is very clear and thorough in her instruction. C1 classes are foundational but I got a great workout and a good stretch as well!

featured_reviews.review: Class incorporated a lot of great new moves, very refreshing. Every muscle was worked to fatigue and I felt it for sure. Lindsey was one of the best instructors I have had yet. Gave hands on adjustments and was very upbeat and welcoming.

featured_reviews.review: Interesting set up! Interval training, but all automated through videos and timers on a screen. The class felt like it went by quickly because you knew what was coming and exactly what was left. Pretty tough class, got a great workout in, Monday’s are cardio. It was less personal than the classes I go to since the coaches just help you follow the screen and move around the stations correctly.

classes.description: There are 27 stations and no getting off. That’s because Firestorm is no ordinary high intensity interval circuit. You and 27 comrades will laugh and cry as you work your way around. Meanwhile, your heart will be wondering what it ever did to you to deserve such treatment. Good luck. Functional Pointscardio basedfollow the leader style course45 minute session27 stations Timing 35sec work : 10sec rest

featured_reviews.review: What a beautiful class! Jordan really created a unique flow that moved us in a variety of different ways outside of the more traditional asanas. I will definitely take his class again!

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. At Kindness Yoga, the Steady Vinyasa class format emphasizes deep inner awareness, via a slow to moderate pace and the inclusion of subtle energetic awareness practices. These classes are less about flowing through many poses, and more about creating a sense of flowing energy and intention. In addition to posture practice, these classes may include guided visualizations, pranayama (breathwork), mantra, mudra, bandhas, and philosophical / metaphysical teachings. Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism. Vinyasa classes labeled “2” explore complex movements including classic arm balances layered over solid foundations. These classes begin to encourage practitioners to explore getting upside-down, may incorporate more intense breathing practices, and incorporate deeper backbends, hip opening, twists, and forward folds. In addition, the Steady Vinyasa format may deepen and broaden your exposure to powerful energetic practices including breath retention. We recommend that students seeking to take these classes feel confident, safe, and strong throughout classic sun salutations.
classes.name: Steady Vinyasa Level 2

classes.description: Using a series of guided visualizations and deep relaxation techniques, this “inner body yoga” is designed to help practitioners move beyond the conditioned mind into a state of expanded self-awareness. By entering into an ultimate rest state and gaining access to the deeper realms of the mind, students can more effectively release tension, anxiety, unwanted habits and self-limiting beliefs—awakening to their greatest potential. Each class begins with several minutes of gentle, meditative movement, with the majority of the practice experienced lying in Savasana.
classes.name: Yoga Nidra

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with them, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. With high-performance custom bikes, amphitheater seating, enhanced lighting, concert-quality sound and two massive high-def flat screens, they set the scene for an immersive, exhilarating experience. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts and class rank. 

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: Sarah's classes are tough and hill - focused with baller playlists. The 2000s throwback class was awesome. Sarah gives great, clear direction and cues. I always feel accomplished and completely spent after her classes. She is very motivating without being cheesy or cliche. Chur, bru!

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description: FITC is a commented focused fitness experience based on real-time needs. Our team use a wide variety of equipment, movement patterns, and formats to generate a new experience with each class. Come join us for some serious sweat and overall good time that will leave you feeling BETTER than when you first walked in.

featured_reviews.review: Kathryn’s energy is contagious, she makes me smile through the pain. The circuit was very challenging with a variety of full body movements. We worked in groups of 4. The workout was a lot of fun, and I left feeling accomplished.

classes.description: This 25 minute express class will utilize resistance bands focusing on core, glute, & hip strength, mobility and activation.

classes.description: This class is designed to increase cardiovascular and core endurance within an energetic and upbeat atmosphere.

description:
At Yoga Pod, they commit to breathe first and act second. Their classes cultivate discipline through the rigor, heat, and focus of one's practice. Through infectious, positive attitude and culture, they create community and build an impactful tribe. 

At Yoga Pod, they redefine fitness and forge a sustainable, intentional yoga practice through Breath, Strength, and Sweat. Commit to your growth and be connected at Yoga Pod!

featured_reviews.review: This was a fun class! the music could have been louder and a portion of it was heated, which I wasn't expecting. The room has to heat for the heated class immediately after so it started getting really warm about 35 mins in.

The class finishes with gentle stretching and a light cool down. podFIT is a fun and vibrant class taught to the beat of high-energy music designed to provide balance to your practice.

description:
Shift Cycle is Denver's rhythm based, full-body indoor cycling studio, with high intensity intervals to torch calories & fat, and specialized choreography and weights to strengthen and tone. Childcare is available for $5 per child per class.

Clip-in cycling shoes are required- bring your own (LOOK Delta & SPD) or rent for $2 from the studio. New riders should arrive 15 minutes before class for bike setup and instruction.For your safety and the experience for other riders, late riders will not be allowed in the studio. 

NEW UPDATE: You will be asked to pick a bike before you head into the bike room. Make sure to ask the front which bikes are available.

featured_reviews.review: Love this studio! I'm fairly new to spinning and Whitney was super sweet and took time to show me around and helped me with my bike. Loved the playlist. A fabulous workout! I'll be back for sure.

description:
ONE Yoga is an Urban Yoga Retreat for Mind.Body.Spirit.

ONE is a beautiful one-of-a-kind Yoga Studio offering a huge variety of great classes led by Denver's most beloved teachers. The studio has classes for yogis at every level from Beginner to Advanced. Whether you want to sweat and groove in a heated Power 2 class or quiet your mind in an unheated Hatha class they have a class for you.  

The ONE Yoga studio is gorgeous and each of its 3 rooms looks out at a peaceful tree-lined park. Check out their fun & funky boutique, too.  And if you are looking for more relaxation, ONE Yoga offers Restorative classes almost everyday.  Need more peace? Checkout out their massage options, as well.

featured_reviews.review: Chelsea is a great teacher. Loved the music she played tooBeatles let it beneed I say more?! Will definitely be checking out more of her classes in the future. Also Ill say that there was a diversity of attendees which was quite nicethe class wasnt intimidating like some other heated classes around town.

classes.description: An intro-level, gently heated power class with a sequence of postures to open and strengthen your body. This class is more of a workout and includes athletic movement and core work to increase your heart rate. Learn to breathe deliberately in order to focus your mind and relieve stress. For all levels.
classes.name: ONE Power 1

classes.description:
An intro-level traditional class that integrates static postures and often incorporates reflective themes in a non-heated environment. Classes may include breath work, some flowing, a thoughtful sequence of postures, and a short meditation.
For all levels.
classes.name: ONE Hatha 1

classes.description:
ONE POWER 2 YOGA WITH ESSENTIAL OILS - ONE Power Yoga will help you build strength, get fit, increase flexibility, advance your yoga skills and improve your balance.  
   
In this class – You will sweat! This power class incorporates more challenging postures, endurance and core work. And the instructor will offer (optional) essential oils throughout the practice.  The room is heated to 96 degrees. This practice is yoga-based workout for cardio and strength-building and it will help you increase flexibility and balance. Classes may include (optional) peak poses which may include arm balances or inversions. Knowledge of the postures is recommended.
classes.name: ONE Power 2 w / Essential Oils
ONE Beginner Yoga - 75 min

classes.description: Inspired by Yin yoga, this class is relaxing and also rejuvenating. Most postures are in a resting position and held for several minutes at a time to allow connective tissue to heal. Focus on gentle stretching without strain can include the use of props (bolsters, blocks, and blankets) to support the body. For all levels.
classes.name: ONE Restorative

description: Fierce45 is a High Intensity Pilates studio. They are for everybody and every body! They focus on individual attention, hands on adjustments, intentional movement, and creating a welcoming community. Classes will challenge you every single time but in a safe way.

featured_reviews.review: This was such a challenging class - from the first minute my muscles were shaking! But the class didnt feel like I was wearing myself down, rather pushing myself and building myself up! I left feeling challenged, uplifted, and inspired to keep on coming back!

classes.description: Ready to sweat? This 45-minute full body workout will push your muscles to fatigue with low-impact and high-intensity movements. Using slow, continuous, constant motions, this class will work your mind and body in the best way.
classes.name: Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates

description: This studio offers a total body barre workout that delivers the results you want in record time. In less than an hour you will achieve a full-body workout with an emphasis on: hips, thighs, seat, abdominals and arms. The Pure Barre technique is low-impact, protecting your joints by avoiding any bouncing or jumping. Each strength section of the workout is followed by a stretching section in order to create toned muscles. Go for the total body workout, stay for the results, and fall in love with the technique and community!

featured_reviews.review: Nice combination of the choreography. Friendly, helpful staff. Encouraging and supportive instructor gave great cues. Great workout—even got my heart rate up, which is not common for me in a barre class.

classes.description: Pure Barre is a low impact total body workout set to upbeat music to create a high energy, graceful, yet intense 50-minute muscle-sculpting class. The class flows through a quick progression of small isometric movements designed to isolate major muscle groups, including your arms, thighs, seat, and abs. Using your own body weight for resistance, you will work muscles in the various target areas to fatigue and then stretch them out in order to achieve a stronger, longer, and an overall leaner physique.
classes.name: Pure Barre Classic

classes.description: Inspired by resistance training. Perfected by Pure Barre. Pure Reform is a total body workout that targets, shapes, and defines all major muscle groups through resistance‐based strength training. The 50‐minute class merges the elements you love from our Pure Barre technique with moves that challenge your strength, coordination and balance by using resistance bands, sliders, and the barre.
classes.name: Pure Reform

description:
Imagine walking into a friend's garage gym. A BIG garage gym. High ceilings, exposed brick and a wide open space. At GenFit you won't see fancy exercise machines or gimmicky equipment. You'll see a group of friends working hard and having fun. Expect a workout that will challenge your physical and mental limits and leave you feeling equally exhausted and exhilarated at the end.

All fitness levels are welcome! Classes are one hour, utilizing any and all methods of movement. GenFit incorporates barbells, dumbbells, TRX, rowing, running, and body-weight movements in a variety of formats to keep the body guessing and the mind engaged. 

You will get stronger, you will get faster, and your physical and mental endurance will build with every class.

featured_reviews.review: Most fun Bootcamp Ive done in Denver! Hard, tons of variety of moves and equipment (KB, a freakin log, heavy bag, medicine balls), all the regulars were really friendly to me, lots of encouragement and form checking by Ryan....Ill definitely be back!

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with them, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. With high-performance custom bikes, amphitheater seating, enhanced lighting, concert-quality sound and two massive high-def flat screens, they set the scene for an immersive, exhilarating experience. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts and class rank. 

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: One of the best classes I've taken at Cyclebar. Rebecca not only greeted me by name and introduced herself, but she also delivered a killer workout with a nice juicy stretch at the end. Take her class!!

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description:
Please show up at least 10 minutes prior to class. Most CorePower Yoga studios will close the doors at the start of class because the instructors who check users in must teach, so you may risk getting locked out.

Ready to sweat? CorePower Yoga’s unique and physically challenging styles of yoga combine heat, music, movement, breath, and community to create a one-of-a-kind workout. CorePower Yoga strives to increase awareness and widespread adoption of yoga by making yoga accessible to everyone, through a variety of yoga styles, for beginners and more advanced yoga students, and class times to meet any schedule.
