featured_reviews.review: Amazing class! I love combination of barre and heat with a little yoga. Angela is a great instructor, guiding you through each sequence with cues and encouragement You will feel the burn while dripping with sweat!

classes.description: A true blend of balance, strength and flexibility, Hot Power Fusion combines the meditative, detoxifying qualities of hot yoga with the intensity of power yoga to help you deepen your practice. Set to motivating music, you’ll focus on postures that open the shoulders, hips and spine while strengthening your core and upper body.
classes.name: HPF-Hot Power Fusion

classes.description: Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your practice like never before.
classes.name: C2-CorePower Yoga 2

classes.description: When muscle meets yoga, Sculpt is born. Boost metabolism and build lean muscle mass as you move to upbeat tracks. You’ll combine free weights with CorePower Yoga 2 (C2) sequencing and cardio to intensify each pose while mixing in strength-training moves like squats, lunges and bicep curls. It is recommended that you take at least one CorePower level 1 or 2 (C1 or C2) class before a Yoga Sculpt class.
classes.name: YS-Yoga Sculpt

description:
Offering Pilates Reformer, Indoor Cycling and Suspension Training Class. We are your one stop studio for core and cardio! 

If you are looking to rehab an injury, wanting to achieve an athletic edge or are new to Pilates, we also offer one-on-one training. Ask about our Intro package.

featured_reviews.review: Great class with Heather! today we mixed it up and played on the chair and the reformer. Shes great about giving challenges to those who are looking for a little extra while providing lots of cues for correct alignment which is always appreciated!

classes.description: This class is ideal for those new to Pilates or in need of a refresher. Pilates will help you improve balance, coordination, muscle tone, core strength, flexibility and posture. This class utilizes a variety of Pilates equipment and props such as the Reformer, Chair, and Springboard. If you are rehabbing an injury or have limitations that you are unsure how to modify around, we suggest taking advantage of our Intro Private Package prior to enrolling in a class.
classes.name: Pilates (Foundations)

classes.description: This dynamic Pilates class is open to all clients with  prior Pilates Apparatus experience. This class will utilizes a variety of Pilates equipment and props such as the Reformer, Chair, and Springboard. New to Pilates!? Start with one of our  Foundations Classes or Intro Private Package!
classes.name: Pilates

classes.description: This class offers a circuit of Cycling, TRX, Mat Pilates, and other exercise modalities. Variety is the spice of life and this interval style class is designed to keep you burning calories way after the workout is done. All fitness levels are welcome.
classes.name: Cycle Circuit

description: The Dailey Method is a results driven exercise that produces a strong, lean, sculpted body. Combining the best of Pilates, yoga, ballet barre training and now cycling, our classes are an ever-evolving mix of movement that offer extreme benefits for body and mind. Our classes are driven by fitness research and our students’ needs. We offer individualized attention in a group setting to give you the strength, discipline, and joy to find ultimate alignment. With two different cycle class formats (including hybrid of cycle + barre), rides are beat driven, high intensity, sweaty and FUN for an ultimate workout that’s safe & effective in our stadium seating room with STAGES bikes. Cycle classes deliver a balanced, full body workout resulting in a high-calorie burn in a high energy environment!

featured_reviews.review: This teacher really made this class amazing. I've taken bar at different places and always been a tad bored. She kept moving our location which kept me engaged. Excellent corrections and very hands on. I'll definitely be back.

class.name: NEW CLASS OFFERING: Dailey Interval: Power

classes.description: Perfect for getting in and getting out! Quick, efficient, every muscle of the body will be worked and fatigued...plus, the faster paced class will keep you moving so that before you know it, you're out and back to life!
classes.name: Dailey Express

classes.description: The class is a faster paced, 45-minute Dailey Method class that combines periods of high and low intensity movement for optimal cardiovascular results. Introducing weighted interval portions in this class for the most effective and efficient class yet. The heart rate is elevated and brought down throughout the class, while recovery periods remain active. The interval training and fun, upbeat music give you the power and energy to bring your best to the more intense portions of The Dailey Method. Recommended for any level of student - modifications can be made for any level of fitness.
classes.name: NEW CLASS OFFERING: Dailey Interval: Power

class.name: NEW CLASS OFFERING: Dailey Interval: Power

classes.description: Dailey Cycle/Barre fuses the body sculpting and flexibility aspects of The Dailey Method with the cardiovascular benefits of indoor cycling. This format includes 40 minutes of heart-pounding, spirit-lifting, beat-driven cycling and 20 minutes of upper body toning, core strengthening and stretching off the bike. With The Dailey Method’s signature focus on alignment and form, this class delivers a balanced, full-body workout resulting in a high calorie burn.
classes.name: Dailey Cycle/Barre

description:
Zenver Yoga is located in the West Highland neighborhood of Denver at 3729 W. 32nd Ave. They offer mostly flow-based yoga classes with some restorative, slow flow and meditation classes as well. They welcome all levels of experience and are there to support you in every step of your yoga journey, whether complete beginner or experienced yogi. They keep their studio warm; gently heated at a temperature right around 75 degrees. Their mission is to offer a safe, nurturing place to heal your body and a sacred, peaceful place to connect to your truest self beyond the limitations of the mind. 

Stop by Zenver for a class today and leave feeling calm, refreshed and centered as you walk back out into the world.

featured_reviews.review: Great class! Very beginner friendly, knowledgable instructor and relaxing. Only feedback was I’d have liked hands-on adjustments but she might not have been sure about that since I’m new. Parking was tough- leave extra time!

classes.description: This vinyasa-based class links body movement with breath, it's designed to give you the perfect balance of zen and energetic movement. You will move through a series of postures, ranging from simple to complex. This class includes meditative breath work, energetic sun salutations, balancing and standing poses, as well as, inversions and floor work. Ends with a guided deep relaxation of the mind and body into savasana. All levels welcome!
classes.name: Zenergy Flow

description:
Endorphin offers the largest diversity of instructor-led group fitness and yoga classes in Denver. From gentle and restorative yoga to the most challenging indoor cycling and high intensity functional training classes in the country. They have something for everyone, at any level of fitness.

They believe everyone needs to be part of a community that supports, encourages and inspires a healthy lifestyle. Through a diverse offering of yoga and challenging workouts, they are giving you all the tools, resources, and guidance needed to improve your health and well-being.

featured_reviews.review: Andy is the best :) I love his class. perfect balance of feeling challenged & having fun. definitely good for all levels. some days I modify all the poses for a lower energy practice, others, I push myself into advanced l poses. and he offers all those options and encourages us to tailor his instruction to our needs.

classes.description: Vinyasa is a practice that allows for an awakening of energy and exploration of your edges in a conscious way through movement and breath. This practice flows through a sequence of postures to improve strength, flexibility, and mind body connection. In Vinyasa All Levels, flow will be built upon the foundational sequences of Vinyasa Flow 1, with various modifications and/or enhancements offered for a range of new practitioners to advanced practitioners. Expect to be challenged and revitalized no matter what your experience level. Intermediate/advanced students will have the opportunity to work into deeper backbends, arm balancing, and inversions. All levels are welcome.
classes.name: Vinyasa Yoga All Levels

classes.description: This gentle practice uses props to support practitioners in resting poses for several minutes at a time, allowing for deep stretching without introducing strain to the body. It's a great complement to an active lifestyle, and it is also a very calming practice that allows practitioners to reset psychologically and let go of mental stress. Appropriate for beginners and all levels.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

description:
Check out Denver’s most GLAM dance & fitness space, offering the most unique & tempting fitness classes, led by an elite instructor team.

With over 50 classes a week on schedule there will be something for everyone, including the men of Denver. Classes range from Pole fitness level 1-5, bootcamps, stretching, aerial hammock, flexibility based, pilates, Lyra (aerial hoop), low impact toning and conditioning based. All clients who are new to pole fitness are encouraged to start with Pole Level 1 classes.

featured_reviews.review: Patty is so fun and a wonderful instructor! She makes you feel comfortable and she explains all the moves very well. She breaks the moves down in a way that makes you feel safe. She also shows several variations for everyone's level. Love her music choices and her fun choreography!!! Definitely recommend.

classes.description: Dip your toes into the sexier side of pole dancing with this low flow based class. This is a level 2 class designed for the student who wants to work on mastering level one and two moves with an emphasis on performance skills/technique, with a sexy twist. Begin with a full body warm up to get all your parts moving and flowing. Followed by instructor lead choreography by someone who has really mastered the art of seduction and technique, in one. Part choreo class, part low flow, all sexy so get ready to pull out your inner seductruss for this class! *Heels and kneepads encouraged but not necessary. Must have passed pole level 1.
classes.name: Slightly Stripped Lv 2+

classes.description:
Need some time to work on your pole technique? Creating a routine that you would like to work out? Use this open studio hour to work on your current pole & fitness goals. This hour is UN-INSTRUCTED, no technique or warm-up will be provided, however an instructor will be available for questions and spotting.


open pole is co-ed as well. must have at least some level 1 pole experience!
classes.name: Open Pole Hour Coed (Lv 1+)

classes.description: The art of balance will focus on strengthening the body and the mind to further progress towards complete balance. Expect to begin class with a full body warm up cardio based warm up. Moving then into focused strength exercises that will assist in the eventual goal of pressure hand/ head/ forearm- stands and variation.This class will cover handstands, headstands, needle, standing splits, low leveling tumbling, forearm stands. All levels are welcome to attend
classes.name: Art of Balance Coed

classes.description: pole technical class; warmup will get your pole-specific muscles warmed, strengthened & stretched. pole technique will follow. Class will focus on spin pole technique and creating a solid foundation for higher spin pole levels. must be comfortable with static pole level 1 (101). *yoga mat, knee pads, and/or leg warmers optional.
classes.name: Foundations of Spin Pole Coed

classes.description: This class will make your heart jump for joy and your feet leap! After a dance style warm up, you will be lead through a series of techniques and movements that will lead you into that thing we call, Jazz. All this and you will get an energetic workout and choreography that will keep you coming back for more. Get ready to DANCE tease style! *All level welcome. A mat is recommended.
classes.name: Jazz it up! Coed

classes.description: Now that you have experienced static pole this will be your introduction to the world of spin. This is a mixed level class that will continue working on the technique and strength that where established in Pole level 1, but now adding the element of the spinning pole. This class will work on how to establish and use momentum from the spin pole. Climbing and upright combos using your level 1 movements. *MUST HAVE GRADUATED from Level 1 and currently attending level 2 + classes. This class is not recommend to those who have never pole danced before, prior experience is highly recommended.
classes.name: Spin Pole Coed Level 2+

classes.description:
Have you ever wanted to learn the art of the Tease?
Join Burlesque Artist and Professional Mover Miss Monroe this next week to take off some calories and clothes in a steamy workout filled with classic peels and modern movement. Miss Monroe comes from Brooklyn via San Francisco and is ready to bring you some spice with a little bit of nice. You'll get one hell of a workout and leave with less clothes then you started with. From classic to modern burlesque, you'll learn the in and outs of what it really means to Tease.......
*All levels welcome. Yoga mat, water bottle recommended!
classes.name: Burlesque Coed

description: The yoga + barre studio of Five Points and Park Hill!

featured_reviews.review: I love Taylor's class! She is fun, upbeat, very encouraging but also pushes you to your limit. She also asks for areas you want to focus on in the beginning and can accommodate to your wants/needs. One of my favorite classes I've taken through ClassPass.

classes.description: Yoga with weights! This non-heated Power Vinyasa yoga class incorporates weights to push your cardiovascular levels, strengthen, lengthen and tone!
classes.name: Yoga Sculpt (non-heated)

classes.description: FLEX Barre: Lift, Tone, and Tuck! If you’re looking for amazing results on the tone, shape, and strength of your body this class is made for you. In this dance inspired workout, individual muscle groups are targeted using very specific, small movements. These small movements will quickly fatigue the muscle which leads to the drastic strengthening and toning that you can';t help but love. It's worth it! Appropriate for students of all levels.
classes.name: FLEX Barre

classes.description: Power Vinyasa Yoga: Sweat, challenge, explore. This class is designed deepen your vinyasa yoga practice and encourage you to take your practice to the next level. You’ll have fun exploring new poses, breathing past your previous limits, and ultimately learning more about yourself, your body and your yoga practice. The room is heated to 92-98 degrees which allows for more circulation, detoxification, and cleansing of the mind, body and spirit.
classes.name: Power Vinyasa Yoga (heated)

description: The Kindness Yoga studios were founded on a simple premise. By making yoga, mindfulness and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. They do things differently. They embrace many styles of yoga and encourage our teachers to share their most unique offerings. Their spaces are anything but cookie-cutter: each one reflects the neighborhood it serves. The recipe works – after just a few years in business, they've been honored as Denver’s Best Yoga by the Denver A List in 2013 and 2014, and Top of the Town by 5280 Magazine in 2014.

featured_reviews.review: Just what I needed the day after a full day on the ski hill! Thank you Shigeko!

classes.description: This unique class combines the benefits of dynamic, muscular Vinyasa flow with the slow, potent unfolding power of Yin. Some teachers will begin with Yin and gradually build into Vinyasa; others will start with Vinyasa, then unwind into the embrace of Yin. Yin Yoga - a cooling, patient, and deeply intense practice - is a perfect complement to dynamic and muscular styles popular in America today. Yin stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of postures through long holds between one and ten minutes. By emphasizing actions of ligaments, bones, and joints rather than muscles, these classes encourage an entirely different sort of openness from more active and movement-oriented practices like Vinyasa yoga.
classes.name: Yin / Vinyasa All Levels

classes.description: The Kindness Signature Series is a comprehensive set of fundamental yoga postures specifically designed to strengthen, heal, and transform. The Series was originally taught under the name Kindness Hot Yoga in rooms heated to about 90 degrees. This version is identical to Kindness Hot in terms of postures and alignment, but is practiced in rooms heated to a comfortable 75 degrees. It allows students who prefer a more moderate environment to still receive the benefits of the Series' detoxifying mixture of strengthening, lengthening and balancing poses. This practice is truly all-levels: challenging, relaxing, and beneficial for beginners and advanced practitioners alike
classes.name: Signature Series

classes.description: Using a series of guided visualizations and deep relaxation techniques, this “inner body yoga” is designed to help practitioners move beyond the conditioned mind into a state of expanded self-awareness. By entering into an ultimate rest state and gaining access to the deeper realms of the mind, students can more effectively release tension, anxiety, unwanted habits and self-limiting beliefs—awakening to their greatest potential. Each class begins with several minutes of gentle, meditative movement, with the majority of the practice experienced lying in Savasana.
classes.name: Yoga Nidra

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: Love this laid back and welcoming studio. I was just visiting Denver for the weekend and really appreciated the studio letting me borrow a mat. This class was just what I needed after a week of skiing. Excellent stretching built into a mid level vinyasa flow. Jordan gives good cues and hands on adjustments.

classes.description:
VINYASA
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Their diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build strength, aid balance and weight loss, while reducing stress and increasing vitality.
LEVEL 1-2
Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2

classes.description:
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Their diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build strength, aid balance and weight loss, while reducing stress and increasing vitality.
LEVEL 2
Vinyasa classes labeled “2” explore complex movements including classic arm balances layered over solid foundations.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 2

classes.description: A cooling, patient, and deeply intense practice, Yin is a perfect complement to dynamic and muscular styles popular in America today. Yin stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of postures through long holds (between one and ten minutes). By emphasizing actions of ligaments, bones, and joints rather than muscles, these classes encourage an entirely different sort of openness from more active and movement-oriented practices. Suitable for all levels, Yin promotes a sense of slow, deep unwinding and release.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

description:
A combination of cardio, strength training, and Pilates - our classes will strengthen, lengthen, and tone your body like no other workout!
40 minutes of heart pumping, muscle quivering, body strengthening moves on the Proformer set to fun, motivating music to keep you working hard! Pilates Evolution is a NEW EVOLUTION of Pilates that includes effective intensity, cardio and endurance training, which are key elements in improving your body composition. Perfect for men and women of all age groups, Pilates Evolution is the key to your year round beach body. Classes are challenging.  Private sessions are recommended for beginners and anyone with an injury.

featured_reviews.review: Te best lagree class Ive ever taken. Jessica programming was well thought out and segn kicked my butt. Highly recommend her

classes.description:
A combination of cardio, strength training, and Pilates - our classes will strengthen, lengthen, and tone your body like no other workout!
40 minutes of heart pumping, muscle quivering, body strengthening moves on the Proformer set to fun, motivating music to keep you working hard! Pilates Evolution is a NEW EVOLUTION of Pilates that includes effective intensity, cardio and endurance training, which are key elements in improving your body composition. Perfect for men and women of all age groups, Pilates Evolution is the key to your year round beach body. Classes are challenging.  Private sessions are recommended for beginners and anyone with an injury.
classes.name: Pilates Evolution Southglenn 40

description: Endorphin is a community that embraces a lifestyle of challenging movement. With a wide variety of classes, Endorphin continually improves mental and physical health.

featured_reviews.review: Even though this class is built around progressions I always find a challenge at my level (I don't go regularly). The instruction is what I appreciate - real knowledge of kinesiology and customized feedback. It felt like most of the class were regulars but folks were mostly friendly and also offered encouragement.

classes.description: For beginners through experienced athletes, this class is designed to build strength, add definition, increase bone density, decrease body fat and increase lean muscle. This is not a fast paced class, rather a time to train on technique and form as you complete the prescribed workout at your own pace with your own weight and a personal trainer and coach. Coaches will lead a group warm-up and work on mobility specific to each training session and will work with each student to ensure proper form and range of motion on each lift. This class uses kettlebells, dumbbells, plate loaded barbells, and body weight for maximum effectiveness. It is suggested to attend this class 3x a week. We have found that consistent strength training for three days a week delivers the improvements we are seeking. However, you will also see benefits by adding this class to your schedule once or twice a week.
classes.name: Foundational Strength Training

description: bulldog yoga is a one-of-a-kind blend of fitness-fueled yoga with a musical heart. They offer kick-ass, fitness based yoga and music, which equals a heart-pumping workout. No chanting. No uncomfortable moments.

featured_reviews.review: This class was incredible for building strength and toning! Rad music and super clear communication from the instructor. Learned a lot of new poses and got a killer workout in!

classes.description: Time to bring it! Look no further…this is your whole-body workout for the day. Invigorate is ambitious, stimulating and pretty darn aerobic. Your blood (and sweat!) will flow as we move you through a “power” class set to great music. Yes, it’s ok to sing along :). This class is heated to 92 degrees.
classes.name: Invigorate

classes.description:
Flexibility and strength…hallmarks of bulldoggers.
Set to calm yet energetic music (in true bulldog style), Activate allows you to work your entire body in a dynamic “slow flow” class.
On your high-energy days, deepen the poses to feel the burn (yep…some days you gotta push!).
A few notes about our class names….“Calm,” “Rock,”  and “Mix” refer to the music playlist in each particular class. The numbers 76 and 92 refer to the temperature of the room in each particular class.
classes.name: Activate

description: Rooted Heart is a boutique yoga studio that offers students the chance to feel highly supported on their yoga journey. Classes at Rooted Heart are purposefully smaller, ensuring a more personalized experience. Students of all ages and with all levels of yoga experience are welcomed into this community. They provide a robust schedule of group classes encompassing many styles of yoga because they believe in having something for everyone. Additionally, the studio is housed in a wellness center where students will have access to highly qualified health and wellness professionals from a variety of fields.

featured_reviews.review: What an AHmazing class! The teacher was VERY knowledgeable and was able to detect which organs/chakras were being released based on which yoga position we were in. It was very relaxing and I liked the hands on adjustments throughout the class. It is on a somewhat active street so I would suggest towards the back if you're looking for more privacy and quiet. I also really enjoyed the ambience of the room with dimmed lights and lavender essential oil humidifier. It was the perfect mood for some Yin.

classes.description: Power Vinyasa - A faster-paced vinyasa flow that combines movement, breath, and strength. This class is designed to challenge your muscular and cardiovascular stamina and leave you feeling energized and refreshed!
classes.name: Power Vinyasa

classes.description: Restorative Yoga is a passive physical practice that allows for opening and healing to happen on many levels. This class is suitable for beginners and advanced practitioners alike! Restorative yoga focuses on fewer poses that are held for several minutes at a time, and the aim is to use props to ensure that each pose promotes rest, relaxation, and a letting go of muscle engagement. This class also incorporates optional reiki healing facilitated by the instructor while students hold each pose.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga with Reiki Healing

description: One Boulder Fitness classes focus on keeping you moving between each exercise, so you will be burning fat while building muscle.

featured_reviews.review: Hannah is the best! Shes so knowledgable and her classes are fun, challenging and always different.

classes.description: In the mood for some solo time on the treadmill, elliptical, or weight machines? Reserve one hour of open gym time!
classes.name: Gym Time

description: Don’t mind sweating in the company of others? Then let Blunt Force power your next fitness routine. From cardio boxing and kickboxing, to good old-fashioned sledgehammerin’, rope-climbin’ bootcamps, they offer a variety of training options to choose from. And with a slew of highly motivated trainers on staff, Blunt Force makes it easy to get fit.

featured_reviews.review: This class is HARD. I consider myself intermediate in terms of fitness and this class makes me feel like a beginner. It involves strength and cardio and generally leaves you sweaty and breathless. It is an excellent workout though, guaranteed to make you sore and you can pick your own weights which helps.

classes.description: When it comes to workouts, this is our specialty. These 50-minute sessions vary by trainer, ensuring you never do the same workout twice. Bootcamp classes cover every body part in a single workout and you will always leave the gym sweaty and tired. We even design custom birthday bootcamps for all of our clients. Careful what you wish for.
classes.name: Bootcamp

classes.description:
This 50-minute session is a butt-kicking, fat-burning, muscle-building workout that combines striking
and interval training. You'll train like a pro under one of our extremely talented and experienced instructors. Their respective knowledge in and around the ring makes this class a legit option for anyone looking to put on the gloves and mix things up.

***Wraps available for purchase***
classes.name: Kickboxing

classes.description:
If you're ready to shred some serious calories and enhance your boxing skills, come join this challenging class that covers technique, and drills not covered in other boxing classes.

***Wraps available for purchase***
classes.name: Boxing

classes.description:
This 25-minute gut-wrenching session is a down-and-dirty
way to get lean, build strength and ground your power.
Before a workout or by itself, CORE does a body good.
classes.name: CORE

classes.description: Between a combination of light weights and plyometric training, this 30 minute high intensity interval training class will leave you sweating and satisfied.
classes.name: HIIT

classes.description: Get yourself ready for Tough Mudder and Spartan!
classes.name: Obstacle Course Prep

description: They pride themselves on their strong sense of community and their talented instructors who are ready to help you heal, prevent future injury, and find what you need from yoga.

featured_reviews.review: Kat is the absolute best. Great energy, wonderful instruction, and much appreciated adjustments. My practice has substantially improved as a result (I’ve been going to Kat’s classes for about a year)

classes.description: A 60 minute version of the Hot 90. It is the same series of postures; however, some postures will be done only once and the class will flow more quickly between postures in order to keep the time. The 90 minute serves as a better introduction to the Hot Series as there is more time with the series, however this class is open to all students of any level.
classes.name: Hot 60

classes.description: A 90 minute class which offers a consistent series of postures and two breathing exercises in a room heated to 105 degrees. There are two sets of each posture with savasanas in between.
classes.name: Hot 90

classes.description: Earth Ways Yoga is a system of yoga rooted in three layers of traditional wisdom: Yoga, 5 Element Philosophy, and Nature.By including the wisdom of the natural world into the practice, this yoga offers you a chance to unite all parts of your body in deeper balance. Balance is cultivated through authentic alignment between the physical, emotional, and energetic parts of your body and the relationship of the natural world around you.Set in a 90-degree room, this slow-moving yet powerful style of yoga invites focused attention on the sound of breath as a gateway to build a deeper relationship with yourself and with the meridian lines and points that work within you. Working in this intentional way creates strengthened alignment to your rootedness and how you walk in your body on this earth.
classes.name: Earth Ways 75

description: Whether you are a beginner or an elite athlete, The Rush indoor cycling studio provides the local community with the most efficient cardio workout while maintaining a premium level of quality, intimacy and convenience. Rush is rhythm based cycling where we ride to the beat of the music, with dim lights, loud music, and best instructors in town!

featured_reviews.review: Great class but bring your own towel because their’s are like sand paper.

classes.description: Experience a party on a bike as their rockstar instructors lead you through an addictive full body workout complete with arm moves, fast legwork and in and out of the saddle routines that are expertly synced to the beat of the music.
classes.name: Rush Ride

classes.description: Intervals - Watts - Stats - Races! Focus of this class is the science behind the movement and understanding the why and the how of your ride.
classes.name: RUSH ROAD RIDE

description:
The Pure Barre technique is low-impact, protecting your joints by avoiding any bouncing or jumping. Each strength section of the workout is followed by a stretching section in order to create long, lean muscles without bulk. The technique works to defy gravity by tapering everything in and lifting it up!

 New clients should arrive 15 minutes early. Please be aware there is no late entry and doors will lock at the start of class. Socks are required! Grip socks are highly encouraged!

featured_reviews.review: Always love Sway's classes. She is so energetic, positive, and corrects your form. Super helpful for beginners if you aren't used to correct form yet but her class is definitely challenging/advanced for those looking for an incredible workout

classes.description: Inspired by resistance training. Perfected by Pure Barre. Pure Reform is a total body workout that targets, shapes, and defines all major muscle groups through resistance-based strength training. The 50-minute class merges the elements you love from our Pure Barre technique with moves that challenge your strength, coordination and balance by using resistance bands, sliders, and the barre.
classes.name: Pure Reform (50 Mins)

classes.description: The Original. Rooted in our classic technique, Pure Barre is the fastest, most effective full-body workout. You’ll be guided through a series low-impact, high intensity movements that are designed to strengthen and tone your body in ways that no other technique can. Give us 50 minutes and we’ll give you the best of barre - long and lean muscle tone without the bulk.
classes.name: Pure Barre (50 Mins)

description: The Fitwall program is a full body workout designed to fulfill all of your fitness needs. Every workout is a blend of strength, cardio and flexibility training. Each day of the week is a different workout delivering a well rounded program. We use technology to inspire, guide, monitor and track progress. We utilize our piece of equipment, the Fitwall, along with bodyweight drills, dumbbells, resistance bands and other tools to offer an effective, comprehensive, safe and fun workout. Every workout has a specifically curated custom music mix designed to push you further than you could go alone. All of our workouts are 40 minutes long. It's the perfect amount of time for an efficient, effective workout that fits into your day.

featured_reviews.review: My first time here and I was nervous but I had so much fun in this class. It was manageable yet still challenging. Cassie was a great instructor and when I arrive they gave me a great introduction to the class showing the different poses and moves

classes.description: The first 66% of this workout focuses on slower and bigger movements to build a big base of strength for their clients. Strength is what allows you to do more things in life and keeps you healthy and build muscle which is responsible for burning fat and keeping you lean. The final 33% of the workout are short, high-intensity efforts mixed with rest. The high intensity sprints are very effective at promoting afterburn (fat burning for up to 72 hours post workout).
classes.name: Durability

description: Yoga Loft is a place where you can nourish your body and spirit while enjoying the uplifting elements of your favorite yoga classes.

featured_reviews.review: I went into class feeling very tight and sore in my mid and low back and could not have walked out feeling any better. Reached a deep meditative state from the instructors mindfulness imagery and the mellow floor routine. Loved this practice!

classes.description: Open to practitioners of all levels and abilities, these classes are the perfect opportunity to meet your practice exactly where it is...and grow! The instructors tailor each class to fit the students in the room, while providing plenty of opportunity for students to find their “edge.” This yoga class combines classical yoga teachings, healthy alignment and breathing techniques that calm the mind and open the heart while providing a physical practice that strengthens the body and promotes overall flexibility.
classes.name: All Levels Vinyasa

classes.description:
Avita Yoga uses shapes and movements to identify restrictions impeding the body’s natural potential for freedom of movement. It’s a practice that brings more freedom and joy to your life so you can enjoy all the other things you love to do in your life.

While Avita is well designed for the newcomer, don't underestimate the slower pace of the class as being "too easy." Restrictions and limitations are resolved in a manner that are adaptable to each student. Avita is sometimes passive, sometimes active and sometimes quite demanding. It’s a practice that accesses the deep healing power of the mind, putting the focus on you and your process..
classes.name: Avita Yoga

classes.description: This class uses the more passive nature of yoga. Each posture is enjoyed for a longer time (typically 3 to 5 minutes) in a nourishing and supportive manner. With breath as guide, Yin Yoga takes the practitioner deeper in to the body's connective tissue where it can be unwound and released. This practice is appropriate for all levels and is designed to help you slow down and soften.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

description: Every detail of FLY Kickbox is designed to maximize your workout. You will be led through an active warm-up, punching & kicking combinations on a heavy bags, kickboxing techniques, core work and a cool down. Each class is unique so your body is always challenged. Cutting-edge sensor technology wrapping the bags allows you to know how your body is performing by tracking your punches and kicks! Workouts are set to upbeat music in a friendly and engaging environment that will have you hooked in no time!

featured_reviews.review: GREAT workout. More cardio and arms, which I appreciated since most any other workout class is legs. The bags have some sort of monitor that measures your progress so you can see how much effort you put into the bag - pretty neat. Also, Bri was good at teaching form and has a great playlist.

classes.description: No kicks....Let's BOX!
classes.name: Boxing

description: Whole Body Studios offers Pilates Equipment, Pilates Mat, Barre, Yoga, and Personal Training Classes. They focus on very small classes and are geared towards working out the entire body!

featured_reviews.review: Great work out. Wish I could take all my barre classes here. targets every muscle group and my arms and booty are starting to show real changes since I've started taking barre classes like these at WBP. Wish they did more hands in adjustments though. Feel like I may have needed it.

classes.description: Whole Body Barre-All Levels classes are ideal for beginners and intermediate students. They're set to music and use Pilates, yoga and ballet exercises to strengthen and lengthen your body. The classes also often integrate light free weights, exercise balls, glider and/or resistance bands to strengthen the body and give you a full-body workout.
classes.name: Whole Body Barre- All Levels

classes.description: Yoga Sculpt is a fun whole body workout that strengthens and lengthens all major muscle groups. The sequence utilizes light weights to create resistance and intensity in familiar poses. Short bursts of cardio help to build endurance and maximize calories burned. If you want to improve your strength, energy, and flexibility with a single workout, sign up for a Yoga Sculpt class today!
classes.name: Whole Body Yoga - Sculpt

classes.description: The reformer provides finely tuned exercise resistance that allows one to work very precisely to develop good alignment, core strength and flexibility. By using body weight and resistance of the springs to push and pull the carriage, you will train a variety of body parts.
classes.name: Pilates Reformer/Tower Beginner

description: SPENGA combines three essential elements of fitness to create a great workout. This unique concept delivers cardiovascular, strength and flexibility training in every session. Through a combination of spin, strength and yoga each workout is designed to improve endurance, strength and flexibility.

featured_reviews.review: I loved this studio. They are so inviting, welcoming, upbeat, and helpful from the moment you walk in. The gym is clean, and state of the art. The class itself was a perfect mix of cardio, and strength, ending with a yoga cool down. Exceptional experience all around. This is the gym I would choose to purchase membership if I didn't use ClassPass.

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Yoga, Cycling, Strength Training
classes.description: SPENGA's signature 1-hour session that combines 20 minutes of heart-pumping spinning, 20 minutes of circuit-style strength training, and 20 minutes of revitalizing yoga.
classes.name: SPENGA

description: Endorphin is a community that embraces a lifestyle of challenging movement to continually improve mental and physical health with a wide variety of classes.

featured_reviews.review: Great class it was easy to follow along and I wasnt overwhelmed by tons of different stations and different exercises like most Hitt or Boot Camp classes. It was the perfect amount . Im glad this location added more classes besides cycling I will be back !!

classes.description: Great for all levels of fitness. This class is designed to increase your overall energy! Metabolic conditioning, or MetCon, helps build lean muscle and reduce body fat while also increasing endurance. MetCon training combines HIIT and strength exercises. We hit every muscle group so be ready for anything. This class uses everything from kettlebells, dumbbells, and slam balls to get you in your best shape.
classes.name: Metabolic Conditioning

description:
The team at Alchemy are leaders in the high-intensity fitness and yoga communities. Their core mission is to help people feel more alive. The Alchemy team has decades of experience training individuals and groups. Their founders are the people who brought you the Twin Cities' largest CrossFit business, along with Studio Managers from some of the Twin Cities' top yoga studios. 

Alchemy is a complete fitness program – customizable to anyone's fitness goals.

featured_reviews.review: This was my first time to Alchemy, and I loved it! Very welcoming and nice environment, and the class was as hard as you want it to be. Good for all levels. I’ll definitely be going back!

description: This is not your typical Pilates class. RTR Pilates' style of reformer Pilates classes will systematically and rhythmically take you through a choreographed 55-minute class routine designed to strengthen, lengthen and tone your mind and body. All Pilates classes use the Balanced Body Allegro II reformer. You will be challenged, you will be sore, you will become addicted. Your body needs the strengthening and your mind will love the lengthening.

featured_reviews.review: This was a great class. This was my first Pilates experience ever and the instructor and other class members were welcoming. Kristie explained each movement in detail and demoed the movements on the reformer, which was so helpful. Even though it is low impact, my muscles were fatigued and I was warned I will be sore tomorrow. Cant wait to try Pilates again!

classes.description: New to Pilates? Need a higher fitness level than our intro class? This class is for you. This 55-minute long Pilates class uses the Balanced Body Allegro II Reformer to teach proper alignment and the fundamentals of Pilates. We incorporate traditional Pilates principles with innovative strength training and cardio exercises to give you a total body workout that will strengthen and lengthen your muscles. This class focuses on the basics and is designed to leave you feeling refreshed while also helping to improve strength, flexibility and core stability.
classes.name: HH | Level 1/2 | Pilates Class

classes.description: New to Pilates? Need a gentler workout? This class is for you. This 55-minute long Performance Pilates class uses the Balanced Body Allegro II Reformer to teach proper alignment and the fundamentals of Pilates. We incorporate traditional Pilates principles with innovative strength training and cardio exercises to give you a total body workout that will strengthen and lengthen your muscles. This class focuses on the basics and is designed to leave you feeling refreshed while also helping to improve strength, flexibility and core stability.
classes.name: Level 1 | Pilates Class

classes.description: The Level 2/3 Pilates class is for clients looking to challenge themselves and work at their own pace. The instructor uses effective exercise techniques, offering modifications so that intermediate to advanced clients can work at their own skill level for a tailored workout that is individualized to their needs. This is a great transitional class that is sure to give you a tough workout. If you are ready to push yourself, try this class to sculpt your body, develop strength, and improve your posture.
classes.name: Level 2 | Pilates Class

description: HOMe Yoga Studio offers a variety of yoga classes and workshops, to which everyone is welcome. The goal of this studio is to provide a safe, inclusive and intentional community space where you can begin, continue and expand your yoga and meditation practices. The teachers here value attention to safe and supportive alignment, modifications and adjustments so that every student is able to cultivate the most effective practice for their own body. The staff at hOMe Yoga Studio are honored and thrilled to support you on your journey to a deeper understanding of the mind-body-spirit connection.

featured_reviews.review: Kelli is so fantastic, she has the best attitude and will open class with a funny story that has a lesson or moment of truth behind it. She’s very encouraging of the class, and offers minor adjustments. The live music was really fun to practice to today! Performed by her husband and his music partner. Great lunch break on a Friday!

classes.description: Core Flow yoga is a dynamic, challenging class that works the entire body and specifically targets the core area from the abs through the thighs. You'll practice long holds, fast flow, inversions, arm balances, and you'll train your core muscles (not just the abdominals but the whole core system!) to strengthen and stretch. Each class will be different, come play & explore!
classes.name: Core Flow

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: Not a terribly challenging class but at 6am, a good way to start Friday. It built up nicely though and was pretty satisfying. Considering the small class, I would think the instructor could give some more personalized instruction.

classes.description: Align and Flow is a potent alignment-oriented practice that emphasizes the forms and actions within yoga postures. Classes progressively and safely sequence towards more complex peak poses, and spend time breaking down techniques for honing awareness and skill on and off the mat. This practice emphasizes cultivating adhikara (devoted studentship) and draws upon a wide range of postures that build strength, flexibility, and highly-refined awareness in body and mind. Align & Flow classes labeled “1-2” emphasize developing keen muscular control and perception. They focus on teaching biomechanical actions that lead to greater opening and expanded possibilities in the body. These classes are exceptional places for anyone seeking to develop safe and strong yoga foundations.
classes.name: Align and Flow Level 1-2

classes.description:
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Their diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism.
 
Vinyasa classes labeled “2” explore complex movements including classic arm balances layered over solid foundations. These classes begin to encourage practitioners to explore getting upside-down, may incorporate more intense breathing practices, and incorporate deeper backbends, hip opening, twists, and forward folds. We recommend that students seeking to take these classes feel confident, safe, and strong throughout classic sun salutations.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 2

classes.description: The Kindness Signature Series is a comprehensive set of fundamental yoga postures specifically designed to strengthen, heal, and transform. The Series was originally taught under the name Kindness Hot Yoga in rooms heated to about 90 degrees. This version is identical to Kindness Hot in terms of postures and alignment, but is practiced in rooms heated to a comfortable 75 degrees. It allows students who prefer a more moderate environment to still receive the benefits of the Series' detoxifying mixture of strengthening, lengthening and balancing poses. This practice is truly all-levels: challenging, relaxing, and beneficial for beginners and advanced practitioners alike
classes.name: Signature Series

classes.description: A cooling, patient, and deeply intense practice, Yin is a perfect complement to dynamic and muscular styles popular in America today. Yin stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of postures through long holds (between one and ten minutes). By emphasizing actions of ligaments, bones, and joints rather than muscles, these classes encourage an entirely different sort of openness from more active and movement-oriented practices. Suitable for all levels, Yin promotes a sense of slow, deep unwinding and release.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

classes.description:
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Their diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism.
Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice, including weight-bearing on wrists and arms, fluid transitions between postures, and muscular movements linked to inhales and exhales. Beneficial for all practitioners, these classes teach important foundations while leaving space for more advanced practitioners to play.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2

description: Endorphin is a community that embraces a lifestyle of challenging movement to continually improve mental and physical health with a wide variety of classes.

featured_reviews.review: Ive taken this class with Megan a few times. This last one was one of the best yoga classes Ive taken. Im really glad she didnt do any core repeats, I think doing those takes away from yoga being yoga and its flow. This is a fairly challenging class which is right up in my alley. Fair warning, Id call this class Candlelight Power Vinyasa Level 2, Warm. Get ready for a solid flow!

classes.description: This 60-minute class is designed to tone and sculpt the entire body with ballet, Pilates and yoga-inspired movements. Small isometric movements will bring your muscles to the point of fatigue while larger, high energy/low impact movements will increase your cardiovascular endurance. Free weight exercises will be used to target the major muscle groups of the upper body and deep, isometric stretches are done after each exercise to create long, lean muscles. Barre 360 is a fun and challenging total body workout that will leave you feeling stronger both body and mind. Don't forget to bring a mat!
classes.name: Barre 360

classes.description: Sculpt and tone legs, glutes, core, and even arms using traditional ballet barre exercises with an extra burn! Barre, resistance bands, dumbells, and pilates balls may be used in combination to give you the best high intensity barre workout possible! Set to energetic music, be ready to sweat and have fun! Don't forget to bring a yoga mat!
classes.name: Barre

classes.description: A vinyasa flow in the gentleness of candlelight encourages you to soften your gaze on the outside world and use your inner eye. Your focus turns inward to guide you in your practice, bringing a deeper awareness of your body. In this busy world of technology and vast visual stimulation, the quiet light invites you to rely less on what you see and more on what you hear as your internal gaze listens to your body. Let your intuition guide you as you flow with grace through asana - strength, balance and flexibility.
classes.name: Candlelight Vinyasa

description: Tru Fit offer classes for all fitness levels. Check them out!

featured_reviews.review: The gym is large and well equipped - al the free weights and machines you could need along with kettle bells, TRX, heavy ropes, medicine balls, and climbing wall. The ladies locker room has a steam room (love!) A little tricky to find from the street but actually found parking easily.

classes.description: In the mood for some solo time on the treadmill, elliptical, or weight machines? Reserve one hour of open gym time!
classes.name: Gym Time

classes.description: Mat session
classes.name: Pilates

description:
The Pure Barre technique is low-impact, protecting your joints by avoiding any bouncing or jumping. Each strength section of the workout is followed by a stretching section in order to create long, lean muscles without bulk. The technique works to defy gravity by tapering everything in and lifting it up!

New clients should arrive 15 minutes early. Please be aware there is no late entry and doors will lock at the start of class. Socks are required! Grip socks are highly encouraged!

featured_reviews.review: This is my first class with Emily. She was awesome! Ive seen her a lot at the studios and I always wondered what time she teaches and I finally got an opportunity to take one of her classes and it was definitely challenging but very well paced and she gave great corrections to form

classes.description: Inspired by resistance training. Perfected by Pure Barre. Pure Reform is a total body workout that targets, shapes, and defines all major muscle groups through resistance-based strength training. The 50-minute class merges the elements you love from our Pure Barre technique with moves that challenge your strength, coordination and balance by using resistance bands, sliders, and the barre.
classes.name: Pure Reform (50 Mins)

classes.description: The Original. Rooted in our classic technique, Pure Barre is the fastest, most effective full-body workout. You’ll be guided through a series low-impact, high intensity movements that are designed to strengthen and tone your body in ways that no other technique can. Give us 50 minutes and we’ll give you the best of barre - long and lean muscle tone without the bulk.
classes.name: Pure Barre (50 Mins)

description:
What is Glow Facial Bar? It’s a simple concept really—everyone deserves beautiful skin. Glow Facial Bar believes spa quality facials should be available at a fair price, and convenient enough to fit into the busiest of schedules. All you need is 30 minutes, and you’re glowing. Can it get any better? They don’t think so. So, go ahead…

Let yourself Glow.

featured_reviews.review: Christine made my first facial experience enjoyable. She went above & beyond to teach me about my skin & how to keep it looking great. Please dont forget to tip, as its not included. Ill definitely be back for more!

classes.description: Choose from 6 different 30-minute​ facials catered towards your skin's needs.
classes.name: Signature Express Facial

classes.description:
O2 facial
A breath of fresh air for your skin. Designed to infuse your skin with oxygen and brightening botanicals.

4 Layer Lift 
De-tox, renew and perfect your skin,  layer by layer.
classes.name: O2 Facial or 4 Layer Lift

classes.description:
The Remedy
A Corrective peel that makes all your wrongs, right! Specially formulated to target deep issues.
classes.name: Dermaplane or Microderm

description:
Shift Cycle is on a mission to MAKE SHIFT HAPPEN. Using a stationary bike and a dimly lit room as their vehicle for change, Shift instructors lead riders through a 45-minute beat-based, full-body cycling journey. Using high intensity intervals along with specialized choreography and hand weights, riders leave feeling strengthened, toned, and powerful AF. 

Childcare is available for $6 per child per class [please sign up on our website before bringing a child].

Clip-in cycling shoes are required- bring your own (LOOK Delta & SPD) or rent for $2 from the studio. New riders should arrive 15 minutes before class for bike setup and instruction.

NEW UPDATE: You will be asked to pick a bike before you head into the bike room. Make sure to ask the front which bikes are available.

featured_reviews.review: Danny was AWESOME and super encouraging. The class was hard and the music was great! Danny will be the reason I return. Only issue was out of his control: The mic was really hard to hear and made transitions difficult!

class.name: Pop Battles Wk 3: Winner vs. Christina

classes.description: Shift Cycle's 45-minute high intensity, low impact rhythm-based indoor cycling class incorporates exercises & weights to target the upper body and core, while torching calories with interval-based cardio.
classes.name: Full-Body Shift - Sunny
Pop Battles Wk 3: Winner vs. Christina

class.name: Pop Battles Wk 3: Winner vs. Christina

description: Arvada's one and only pole fitness studio, offering pole technique, aerial hoop, sculpt, sexy flow, floor work!

featured_reviews.review: Grace is a very talented aerialist & substitute teacher! Loved getting to learn some different tricks from her. Only thing I would say is that her class was a little more advanced than an Intro class. If this was my first ever Lyra class I would have been kinda lost/ intimidated. But it wasnt so I had a lot of fun!

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Strength Training, Dance
classes.description: Feel the burn in this slow, sexy class. You will use own body weight to sculpt and tone legs, booty, arms and LOTS of abs! Bring on the soreness all while bringing out your sensual side.
classes.name: Sexy Sculpt & Tone co-ed

classes.description: For beginner to advanced dancers and movers. This is a jazz and sexy burlesque dance and fitness class. It will occasionally combine floor work, pole, and chair choreography to bring out the rockstar in you! This class will begin with a dance style warm-up and follow with across the floor technique. Learn a Burleque Jazz dance routine that you will master, and have a great sweaty time! This class will break down technique and stage presence as well as give you a great workout. Taught be Hard Candy Dance choreographer Marquette.
classes.name: Rockstar Burlesque co-ed

classes.description: This is where the addiction begins! Class starts off with a sexy warmup then off to the poles! You will learn the basics of pole dance, including spins, basic floorwork, and proper engagement. Please no lotion or jewelry, heels optional!
classes.name: Pole level 1 (Intro) coed

classes.description:
This class is for all levels. Combining styles of Hiphop, Burlesque, and some booty shaking. Come check out why this is a sold out class that Marquette travels to teach around the US. Not your Mother’s workout and I guarantee you will be pouring sweat by the end of it. Marquette has won awards and accolades for her signature dance and fitness class “TwerkShop”. This class is a half hour workout and half hour dance class guaranteed to work you out. All levels are welcome. Bring your A game! We get low and dirty and will also work on Marquette’s brand of “Twerknique”. Get ready to sweat and bring water.

*Knee pads recommended
*Sneakers
classes.name: TwerkShop co-ed

description: Yoga Pod is here to help you build your physical skills, challenge you along the way, and achieve a greater sense of presence. Our classes are built for all levels, from beginner to advanced, and will guide you to a greater state of health, well-being, and connection. Each class will allow you to increase your body awareness, flexibility, and strength all while decreasing stress and providing a platform for personal growth. Everyone is unique, and your experience will be too. We recommend that you try all of our styles to experience the breadth of our offerings. Importantly, we are here to help guide you.  As we too were once in your shoes, both as a brand new student and an avid practitioner, we are here to guide you during your yoga and fitness journey.

featured_reviews.review: Loved this class ! Great workout for getting toned muscles while leaving without feeling too depleted. Definitely will be going again! Lindsey is a great upbeat instructor who is very attentive to the class. I felt like my form was being watched while I was still praised when I had it right!

classes.description:
podFLOW 2 classes, set to music, are dynamic and accessible, offering more challenging postures and variations based on the fundamentals of the podFLOW 1 classes. Teachers bring their own creative element to podFLOW 2, resulting in diverse and inspiring classes. Each class focuses on proper alignment techniques and safe and intelligent sequencing progressions.
podFLOW 2 is designed to encourage sweat and detoxification, as well as reduce stress. The room temperature is maintained at 80 degrees.
classes.name: podFLOW 2

classes.description: This energetic vinyasa class is suitable for all levels of practitioner. Modifications will be offered for beginner level students while more advanced students can also expect a good challenge. Classes are diverse, as the specific teacher will bring their own creative element, and each class focuses on proper alignment techniques and safe and intelligent sequencing progressions. Some previous yoga experience is suggested. Classes are 60 minutes long.
classes.name: podFLOW All Levels

classes.description:
This class is a set series of postures practiced in a room with added heat of 105 degrees and 60% humidity designed to build strength, balance, flexibility and promote a detoxifying sweat. The class includes breathing exercises, a standing series and a floor series.
Classes are set to music and are suitable for all levels. A towel is a must and water is recommended. Please come to class well hydrated.
classes.name: podHOT

classes.description: Yin yoga poses focus on applying moderate stress to the connective tissues of the body (tendons, fascia, and ligaments) with the aim of increasing circulation in the joints and improving flexibility. New depths in postures, deeper ranges of motion and an increased flow of energy can be achievable by focusing on these deeper tissues of the body. This is why so many students are finding Yin Yoga to be the perfect compliment and balance to their more active, yang practices.Our Yin classes are dimly lit, sometimes with candles, and soft music playing. Longer holds can be expected, on the floor, supported with props and blankets.
classes.name: Candlelight YIN

description:
Please show up at least 10 minutes prior to class. Most CorePower Yoga studios will close the doors at the start of class because the instructors who check users in must teach, so you may risk getting locked out.

Ready to sweat? CorePower Yoga’s unique and physically challenging styles of yoga combine heat, music, movement, breath and community to create a one-of-a-kind workout.

featured_reviews.review: Good flow -- a little hard to hear some directions at times but it's a big room so I think it was mostly just an acoustics issue.

classes.description:
When muscle meets yoga, Yoga Sculpt is born. Boost metabolism and build lean muscle mass as you move to upbeat tracks. You’ll combine free weights with CorePower Yoga 2 sequencing and cardio to intensify each yoga pose while mixing in strength-training moves like squats, lunges and bicep curls. See it in Action (https://vimeo.com/139247672).

What to Bring: A bottle of water, a towel and a yoga mat. Weights will be provided.

*Humidity may be added in dry climate regions

92-95 Degrees
No Added Humidity*
Yoga Experience a Plus
classes.name: YS - Yoga Sculpt

classes.description:
Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your yoga practice like never before. See it in Action (https://vimeo.com/139247673).

95-98 Degrees
Added Humidity
Yoga Experience a Plus
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2

classes.description:
Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your yoga practice like never before. See it in Action (https://vimeo.com/139247673).

95-98 Degrees
Added Humidity
Yoga Experience a Plus

This class is practiced in candlelight.
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2: Candlelight

description: Artistic Body Development is the home of Myopatterning,™ a Pilates-based system designed to increase strength and flexibility while reducing risk of injury.

featured_reviews.review: Excellent technique, and allows plenty of time to really sink in to your stretches. The machines are rudimentary but you can tell Michaels been around the block and knows what hes doing. A little bit of an older crowd, I was the youngest in there by probably 25-30 years. The pace is much slower but its very restorative and relaxing. Its a great class for aligning your spine, improving your micro muscles, and recovery.

classes.description: Myopatterning is a 90 minute class, using the Pilates Reformer exercise apparatus, you will: stretch and strengthen your entire body, improve your posture, work on your individual muscular problems, and focus on stress relief.
classes.name: Myopatterning

description:
Barre3 is a full-body workout designed with our signature approach of sustained holds, micro-movements, and cardio bursts that will leave you feeling balanced in body and empowered from within.

The studio space is beautifully appointed and located in the Central Park shopping center. There is ample parking, cubbies & lockers and in-studio retail boutique. A unique service we offer is Play Lounge -- we watch your kiddos while you work out (call the studio to or use your MindBody app reserve space for your kiddos)!

You'll be greeted by our front desk team to sign-in and fill out a waiver during your first visit. 
 
Workout barefoot or with grippy socks. Wear yoga like apparel and bring a reusable water bottle. See you soon!

featured_reviews.review: Janice is a truly fabulous instructor and this class was top notch. I would highly recommend to anyone hoping to get stronger in a fun and encouraging atmosphere!

classes.description: Barre3 is a full-body mindful workout that delivers remarkable results from the inside out. You’ll be guided through sustained holds, muscle-burning micro-movements, and heart-pumping cardio bursts. The barre3 signature approach will leave you feeling balanced in body and empowered from within.
classes.name: Barre3

description: On any given day, you will find various fusion and upbeat classes from Hip Hop, Jazz, Ballet, to Contemporary and Tap to fulfill your dance fix!

featured_reviews.review: Teacher was really kind considering my inability to execute many of the moves. Be prepared to feel silly if you have no prior training, but I know improvements will come with more classes.

classes.description: Need to work on your dance technique ? Try ballet as a cross training strategy to enhance your athletic performance in any sport and all dance genres! Ballet training provides the body with the force needed to make quick directional changes. It increases your body control, speed and flexibility. Attending ballet classes regularly will give you the results in performance you are looking for. Taught by d2b instructors who know first hand how intense ballet moves are on the body. Come learn, move and live the World of Ballet with her on Mondays at 5:30pm.
classes.name: Basic Ballet (Beginner)

classes.description: Come learn how to explore contemporary dance and how this beautiful fusion of modern, jazz and ballet creates movement that is organic, interpretative and fluid. Phannie's style is pedestrian and creative that she will turn you into a lovely mover at the end of this beginner class.
classes.name: Contemporary 101 (Beginner)

description:
Please show up at least 10 minutes prior to class. Most CorePower Yoga studios will close the doors at the start of class because the instructors who check users in must teach, so you may risk getting locked out.

Ready to sweat? CorePower Yoga’s unique and physically challenging styles of yoga combine heat, music, movement, breath and community to create a one-of-a-kind workout.

featured_reviews.review: This class was fantastic!Itt really, really made me sweat, but also got me to go deeper into poses. Shauna did a good job breaking down poses while moving around the room. A touch of grapefruit oil was a lovely way to start the class too!

classes.description:
Turn stress into sweat. This signature class strengthens, balances and detoxifies your entire body and mind as you move through more challenging postures and connected breath. Set to an energizing playlist, you’ll power up your yoga practice like never before. See it in Action (https://vimeo.com/139247673).

95-98 Degrees
Added Humidity
Yoga Experience a Plus
classes.name: C2 - CorePower Yoga 2

classes.description: When muscle meets yoga, Sculpt is born. Boost metabolism and build lean muscle mass as you move to upbeat tracks. You’ll combine free weights with CorePower Yoga 2 (C2) sequencing and cardio to intensify each pose while mixing in strength-training moves like squats, lunges and bicep curls. It is recommended that you take at least one CorePower level 1 or 2 (C1 or C2) class before a Yoga Sculpt class.
classes.name: YS - Yoga Sculpt

classes.description:
A true blend of balance, core strengthening and flexibility, Hot Power Fusion combines the meditative, detoxifying qualities of hot yoga with the intensity of power yoga to help you deepen your yoga practice. Set to motivating music, you’ll focus on yoga postures that open the shoulders, hips and spine while strengthening your core and upper body.

What to Bring: A bottle of water, a towel and a yoga mat. Wear fitted workout clothes, ideally ones that wick away moisture.

100-103 Degrees
Added Humidity
Beginner Friendly

This class is practiced in candlelight.
classes.name: HPF - Hot Power Fusion: Candlelight

description: Firehaus Pilates is warm and welcoming to everyone interested in Pilates. We have a wide variety of classes to accommodate any fitness level.  We offer small group classes, semi-private sessions and private sessions.

featured_reviews.review: I was lucky enough to have a personal class and I really liked the instructor. I personally like when teachers let me know which muscles the movement is working because with exercises like Pilates ones you arent trying to use can compensate for the ones youre actually trying to work so I would have liked if she made that more clear. I also would have liked if she told me if was doing the moves correctly and if there was anything I needed to work on or help to correct my form, but overall a good experience in a nice, clean studio with a friendly instructor.

classes.description: This combo equipment class is designed for people who have previous Pilates experience. The class will utilize the Reformer, Tower & Chair for a challenging full body workout that will leave you feeling long and lean.
classes.name: Combo Equipment Pilates

classes.description: Our small group reformer class combines breath work and movement, with the foundation of Pilates, to give you a full body workout. The spring resistance of the reformer helps to lengthen, strengthen, and tone the entire body. This class uses different props and fun music to keep your body moving throughout your 55 minutes of work.
classes.name: Reformer Pilates

description:
The Pure Barre technique is low-impact, protecting your joints by avoiding any bouncing or jumping. Each strength section of the workout is followed by a stretching section in order to create long, lean muscles without bulk. The technique works to defy gravity by tapering everything in and lifting it up!

Please be aware classes start on time and clients should arrive 15 minutes early. Doors will lock at the start of class. Socks are required!

featured_reviews.review: I love coming to Brittanys class. I like that she gives hands on adjustments to make sure youre in the proper form. Sometimes its hard to tell and its helpful when she helps you.

classes.description: As long as you can hold a ballet barre, you can do Pure Barre. That’s not to say that it’s easy, your first class will likely feel challenging at times, but they encourage you to stick with it. Try your hardest and let loose and feel free to ask your instructor plenty of questions after class if you weren't clear on any of the moves.
classes.name: Pure Barre

classes.description: Pure Barre Platform is a fast-paced class designed to optimize cardiovascular results and increase total body strength. This heart-pumping class combines quick bursts of high intensity, yet low impact cardio work with periods of lower intensity muscle-sculpting movements. These 55 minutes of high energy, fun and intense interval training at the barre will help you burn calories, jumpstart your metabolism, and increase your overall endurance.
classes.name: Pure Barre

description:
We provide the container for transformation. Without mirrors, our heated classes leave you feeling open, invigorated, strong, and like you belong. Inspired by Baron Baptiste’s style of Power Vinyasa Yoga we empower you to shine your light from the inside out in our local Lakewood Yoga Studio.
We love sharing yoga with students of all ages and ability levels!

featured_reviews.review: Was pleasantly surprised at how great a class this was for only 3 credits! (You see that & think it will be sub-par.) Class was a solid hour of power vinyasa flow in an 85 degree room- just to my liking. The room was fully booked w/ all 15 spots on the floor taken, so sign up early!

classes.description: A fun and empowering class to invite you to safely move and stretch beyond what you though was possible with hands on assists. Connect breath to movement with this dynamic sequence of postures inspired by Baron Baptiste's "Journey into Power" sequence. Performed in a precise order designed to stimulate your mind and body while improving strength, flexibility, and overall vitality. This heated class is energizing, fun, and inspirational. You will tap into your deepest potential and push the limits of what is possible. The room is heated to 85 degrees.
classes.name: Empowering Flow (ALL LEVELS)

classes.description: A fun and energizing class to invite you to safely and slowly move and stretch beyond what you thought was possible. Each instructor brings their unique voice and experience to the Baptiste Yoga- Journey into Power Sequence to move you in a powerful way, leaving you sweaty and inspired! This class is heated to 85 degrees. Please register for your class online or plan to arrive 15 minutes early to register at the front desk and get yourself ready to move.
classes.name: Empowering Slow Flow (ALL LEVELS)

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: I love Elissa so much! Her voice is like butter and she’s so kind and talented. I love how she explains which meridian lines are being activated and how yin benefits the body and mind. I always feel super relaxed and rejuvenated after her classes!

classes.description:
VINYASA
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Their diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build strength, aid balance and weight loss, while reducing stress and increasing vitality.
LEVEL 1-2
Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2
