classes.description: Restorative Yoga is a floor-based practice of sthira (steadiness) and sukha (ease). It features sustained postures supported by props to facilitate relaxation and release. This form of yoga aims to activate the parasympathetic nervous system, which supports immune function, stress relief, and balanced regulation of all bodily functions. This practice is preventative and healing, as well as an ideal complement to more fiery yoga practices. It is also perfect for those experiencing anxiety, depression, insomnia, fatigue, and digestive issues.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. At Kindness Yoga, the Steady Vinyasa class format emphasizes deep inner awareness, via a slow to moderate pace and the inclusion of subtle energetic awareness practices. These classes are less about flowing through many poses, and more about creating a sense of flowing energy and intention. In addition to posture practice, these classes may include guided visualizations, pranayama (breathwork), mantra, mudra, bandhas, and philosophical / metaphysical teachings. Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism. Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice, including weight-bearing on wrists and arms, fluid transitions between postures, and muscular movements linked to inhales and exhales. In addition, the Steady Vinyasa format may introduce and explain foundational energetic practices. Beneficial for all practitioners, these classes teach important foundations while leaving space for more advanced practitioners to play.
classes.name: Steady Vinyasa Level 1-2

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. At Kindness Yoga, the Steady Vinyasa class format emphasizes deep inner awareness, via a slow to moderate pace and the inclusion of subtle energetic awareness practices. These classes are less about flowing through many poses, and more about creating a sense of flowing energy and intention. In addition to posture practice, these classes may include guided visualizations, pranayama (breathwork), mantra, mudra, bandhas, and philosophical / metaphysical teachings. Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism. Vinyasa classes labeled “2” explore complex movements including classic arm balances layered over solid foundations. These classes begin to encourage practitioners to explore getting upside-down, may incorporate more intense breathing practices, and incorporate deeper backbends, hip opening, twists, and forward folds. In addition, the Steady Vinyasa format may deepen and broaden your exposure to powerful energetic practices including breath retention. We recommend that students seeking to take these classes feel confident, safe, and strong throughout classic sun salutations.
classes.name: Steady Vinyasa Level 2

description:
Founded in 2008 by retired professional boxer Danny Campbell, TITLE Boxing Club Greenwood Village is a health club that packs a punch. Their explosive total body workouts include group boxing and kickboxing classes that help you burn up to 1,000 calories in just one hour.

Non-contact boxing and kickboxing classes are led by skilled trainers who will show you how to wrap your hands, work the heavy bag and master moves that will transform your body.

featured_reviews.review: Both owner (Jazz?) and instructor (didnt catch his name, my bad) were really helpful and clear with me from start to finish from sign in and wrap technique to form and sequencing moves. I was inspired by others skillz too.

classes.description: In this class professional trainers will teach you boxing techniques that strengthen your whole body, increase your endurance, build muscle and boost your confidence. Combined with cardio and toning exercises, this boxing workout produces unbelievable results.
classes.name: Boxing

description: The mama 'hood's mission is to help families find joy in their parenting journey through expert instruction and community. Core services include: award-winning expert breastfeeding support, family-centered yoga, playgroups, parent education and award-winning boutiques.

featured_reviews.review: For the instructor not being pregnant (nor ever), she knows exactly how to talk to and teach those of us at all stages! Great class both mentally and physically!

classes.description: This challenging yoga flow class is safe for prenatal students. This class is designed for experienced practitioners who are familiar with yoga poses and proper alignment. Level 2 classes have less discussion and more movement than Level 1 or All Level Prenatal Yoga classes. Modifications will be made for all stages of pregnancy. Be ready to sweat and flow!
classes.name: Prenatal Yoga Level 2 (prenatal)

description: Belly Bliss offers Prenatal Yoga &  Fitness, Mommy & Me Yoga, Toddler Yoga, Family Classes and much more.

featured_reviews.review: This instructor does a mom-centered class which means a very "real" workout for Mom. I was definitely challenged and when my baby cried Laurel walked around the class with her which she loved. Go Laurel!

classes.description: Fusion is a fun and unique class that combines Yoga, cardio, weight training, Pilates & Barre. This energetic and challenging class is great for sculpting, building strength, stamina, balance and flexibility throughout your pregnancy as well as postnatal for weight loss. Pre-crawlers are welcome in class.
classes.name: Fusion Sculpt

classes.description: A comprehensive Prenatal Yoga class focused on preparing women physically, mentally and emotionally for the beautiful process of childbirth and motherhood. This class will increase strength, physical and mental endurance, flexibility, breath and body awareness, while reducing fatigue and improving relaxation. Prenatal Yoga also helps reduce back pain and other common ailments associated with pregnancy such as nausea, tights hips, and heartburn.
classes.name: Belly Yoga

description: White Lotus' philosophy is one of empowered vulnerability. Their yoga offerings are cultivated to support and nourish Self. Nestled in Sloan's Lake, their space is warm and grounded so that you feel like you are coming home. Home to personalized, intimate yoga teaching where you feel safe to explore the different layers of self: mind, body and heart.

featured_reviews.review: Meredith is THE BEST! Im a classpass connoisseur, and she gives the best prompts, great flows, and has a great personality that will have you relaxed and happy with a few laughs throughout the class. Highly recommend!

classes.description: The word Vinyasa means "to place in a special way." This Yoga practice is specifically crafted by the teacher to include mindful breath, intentions, and both held and flowed postures. Expect to be appropriately challenged and cared for. All Levels.
classes.name: Strengthening Vinyasa

classes.description: Restorative yoga is a form of yoga that seeks to achieve physical, mental, and emotional relaxation with the aid of props. The use of props makes it easier for you to maintain balance while you are stimulating and relaxing your body.
classes.name: Evening Restore

description: Blush Studios is a locally owned barre studio in Littleton, CO. Blush provides you with an amazing full-body barre workout in a beautiful space!

featured_reviews.review: I routinely give high reviews for Blush Studios, but this review needs a 6th star! I can’t say enough about the workout Lindsay did last night and how AWESOME and ACCOMPLISHED I feel afterwards. Truly, many thanks to Lindsay for her well thought out sequence and for leading us all in a “wow!” class!

classes.description: Head to the barre for a combination of ballet, yoga and pilates moves in a fun-filled, upbeat workout! You will tone every muscle group using light weights and little movements followed by stretching to elongate your muscles.
classes.name: Blush Barre

description:
Fierce45® is Denver's Premiere High Intensity Pilates Studio that combines high-intensity, low impact and mindful movement for one of the most efficient workouts! At Fierce45, they have perfected the art of high-intensity-resistance-training to bring you the best full-body workout ever. Utilizing only one-of-a-kind resistance machines and body weight exercises, each session provides the most effective cardio, strength, and balance exercises possible. With heart-pumping music that matches your sky-high heart rate and your #FierceFam sweating next to you, your body and mind will drop into a meditation in no time. 

Fierce45 is not just a workout, it’s a movement!

featured_reviews.review: So much fun, this is exactly the kind of studio I’d been hoping to find - uplifting and positive atmosphere, not competitive and you can smile through the burn. Can’t wait to bring all of my friends here! Thank you Joy!

classes.description: Ready to sweat? This 45-minute full body workout will push your muscles to fatigue with low-impact and high-intensity movements. Using slow, continuous, constant motions, this class will work your mind and body in the best way.
classes.name: Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates

description: Joie de Vivre Pilates Studio of Denver CO, offers individual and small group Pilates instruction in an energetic and relaxing atmosphere that some have found to be life changing.

classes.description: Watson Method metabolic Pilates incorporates the latest understanding in endocrinology, fitness, strength and conditioning research. The Watson Method uses short intervals of exercise on the reformer/cadillac focused on weight bearing training and toning of large muscle groups to "turn on" fat burning hormones. Clients benefit from weight bearing springs which create longer leaner muscle mass. Open class is for all levels.
classes.name: Watson Method Refomer/Cadillac-All Levels

description:
Barre Forte Highlands Ranch/Littleton is locally owned and operated by one of Barre Forte's original female founders, Nadia Walker. Their talented, certified, and charismatic female instructors, aka Barre Tenders, are as passionate about fitness as they are about helping you look and feel you best! 

Barre Forte's is a community of women who know that fitness is so much more than a number, and that fit bodies come in different shapes, sizes, and abilities. Barre Forte invites you to our #barretribe to Meet Your Best! xo

featured_reviews.review: Sofia lead this class and she was fantastic! Her workout left every part of my body shaking and my mind screaming to quit (in a good way!). The facility was clean but a little cramped in the entry way.

classes.description: Our studio's signature class! A ballet inspired barre workout designed to trim, tighten, and tone your entire body, with an emphasis on defining your glutes, and legs. You'll use small, controlled movements and high repetition to develop a lengthened and graceful physique. This class is appropriate for all levels and abilities, as progressions and modifications are offered throughout class. Don't forget your barre socks! Full coverage socks must be worn during all classes at Barre Forte.
classes.name: Barre Forte

classes.activities: Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Strength Training, Barre
classes.description: Mini trampoline workouts meet Barre Forte with BAR(RE)BOUND™! Just 10 minutes of rebounding is equivalent to 30 minutes on the treadmill, but is low impact on the joints. Bar(re)bound incorporates a mix of rebounding segments and barre inspired exercises. Enjoy the benefits of burning 800-1000 calories per hour through rebounding, as well as the toning and tightening benefits of barre exercises. Get ready to change the game of cardio with Bar(re)bound! **Grippy socks are required to participate in BAR(RE)BOUND™ classes. We also highly recommend bringing a lidded water bottle and a towel.
classes.name: BAR(RE)BOUND

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with them, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. With high-performance custom bikes, amphitheater seating, enhanced lighting, concert-quality sound and two massive high-def flat screens, they set the scene for an immersive, exhilarating experience. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts and class rank. 

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: So amazing! Chanel is a wonderful motivator for all riders whether it’s your first class or you come everyday. A favorite class thus far... plus there was a nice after riding treat! ???? Thirsty Thursday

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description:
Barre Forte Highlands Ranch/Littleton is locally owned and operated by one of Barre Forte's original female founders, Nadia Walker. Their talented, certified, and charismatic female instructors, aka Barre Tenders, are as passionate about fitness as they are about helping you look and feel you best! 

Barre Forte's is a community of women who know that fitness is so much more than a number, and that fit bodies come in different shapes, sizes, and abilities. Barre Forte invites you to our #barretribe to Meet Your Best! xo

classes.description:
Our studio's signature class! A ballet inspired barre workout designed to trim, tighten, and tone your entire body, with an emphasis on defining your glutes, and legs. You'll use small, controlled movements and high repetition to develop a lengthened and graceful physique. This class is appropriate for all levels and abilities, as progressions and modifications are offered throughout class.
Don't forget your barre socks! Full coverage socks must be worn during all classes at Barre Forte. If this is your first class at our studio, please plan to arrive at least 10 minutes early to complete paperwork and to be oriented with the studio.
classes.name: Barre Forte

classes.description: An all levels welcome, core strengthening and dancer's flexibility class. In the first half of class, our instructor will lead you through a series of exercises to strengthen the core and warm up your muscles. The second half of class will focus on stretches for modified to advanced dancer's flexibility. Not just for prima ballerinas -All levels are welcome and can benefit from this class to strengthen your core and increase flexibility! Don't forget your barre socks! Full coverage socks must be worn for all classes at Barre Forte.
classes.name: Core & Flexibility (All Levels)

classes.description: Perform a warm-up to loosen and stretch your muscles before enjoying practice time on your current vertical repertoire with the assistance of a Vertical Instructor. Vertical 100 (at least 3 classes) is a prerequisite to Vertical Playground. We respectfully request that you not seek to learn or perform any new exercises that exceed the level of instruction you have received in other classes, or that you do not feel confident you can perform safely. Please request your Vertical Instructor "spot" you before performing inversions or advanced vertical exercises.
classes.name: Vertical Playground (All Levels)

description:
Fierce45® is Denver's Premiere High Intensity Pilates Studio that combines high-intensity, low impact and mindful movement for one of the most efficient workouts! At Fierce45, they have perfected the art of high-intensity-resistance-training to bring you the best full-body workout ever. Utilizing only one-of-a-kind resistance machines and body weight exercises, each session provides the most effective cardio, strength, and balance exercises possible. With heart-pumping music that matches your sky-high heart rate and your #FierceFam sweating next to you, your body and mind will drop into a meditation in no time. 

Fierce45 is not just a workout, it’s a movement!

featured_reviews.review: This was my first class at this studio. I've heard nothing but raving reviews from my friends so I finally decided to give it a try. So glad I did.. Kellie was awesome at orienting me to the class structure and providing modifications when necessary. It was also a super hard Pilates class. I've been to many in Denver and this one just blew them away

classes.description: Ready to sweat? This 45-minute full body workout will push your muscles to fatigue with low-impact and high-intensity movements. Using slow, continuous, constant motions, this class will work your mind and body in the best way.
classes.name: Fierce Movement - High Intensity Pilates

description: Samadhi Center for Yoga is an urban sanctuary for anyone interested in moving out of suffering into health, happiness, andmore fully into present moment living. For well over a decade Samadhi has evolved into one of the most well respected yoga centers in Colorado. They pride ourselves on a team of experienced, knowledgeable, and authentic teachers. They have been honored with awards from 5280 Magazine, Denver’s A-List, and more, as Denver’s Top Yoga Studio.

featured_reviews.review: Great class! More of a workout than other classes I've taken at Samadhi which I appreciated, but also lots of pranayama and a few restorative poses too. Dylan is great at verbal adjustments and giving options throughout the practice. The entrance to the studio is in the back off of the big public parking lot.

classes.description: Nidra Fusion: Relax into a state of clarity and bliss. Yin and Restorative poses topped off with Yoga Nidra make this class a trio of rejuvenation for the body, mind and spirit.
classes.name: Nidra Fusion

classes.description: Literally translated from Sanskrit, Vinyasa means “connection.” Vinyasa Yoga synchronizes movement with breath which helps the practitioner develop a greater sense of self-awareness, balance, and harmony with themselves and their environment. Vinyasa classes typically include smoothly flowing movements between poses guided by the force of inhales and exhales. Each class is unique, but may include the many variations of Sun Salutations as well as standing postures, inversions, backbends, twists, forward bends, and deep relaxation.
classes.name: Vinyasa Flow

classes.description: Gentle vinyasa yoga is appropriate for students who enjoy and desire a slower paced yoga practice. These classes are designed to give detailed instruction and to be less physically challenging than other vinyasa classes. Gentle vinyasa yoga classes will allow the student to gain strength and flexibility at their own pace with safety and alignment as the main focus.
classes.name: Gentle Vinyasa Yoga

description:
Passion Force is a Yoga and Dance studio for adults to come play, sweat, relax and LET GO. We offer inspiring & energizing classes in the heart of Denver where you can reunite with your awesome self.

Our mission is to provide an encouraging environment where every BODY is welcome. This is a body positive, judgement-free zone where every level of student is welcomed with open arms. Bring friends and make new ones. Reconnect with passions and discover new ways to set your soul on fire. Join our Passion Force Family and allow this space to be your sanctuary from the hustle and bustle of busy life.

featured_reviews.review: This class is an interesting combination of contemporary dance routine mixed with yoga. I thought it was very fun and different, and I'll definitely go back! Katy is a fun and engaging instructor too :)

classes.description: Power Yoga is fantastic for yogis who'd like to add an athletic flair to their yoga flow. We'll tap into the power of Prana through breathing techniques and practice intermediate to advanced yoga postures. Build strength and endurance in this faster-paced class with groovy beats and empowering core work.
classes.name: Power Yoga

classes.description: Movement heals. Care for your mind/body/spirit in this all levels Vinyasa Yoga flow class. As we flow and move through asanas (poses), we will focus on riding the wave of our breath and finding what feels good. We will tune into the layers of self through setting intentions and exploring meditation & pranayama (breathing) techniques. You will leave feeling ready to tackle the week ahead!
classes.name: Feel Good Yoga Flow

classes.description: Express yourself and tell your story through movement. Contemporary dance is a fusion of ballet, jazz and modern techniques. You will play with storylines and intentions in this class that will warm up your body and unleash your heart.
classes.name: Contemporary/Lyrical

description: The Kindness Yoga studios were founded on a simple premise. By making yoga, mindfulness and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. They do things differently. Students can pay any amount they want to come to class. They embrace many styles of yoga and encourage our teachers to share their most unique offerings. Their spaces are anything but cookie-cutter: each one reflects the neighborhood it serves. The recipe works – after just a few years in business, they've been honored as Denver’s Best Yoga by the Denver A List in 2013 and 2014, and Top of the Town by 5280 Magazine in 2014.

featured_reviews.review: Loved Beth. I usually cant sit still in yoga and count down the minutes until I can run out in my head and this class not only calmed me down but moved my bad day all the way to a good day. So grateful for this class today.

classes.description:
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching and pranayama (breathwork). a diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism.

Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice, including weight-bearing on wrists and arms, fluid transitions between postures and muscular movements linked to inhales and exhales. Beneficial for all practitioners, these classes teach important foundations while leaving space for more advanced practitioners to play.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2

classes.description: Restorative Yoga is a floor-based practice of sthira (steadiness) and sukha (ease). It features sustained postures supported by props to facilitate relaxation and release. This form of yoga aims to activate the parasympathetic nervous system, which supports immune function, stress relief, and balanced regulation of all bodily functions. This practice is preventative and healing, as well as an ideal complement to more fiery yoga practices. It is also perfect for those experiencing anxiety, depression, insomnia, fatigue, and digestive issues.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

description: Gravity Aerial Arts offers recreational to professional aerial dance classes. Come learn how to climb, fly, spin and dance on aerial silks, hoops, ropes and trapezes! Have fun while building strength, flexibility and coordination! Gravity Aerial Arts is a continuation of the wonderful community that was Miraas Circus Arts!

featured_reviews.review: Megan was patient and kind as she guided me through my first fabric experience. Its definitely challenging and would take time to feel comfortable but Megan was very encouraging. I highly recommend this class for anyone his willing to try something new

classes.description: This class will teach you intermediate to advanced skills, sequences, drops, poses, climbs and descents on aerial fabric. This class will also help to build strength, flexibility, technique and style.
classes.name: Fabric Intermediate/Advanced

classes.description: Learn beginning skills, sequences, poses, mounts, dismounts and spins on aerial hoop/Lyra. This class will also help to build strength, flexibility, technique and style.
classes.name: Hoop/Lyra Beginning

classes.description: Learn intermediate skills, sequences, drops, poses, mounts, dismounts and spins on aerial hoop/Lyra. This class will also help to build strength, flexibility, technique and style.
classes.name: Hoop/Lyra Intermediate

description: Mudra Yoga Studio's mission is to make yoga accessible for anyone while also offering an opportunity for a deep, transformative experience.

featured_reviews.review: Oh my Kaitlin is such a delightful, warm, nourishing teacher. Her restorative was so incredibly nourishing and soothing to my nervous system. She’s so attentive and tucked me in after each pose. Dreammmmyyyyyy! Thank you Kaitlin!

classes.description: Candlelit Flow is similar to Mudra Yoga Studio's All Levels Flow classes. Enjoy a comfortably warm room, dim lights with candles and an opportunity to drop in. At Mudra Yoga Studio all of our flow classes use consistent and steady breathing to link a series of poses together in a fluid manner, encouraging the body to move as nature intended. Flow classes tone and strengthen the body while lengthening the muscle tissue to improve overall flexibility. Within the first few practice sessions you will feel strong and calm, more energized and alive, and in time you will awaken in a whole new body. As your practice deepens, you may notice that the physical changes are a by-product of a more empowering purpose. Perhaps you'll notice that lifelong fears start to dissipate, blocked emotions are released, the mind gets quiet and gains startling clarity, and you experience mental shifts that free you from old thought patterns. Candlelight Flow and Flow All classes are well-rounded and are appropriate to all levels of ability, from the beginner to the experienced yogi.
classes.name: Candlelight Flow- All Levels

classes.description: Kundalini yoga is a dynamic form of yoga that emphasizes breath and movement to produce dramatic results in physical and mental health. The practice of Kundalini yoga aligns the chakras, energizes the body, strengthens the immune system, and balances the glandular system. It is a holistic yoga system to treat the whole person by utilizing stretching, breathwork, exercise sets, mudra, mantra, meditation and relaxation. This class is appropriate for all levels of practitioner. Each class includes an exercise set, relaxation, and meditation.
classes.name: Kundalini

description: Flow Yoga offers heated classes in a friendly and encouraging environment. Their expert instructors will guide you through the practice with energetic music playing in the background to keep you motivated. Come connect with your inner self as you work on a healthier and happier lifestyle.

featured_reviews.review: I have taken many good classes at this studio, but I LOVED this class! The teacher had a great energy and a fun flow. She had plenty of core work built in, and I was grateful she didnt ruin the vibe of the class by making us stop to do sit-ups in the middle. Overall great class, great teacher.

classes.description: All levels are welcome to this heated yoga class that will flow through a traditional Vinyasa practice to energetic music. You'll be sure to detox, stretch and rejuvenate your body in just 60 minutes.
classes.name: Yoga Flow- All levels

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: I always enjoy this instructors class because he reminds us not to take ourselves so seriously and just stay in the moment rather than trying to force our bodies into a pose and compete with our neighbors.

classes.description: This restorative class will have you holding postures long for relaxation.
classes.name: Restorative / Yoga Nidra

classes.description:
VINYASA
Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork).
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2

classes.description:
YIN
Yin Yoga - a cooling, patient, and deeply intense practice - is a perfect complement to dynamic and muscular styles popular in America today. Yin stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of postures through long holds between one and ten minutes.
classes.name: Yin Yoga

description: Welcome to Denver's Local Yoga, Barre, & Aerial Fitness Studio! We are nestled right in the middle of RiNO, LoHi, Highlands and Sunnyside neighborhoods. Here at Atherial, our Flight Instructors will help you leave your comfort zone and embark on a mind-body journey. Our studio provides a safe environment for you to feel EMPOWERED, CONFIDENT, and PLAYFUL. Classes range from traditional Yoga mat classes to Aerial Yoga, Dance, Barre and Fitness classes. Atherial's community are people who are: Aerial Fitness Adventurous, Creatives-Movement Enthusiasts, seeking community of FUN. After class, take a seat, chat with our friendly community, enjoy a complimentary cup of tea! Or book a private party Aerial Yoga Class with us as we guarantee a party of FUN!

featured_reviews.review: What a fun and super hard take on a barre class! The studio is beautiful as well. This class works all muscles because you using your body weight all the time with the hammock. Reba was super helpful, enthusiastic and had good tunes! Definitely something to add to the workout rotation :)

venue_name: Atherial - Yoga, Barre and Aerial Fitness

classes.activities: Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Aerial, Barre
classes.description:
Aerial BarreFly
Take your barre fitness to the air! BarreFly is energetic, beat driven, and targets all your *important* body parts: upper body, thighs, seat, and abs. This class is your typical Barre class utilizing different equipment, the silk being one of them. Inversion therapy is integrated with the aerial silks, assisting deep stretches and true recovery. All levels welcome.
classes.name: Aerial BarreFly

description: StarCycle® is a 45 minute full-body workout and an energetic, inspirational and balanced cardio ride.

featured_reviews.review: Rene's class is fun but challenging! I was drenched in sweat after class! She's super encouraging and great playlist for morning ride!

classes.description: StarCycle is a unique indoor cycling experience utilizing music and choreography. Each StarCycle class is a 45 minute full-body workout and an energetic, inspirational and balanced cardio ride.
classes.name: STARCYCLE

description: PUSH GYM is a health and wellness studio, offering small group fitness,  personal training and Physical Therapy.  They specialize in safe and effective high intensity interval training (HIIT).

featured_reviews.review: I think this gym has a lot of positive attributes- small groups and you can tell the trainer knew each person very well. Its was a little chatty and slower paced than other classes in

classes.description: PUSH HIIT is just that, high intensity. This is their signature class that utilizes all of their equipment and space to create an ever changing high intensity circuit workout.
classes.name: PUSH-PULL HIIT Combo

description: Kindness Yoga was founded on a simple premise: by making yoga, mindfulness, and community accessible to everyone, they can help support the creation of a kinder, more responsible planet. Each location – from industrial urban spaces to serene mountain views – has its own vibe and is unique to the neighborhood it is nestled in. Kindness is honored to facilitate the transformation and growth of their students through affordable yoga, meditation, acupuncture, and self-care. Are you ready to experience the difference Kindness makes?

featured_reviews.review: Was perfect for what I needed that day. A whole lot of stretching to get my body back in alignment. Not flow and not crazy high exercise, but strong body work and getting twisty exactly where I needed it.

classes.description: Restorative Yoga is a floor-based practice of sthira (steadiness) and sukha (ease). It features sustained postures supported by props to facilitate relaxation and release. This form of yoga aims to activate the parasympathetic nervous system, which supports immune function, stress relief, and balanced regulation of all bodily functions. This practice is preventative and healing, as well as an ideal complement to more fiery yoga practices. It is also perfect for those experiencing anxiety, depression, insomnia, fatigue, and digestive issues.
classes.name: Restorative Yoga

classes.description: Vinyasa is a flowing, dynamic yoga practice that cultivates presence by connecting movement with breath. Most classes feature several elements of traditional Ashtanga yoga—including sun salutations, standing poses, preparation for arm balances, dynamic stretching, and pranayama (breathwork). Our diverse family of teachers creatively sequence these elements to reflect their unique personalities while building heat, exploring energy and fostering greater self-awareness. This practice will build your inner and outer strength, improve your balance, and reduce stress while increasing vitality and athleticism. Vinyasa classes labeled “1-2” take care to define and align the key components of traditional and modern Vinyasa practice, including weight-bearing on wrists and arms, fluid transitions between postures, and muscular movements linked to inhales and exhales. Beneficial for all practitioners, these classes teach important foundations while leaving space for more advanced practitioners to play.
classes.name: Vinyasa Level 1-2

classes.description: Align and Flow is a potent alignment-oriented practice that emphasizes the forms and actions within yoga postures. Classes progressively and safely sequence towards more complex peak poses, and spend time breaking down techniques for honing awareness and skill on and off the mat. This practice emphasizes cultivating adhikara (devoted studentship) and draws upon a wide range of postures that build strength, flexibility, and highly-refined awareness in body and mind. Align & Flow classes labeled “1-2” emphasize developing keen muscular control and perception. They focus on teaching biomechanical actions that lead to greater opening and expanded possibilities in the body. These classes are exceptional places for anyone seeking to develop safe and strong yoga foundations.
classes.name: Align and Flow Level 1-2

description: pH7 Pilates is a fully equipped, client-centered studio specializing in classical Pilates through private instruction and small group classes. pH7 has been helping clients build strength, reach their fitness goals and rehabilitate for over a decade.

featured_reviews.review: Awesome full body class by Amy! She got us moving in a variety of positions, offered modifications to those who needed it and I left feeling like a got a solid workout. The reformers arent my favorite and the leather ropes stick when doing certain exercises.

classes.description: Lengthen, stretch, and tone as you build or advance your Pilates practice. This class meets you where you are and challenges you to develop and perfect your technique. Exercises are classically sequenced and moderately paced with various contemporary twists thrown in.This is an all level class.
classes.name: All Level Reformer

classes.description: Enjoy the benefits and challenges of the chair. Like the reformer, the chair is a spring-loaded apparatus that adds resistance to movement. Many of the same exercises and sequences that are done on the reformer can also be done on the chair, allowing you to experience and connect with them differently. Anticipate a combination of sitting, standing and lying down on the chair as you sweat your way toward improved core stability and a stronger body overall. This is an all level class.
classes.name: All Level Chair

description: Power Mixx Fitness is powered by Lagree Fitness.  Lagree fitness is the most innovative full body workout that has gained popularity among celebrities, athletes, and those who want a cutting edge fitness method. It is one of the hottest and safest workouts in the fitness industry. This 45 minute core crunching, quad burning resistance exercises is performed on the patented Megaformer. You will strengthen, lengthen, and tone your body.  The Megaformer is only one of the many ways you will be able to transform yourself at PMF.  We also offer Barre Classes, Personal Training, and Private Megaformer sessions.

featured_reviews.review: Melissa is legit, yall! Such a great motivator and super nice lady. Wish I lived nearby but Im so glad I stopped in, killer workout!

classes.description: Power Mega is our signature 45 minute class.    Class is done on the amazing Megaformer. This enhanced Pilates class will lengthen, tone muscle, and torch body fat.
classes.name: Power Mega

description:
Vitruvian Fitness is one of the friendliest fitness communities you'll find in Denver.

Their Indoor Cycling will make you a better rider outside. Your heart and lungs will be burning, the music will be cranked and the energy will be off the charts. You’re going to sweat like you’re in a sauna and you’re most definitely going to crush your next ride outside. Focusing on true cycling skills and performance, they keep it real and if you’re looking for total-body strength and conditioning, they have other awesome classes dedicated to just that.

Functional X is like bootcamp but more fun and more goal oriented. It’s all about getting stronger as a team. Fast paced, high intensity, total body, always different and always fun!

TRX is all core. And chest, back, legs, butts, arms and more core.

featured_reviews.review: Well that was the most fun I've had in a spin class in a very long time! Christie has to be one of the best teachers I've ever had! Super sweet and spunky with tons of contagious energy. The class flew by and it was definitely very challenging but she made it so much fun and we went through so many different intervals that I feel like I got an amazing workout!

classes.description:
Functional X Class is a wildly fun group version of Vitruvian Fitness's functional personal training program. They utilize the same foundational movements and progression/regression guidelines as in the personal training. It's just a big fun group.

Unlike bodybuilding programs, functional exercises focus on improving and strengthening complex multi-joint movement patterns instead of isolating individual muscles just for the sake of making them bigger.

Our baseline goals are to move better and healthier, then get stronger and faster with greater endurance. Everything else is just icing on the cake!

Expect to use kettlebells, dumbbells, barbells, bands, sandbags, TRX, battle ropes, sleds, slideboards, rowing machines, bikes, plyo boxes, medicine balls, jump ropes, and whatever other fun and heavy stuff is lying around!

And you’ll have fun doing it.
classes.name: Functional X

classes.description:
Indoor Cycling at Vitruvian Fitness is designed to make you a better person and a better rider outside. For sure it’ll get your heart and lungs burning, the music will be cranked and the energy will be off the charts. You’re going to sweat like you’re in a sauna and you’re most definitely going to crush your next ride outside.

Their cycling program is tons of fun, just like riding bikes should be, but the classes focus exclusively on true cycling skills and performance. They keep it real and if you’re looking for total-body strength and conditioning, they have other awesome classes dedicated to just that.

When you ride with with Vitruvian, you’re going to get a stronger butt, stronger legs, stronger heart, and stronger lungs. And you’re going to get indomitable will and drive at no extra charge.

Come prepared to ride true to the way you ride outside – hills, speed work, intervals, pace lines, switchbacks, grinds, and good times.
classes.name: 60 Min Performance Cycling @ Vitruvian

description: Elixir Pilates & Wellness is a movement studio which offers classes based on the work of Joseph Pilates and a holistic approach to restoring balance, harmony & health.

featured_reviews.review: Level II is definitely a much harder class than Level I. Lots of great core work!

classes.description: This class is suitable for those who have a working knowledge of the fundamentals and can move through the exercises with flow. A moderate amount of strength and experience is recommended. Pilates Jumpboard exercises are combined with traditional reformer exercises.
classes.name: Pilates Level II

classes.description: This class is suitable for all levels from beginner to intermediate. Exercises will be modified to meet the needs of the individual.
classes.name: Pilates Level I & II

description:
Hydrate IV Bar is one of Colorado's premier IV therapy and hydration clinics. As a team of medical professionals, their mission is simple: to provide a comfortable, spa-like experience with services that enhance your healthy lifestyle. Their IV treatments and vitamin injections are an effective way to deliver essential fluids and nutrients directly into the bloodstream to help boost your overall wellness. 

Hydrate IV Bar is a premier ClassPass Wellness venue. See their class descriptions for more information on the services they provide.

featured_reviews.review: Super quick and painless. I didn’t get sick on my trip despite being on multiple airplanes last week and I’m crediting the b12 shot for at least some of that success!

classes.description: Administered as a subcutaneous injection which only takes a few seconds! Quick and painless but beneficial! Methylcobalamin B12 can improve cognitive function, improve concentration, enhance energy, boost endurance and elevate moods.
classes.name: B12 Injection

description: Simply put, AIR® is the best core workout in the world; an aerial fitness training program fusing elements of conditioning, Pilates, ballet and HIIT on aerial hammocks. Open to all levels.

featured_reviews.review: Loved this class! The perfect balance of Ariel silk basics with strength training moves and yogic stretch.... I’ve been to a number of ariel yoga and circus training classes!

classes.description: 50-minute beginner class that introduces new clients to aerial exercises on hammocks; the class emphasizes basic alignment, foundation, and specific muscle action so that the body can learn how to balance on aerial hammocks. AIR® is an intense aerial fitness training program fusing elements of conditioning, Pilates, ballet and HIIT (high intensity interval training) on aerial hammocks. Regardless of its beginner pace, AIR® Foundation will deliver a challenging workout. No experience necessary. We recommend new clients take 3-5 AIR® Foundation classes before graduating to AIR® All sales final. No shows and class cancellations made less than 2 hours before the scheduled class will either be charged $15 for unlimited packages or lose the class on a class pack. Class begins exactly on time so late-comers will not be permitted once class commences.
classes.name: AIR Foundation

classes.description: 30-minute ab blast using aerial hammocks. This class focuses on upper and lower abs, obliques, and lower back muscles. Using the hammock to support Pilates-inspired ab work allows for better form as well as functional movement to stretch and strengthen the core more efficiently. We advise AIR® Core for clients who are familiar with AIR® class formats and looking to take their workout to the next level. We recommend new clients taking at least 1 AIR® Foundation class before graduating to AIR® Core. All sales final. No shows and class cancellations made less than 2 hours before the scheduled class will either be charged $15 for unlimited packages or lose the class on a class pack. Class begins exactly on time so late-comers will not be permitted once class commences.
classes.name: AIR Core

description: A group exercise concept offering many different disciplines of fitness.  They strive to be the true definition of Cross training.

featured_reviews.review: Very clean and supportive gym. However It is a VERY HARD class. I thought it would be fun to try and after 10 minutes I told myself I would never do a tough mudder ever. But I think if your super active and wanting to challenge yourself you will love this class! Just not for me personally.

classes.description: Come get your sweat on at your leisure on your terms. Come lift, jump, use our TRX's, Heavybags, etc...
classes.name: Open Gym

classes.description: A full-body toning class that uses primarily free weights to improve muscular endurance and strength.
classes.name: Titanium Tone

description:
Epic Ryde offers functional indoor cycling & strength workouts for real life activities.
Epic is about empowering people of all fitness levels to create, reach, and exceed their fitness goals.  

Movement with a purpose! At Epic Ryde, we have a studio full of AWESOME indoor bikes and offer “real” cycling classes. The bikes provide a dynamic cycling experience, cutting edge technology and the ability for you to track your true power resulting in accurate readings on calories burned and effort levels during your workout.

We  also offer functional group fitness classes . All of our classes focus on functional movement and making you better at your day to day activities and helping you reach your fitness goals.

featured_reviews.review: Joe has great energy! More rhythm based compared to other instructors at epic ryde so if you like that type of spin def check it out

classes.description:
GUILTY PLEASURES is a 45 minute karaoke fueled endurance ryde structured around the science of your own heart beat. When you work out in that optimal aerobic zone, you could carry on a conversation, and if you can talk, you can SING! We begin by sinking into the body through our breath and travel your road through variety of positions on the bike. The goal is to maintain the edges of the aerobic zone where the foundation of your cardiovascular system strengthens and expands. We uncover the beauty and simplicity in the present moment, resonating sound and vibration through our cells as we sing along. We metabolize that sense of "feeling good" so you can take it with you off the bike out into the world.
Life's dark moments can leave us feeling voiceless, but here is a place where students can find their voice and speak through their fear. So drop by just as you are. Hold your head high, open your heart and let your light shine.
classes.name: Guilty Pleasures "Karaoke Fueled Ryde"

classes.description: Short on time? Express Ryde is a 45 minute class packed full of climbs, sprints, intervals and more. Perfect for those looking to get a great challenging workout in less than an hours time. This class is great for building endurance on the bike.
classes.name: Express Ryde

description: Pure Barre is a full-body workout that lifts your seat, tones your thighs, abs, and arms and burns fat in record-breaking time. Each 55-minute class works every muscle group to fatigue, then stretches them out to create long, lean physiques without bulk. Our method focuses on small, isometric movements that create a high intensity, low impact workout that delivers results fast!

featured_reviews.review: Class went by quickly, and moved through quite a few transitions, with stretching in between some major transitions. Challenging and positive. Amanda was an energetic instructor, coaching and modifying as needed.

classes.description: Pure Empower is a barre-based, high intensity, low impact, full body workout that combines strength training with cardio-centric circuits. It uses your own body weight, a 6-inch step-up platform and ankle weights. It is challenging, but modifiable for all levels and a great complement to Pure Barre Classic.
classes.name: Pure Empower

classes.description: Pure Barre is a low impact, total body workout set to upbeat music to create a high energy, graceful, yet intense 55-minute muscle-sculpting class. The class flows through a quick progression of small isometric movements designed to isolate major muscle groups, including your arms, thighs, seat and abs. Using your own body weight for resistance, you will work muscles in the various target areas to fatigue and then stretch them out in order to achieve a stronger, longer and an overall leaner physique. They recommend wearing workout pants or capris. Socks are required and sticky socks are recommended! Please bring a water bottle to stay hydrated.
classes.name: Pure Barre

description:
Join Personal Pilates Plus for  Reformer, Chair, Mat, Combo Classes, Piyo and TRX classes.
For TRX classes, Personal Pilates Plus requires that tennis shoes be clean and dry.  Classes can be done barefoot, as well.

featured_reviews.review: Always a great class with Heather. Great variety of movements, always challenging and I love that we played on multiple pieces of equipment including the chair, reformer and some mat work!

classes.description: This class introduces the foundation exercises of the Reformer apparatus. Good choice for individuals who are new to Pilates, are pregnant wth some experience, post-partum or have acute or chronic injuries.
classes.name: Reformer 1

classes.activities: Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Pilates, Strength Training
classes.description: 30 min each Pilates Tower and TRX
classes.name: TRX/Tower

description: Bodhi Pilates is an innovative Pilates studio with compassionate instructors focused on providing a positive movement experience. Let their highly educated and certified instructors help you shape your body and mind to improve your functional movements. They offer a personalized and prescriptive program specifically tailored and designed for you. You will experience improved postural alignment and increased body awareness while simultaneously developing and deepening your strength and flexibility. Allow Bodhi Pilates to nurture your mind and body.

featured_reviews.review: Short: Laura is incredible, studio is new and gorgeous, this was an amazing class and you should go if only to discover Bodhi Pilates, which you WILL want to return to. Im visiting a cousin in Denver and feel so unexpectedly blessed to have discovered Laura and her studio. Im here from NYC (serious pilates community) where I take class daily, and not kidding, shes probably in the top 3 instructors Ive ever had. Amazing personal corrections, ability to hold an entire class while seamlessly catering to my injury, and gave me helpful tips for exercises & stretching it that Ive NEVER gotten before!! I will come back to this gem of a studio every time Im in Denver. Also- they have reformers, chairs, and full cadillacs, which are a rarity, but so necessary!! Go and see for yourself!

classes.description: This exciting and energetic workout fuses the intensity and variety of boot camp and core strength of Pilates. This class will get your heart rate elevated quickly. You should be prepared to sweat in this fast-paced, circuit workout utilizing a variety of Pilates equipment and props! This class will be a fun challenge. This is an All-Level group class which is suited to any fitness level, as our instructors provide modifications based on your ability and needs.
classes.name: Circuit Pilates

description: Botanica Wellness is a premier wellness center dedicated to providing Denver with the best holistic care available in a relaxing spa environment. Clients enjoy the comfort of a luxurious renovated Victorian home with heated treatment beds and experienced therapists.

featured_reviews.review: Always amazing facial at botanica. Everyone is wonderful! Bummer that the credits increased to 40, but they have a $69/month special which is so worth it!

classes.description:
Swedish Massage - Gentle to medium pressure with long strokes meant to relax and invigorate the body.

Gratuity is not included in the cost of your reservation. Please remember to tip based on the full amount of the service reserved.
classes.name: Swedish Massage- 55 min

classes.description: Deep Tissue Massage - Deep pressure used to affect sub-layer of muscle and fascia. Ideal for chronic muscle pain and injury rehabilitation.
classes.name: Deep Tissue-55 min

classes.description:
Mother-to-be Massage - A gentle massage with special cushions. Great for relaxation or aches and pains. Please bring your doctor's written consent.

Gratuity is not included in the cost of your reservation. Please remember to tip based on the full amount of the service reserved.
classes.name: Mother-To-Be Massage - 55 min

description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, their instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with CycleBar, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts, and class rank. Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

address.address_line1: 562 E Castle Pines Pkwy Suite C1 & C2

featured_reviews.review: This is one of the more competitive cyclebar studios. The other riders are fast and strong. Which makes it fun and challenging. The instructor Carrie is engaging and pushes you to do your best. Also, this one has a little more altitude than the ones in Denver... you can feel it when youre riding.. trust me!

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is the primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. The state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.
classes.name: Classic (45 Mins)

description: Welcome to their Park Hill location! They are located on the corner of 23rd and Oneida. They offer a variety of early morning, mid morning, early afternoon and evening yoga and barre classes.

featured_reviews.review: Great class, I had so much fun! Hour long core workout with dancing, mixed with yoga poses. Maddy is a great instructor!

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Strength Training, Barre
classes.description: If you’re looking for amazing results on the tone, shape, and strength of your body this class is made for you. FLEX Barre targets individual muscle groups using very specific, small, isometric movements. These small movements will quickly fatigue the muscle which leads to the drastic strengthening and toning that you can’t help but love. It’s worth it! Appropriate for students of all levels.
classes.name: FLEX Barre

classes.description: BUTI® is a movement practice that fuses power yoga, tribal dance and plyometrics into a high-intensity workout that transforms the body from the inside out.Buti is an Indian Marathi word meaning "a cure that has been hidden or kept secret." It incorporates power vinyasa flow, hip shaking, jumping or hopping exercises using the core to increase muscular power and explosiveness and reduce the force of impact on the joints with tribal dance moves. Get ready to empower your workout, release endorphins, smile, sweat with intention, awaken your chakra energy, and transform your core from the inside out!
classes.name: Buti Yoga

description: Yoga Junction is your hOMetown yoga studio in Louisville, CO. They offer more than 30 classes a week for all levels and abilities. They offer classes for beginners to advanced practitioners, with class styles varying from Junction Flow and Flow Level 2 to Prenatal, Yin and Yoga Nidra. With a very experienced staff, teacher training programs, and retreats offered throughout the year, Yoga Junction offers the best in yoga instruction in the area. TRX and TRX Fusion classes are offered 4 times a week as well  for those that are interested in a strength-based HIIT style workout!

featured_reviews.review: Genie is a wonderful teacher - so attentive and encouraging! As for the class itself, I loved it. Learned some new moves to help with posture/alignment and left feeling calm and ready to face the week ahead.

classes.description: Classes are designed to build strong foundations of alignment. Although classes vary from Yin to Flow Level 2, you'll find that Yoga Junction's experienced instructors all are focused on maintaining proper alignment and building appropriate strength and flexibility. TRX classes utilize the straps as well as HIIT principles for a strong, athletic workout. So whether you're looking for a workout, or a restorative Yoga Nidra session, Yoga Junction has what you need!
classes.name: Align & Flow

classes.description: Yoga Nidra is a very restful, replenishing and healing meditation practice...or a LONG Shivasana that begins with a systematic whole body relaxation sequence with detailed instructions for deep restoration and replenishing. Excellent for deep relaxation, insomnia, and overall well being, and includes potent Pranic Healing Practices. You will go home and sleep like a baby afterwards and feel the benefits for days.
classes.name: Yoga Nidra

description: Denver Sports Recovery Center is home to the only one-stop comprehensive sports recovery facility. The center has an integrated, multidisciplinary sports recovery staff – consisting of chiropractors, physical therapists, athletic trainers, massage therapists, fascial stretch therapists, acupuncturists, exercise physiologists and more.  We are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, offering whole body cryotherapy, infrared and red light therapy treatments.  The recovery center offers an aquatic area, pneumatic compression garments, cold laser, Marc Pro, mechanical vibration plates, swisswing therapy and much more for optimal recovery and revitalization.

featured_reviews.review: I went here after spraining my ankle and it was wonderful. They developed a treatment plan and provided multiple modalities to help promote healing and a fast recovery. So cool that this is available through ClassPass.

classes.description:
The Prism Light Pod is a full-body cold laser system with more than 700 red LEDs that penetrate your muscles, deep tissues, joints and body cells to accelerate performance recovery by 4 to 10 times faster than your body’s natural healing process.

The light therapy treats your entire body with 20 minute sessions that targets multiple areas at the same time. It’s comfortable, effective and saves you time & costs. Accelerate your recovery and keep your body performing at its maximum peak level with the Prism Light Pod.
classes.name: Light Therapy Non Member

classes.description:
Our trained staff will meet with you and make sure you are completely comfortable.  You must complete and sign the waiver which confirms whether there are pre-existing conditions that would preclude you from using cryotherapy.  All clients will change into a robe, dry socks and gloves which we supply. Men need to wear cotton briefs or boxers. Women can wear underwear and a sports bra (no metal) but it is not necessary.
All jewelry and piercings need to be removed.  ALL GARMENTS MUST BE DRY!

Once you are in your protective clothing, you will enter the cryosauna and begin your treatment.  Your privacy is very important to us. You will remove your robe once you are in the cryosauna and the door is shut. Only your head and neck are visible throughout the entire process.  The treatment is invigorating and will last 2 1/2 to 3 minutes. 500-800 calories will begin to melt away!  After the treatment ends, while you are still in the tank, your robe will be given back to you. The cryosauna platform will automatically lower and you can exit the chamber.  Your body quickly returns to normal temperature and most people experience a sound night's sleep and reduced aches and pains.
classes.name: Cryosauna Session Non-Member

classes.description:
The recovery center offers an aquatic area, pneumatic compression garments, cold laser, Marc Pro, mechanical vibration plates, swisswing therapy and much more for optimal recovery and revitalization.
On your first visit please plan on spending 60-90 minutes.  You will have full access to the recovery room, a recovery specialist will assist you with the modalities and recovery equipment and create an individual recovery plan based on your needs.  Utilizing the recovery center incorporates recovery tools and equipment that assist in unlocking tight muscles, reducing soreness and enhancing athletic and every day performance.  Please wear athletic style clothing and bring swim attire to utilize the hot/cold tubs and sauna.
classes.name: Initial Recovery Center (Slot 2)

description: D2G isn't your ordinary dance fitness studio...they bring you the BEST Dance Fitness Programs with the highest of quality instructors with unmatched energy and passion.

featured_reviews.review: The BEST Zumba class I have ever taken!! The instructor made the class. so. MUCH. FUN!!!

classes.description: Perfect For - Fitness enthusiasts and students looking for a more challenging, high intensity interval training workout. How It Works - With most workout programs, music is an afterthought. The music in STRONG by Zumba™ was crafted to drive the intensity in a challenging progression that provides a total body workout. The result? A group fitness experience like no other. Benefits - Moving in sync with music makes you work harder. This class will push you past your plateaus to help you reach your fitness goals faster. Using your own body weight, you will gain muscular endurance, tone, and definition, and you will experience an increased afterburn.
classes.name: STRONG by Zumba

classes.description: Introducing a new dance fitness program dedicated to the beautiful and energetic sounds of Soca Music. This program combines high cardio, toning and fun dance moves to gain proven fitness results. This program is designed for everyone who wants to get fit and stay fit the FUN way. Developed exclusively by Dance 2-Gather's (D2G) Owner ~ Erica DeGourville-Reyes - all moves are with passion and precision. The music throughout the class is professionally mastered by Trinidadian native DJ Selectah Kieon. Exclusively offered at D2G in Aurora, CO but will be spreading to studios and gyms around the world soon!
classes.name: D2G SocaFit

description:
Hydrate IV Bar is one of Colorado's premier IV therapy and hydration clinics. As a team of medical professionals, their mission is simple: to provide a comfortable, spa-like experience with services that enhance your healthy lifestyle. Their IV treatments and vitamin injections are an effective way to deliver essential fluids and nutrients directly into the bloodstream to help boost your overall wellness. 

Hydrate IV Bar is a premier ClassPass Wellness venue. See their class descriptions for more information on the services they provide.

featured_reviews.review: Quick and easy. Everyone there was really great. Said it lasts two weeks.

classes.description: Administered as a subcutaneous injection which only takes a few seconds! Quick and painless yet very beneficial! Methylcobalamin B12 can improve cognitive function, improve concentration, enhance energy, boost endurance and elevate moods.
classes.name: B12 Injection

description:
A pioneer of barre fitness workouts, The Bar Method was developed 16 year ago and has reshaped 1 million strong, graceful bodies! Bar is a safe, fun, 60- or 45-minute workout that uses isometric exercises to strengthen and tone all major muscle groups, followed by periods of stretching to elongate, lengthen and align the body. Clients see immediate and noticeable results, regardless of fitness levels or experience!

Onsite child care is available for 11 classes each week for an additional fee. To reserve a space for your child, place yourself in the Kids Club class that you want coverage for on The Bar Method App. Or, contact the studio at 720-379-3732.

featured_reviews.review: Good quick class. I loved how Katie took the time to learn everyones name and use them during the class- she paid attention to form and provided corrections. Looking forward to taking a full class

classes.description: All levels are welcome to this one-hour, low-impact, interval style, isometric total body workout. Bar Method workouts help create strong and toned bodies! Please wear pants below your knees and socks (grip or regular).
classes.name: Bar Method (60 Min; All Levels)

description: pH7 Pilates is a fully equipped, client-centered studio specializing in classical Pilates through private instruction and small group classes. pH7 has been helping clients build strength, reach their fitness goals and rehabilitate for over a decade.

featured_reviews.review: Caroline was very helpful in offering feedback and helping to set up the machine. The class flew by fast but my abs definitely felt the results for days!

classes.description: Learn to use your core to support all movement. Improve flexibility, strength, posture and alignment to achieve body symmetry. Move with the power and stability of increased core strength.
classes.name: Intermediate / Advanced Circuit Pilates

description: Yoga Hive, like the bumblebee, represents spirituality, celebration and community. Just as the bumblebee visits a hive to store nourishment and cultivate a family, our Louisville, Colorado community congregates at Yoga Hive in the same way. Through yoga, aerial yoga, and fitness classes with spin bikes+yoga, Yoga Hive nourishes minds, strengthens bodies, and deepens souls. The Hive provides classes suitable for all bodies, ages, abilities and budgets. Members span generations and contribute to the cultivation of a supportive yoga family in our Colorado mountain town.

featured_reviews.class_name: Aerial Yoga for Flexibility and Strength
featured_reviews.review: Blaine is very knowledgeable, a great teacher, and easy to hear. Love how hanging upside down gives my bad back some comfort and release.

classes.description: This class offer's the practitioner a well rounded experience of aerial yoga. The sequencing, postures and transitions offer a safe and fun guided class. Learn how to use the aerial silk hammock to stretch and access more space in your yoga postures. Experience decompression of the spine by hanging with the fabric. Rediscover your practice and body through this multidimensional yoga practice!
classes.name: Aerial Yoga All Levels

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Yoga, Cycling
classes.description: All levels “Cycle Yoga” begins with a fun 30 minute ride on a stationary bike that is musically calibrated while practicing the aspects of yoga. This class teaches the basics of the cycle postures, body alignment and awareness. This is followed by a 30 minute stretching and alignment based yoga practice on the mat to lenghten the muscles, ground the soul and open the heart.
classes.name: Cycle Yoga

classes.description: Chakras are 7 energetic centers through which our energy flows. When our emotions are out of balance, these centers can become blocked and create illness in the body, mind and spirit. In this mat-based class, we will use breathwork, yoga postures, techniques from the Kundalini and Kriya Yoga traditions, meditation and free movement to heal and balance one chakra at a time or a group of chakras in harmony. This class is for all levels including beginners.
classes.name: Chakra Journey

description: Barre Forte offers group fitness Barre classes and dance inspired workouts that tax and tone your entire body, while strengthening and lengthening your muscles.

featured_reviews.review: Alissa kicked my butt and I loved every minute! Really enjoy this studio as well. Music is great but not blowing your ear drums out and you can hear and understand the instructor.

classes.description: Our studio's signature class! A ballet inspired barre workout designed to trim, tighten, and tone your entire body, with an emphasis on defining your glutes, and legs. You'll use small, controlled movements and high repetition to develop a lengthened and graceful physique. This class is appropriate for all levels and abilities, as progressions and modifications are offered throughout class. Don't forget your barre socks! Full coverage socks must be worn during all classes at Barre Forte.
classes.name: Barre Forte

description: Bella Diva World Dance is a Denver-based dance fitness company that brings the magic of movement to Colorado while also creating a sense of community for their dancers to be part of. Bella Diva believes dance is for EVERY BODY, no matter your age, size, or background. At Bella Diva they will have you smile while you sweat, and help you shed weight within and without to world dance styles and beats. The world is their dance floor!

featured_reviews.review: I really enjoyed this class. Tons of fun, great core muscle isolation/practice. It seems like this studio typically does longer courses with the performance at the end of the session. Would love to start from the beginning next time, but it was still great to jump in.

classes.description:
BollyX is a Bollywood-inspired dance-fitness program that combines dynamic choreography with the hottest music from around the world. Its 50-minute cardio workout cycles between higher and lower-intensity dance sequences to get you moving, sweating, and motivated all at the same time. At the very core of a BollyX workout is the inspiration it draws from the music and dance of Bollywood, the film industry of India. We embody the infectious energy, expression and movement of Bollywood and aim to expand the reach of fitness to more people worldwide. 

Our fitness curriculum has been created by world-class choreographers and certified fitness professionals to ensure a safe and powerful total body dance workout for all. The BollyX fitness program and instructor training is endorsed by the Aerobics and Fitness Association of America (AFAA), the National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM), the American Council on Exercise (ACE), and the British Columbia Recreation and Parks Association (BCRPA) in Canada as an approved provider for continuing education units/credits (CEUs/CECs). BollyX utilizes interval training techniques; the unique workout not only tones your entire body but also burns s
classes.name: BollyX Fitness

classes.description:
The most affordable Polynesian escape— direct from Denver is now available at Bella Diva Dance! The dances of Hawai’i, Tahiti, Bora-Bora, Samoa and other South Pacific islands are known for their enchanting beauty and captivating stories of history, legend, and culture. In this easy-to-follow beginners’ class, BDD Teaching Associate Re Gupta will be introducing us to basic Hula, Tahitian, and other Polynesian dances and rhythms under the Hot Hula Fitness format.

The island breezes and hypnotic beats will cool you, while you develop coordination, muscle isolations, stronger and leaner legs, tighter torso and hips, with stronger overall movement and posture— all with the laid back “hang-loose” vibe of the island lifestyle. Sunscreen not needed :) HOT HULA fitness® provides a “total body workout” in 60 minutes as it isolates your larger muscle groups, increasing strength and definition to your core with specific emphasis on the abs, glutes, quads and arms.

Inspired by the dances of the Pacific Islands, HOT HULA fitness® incorporates easy to perform dance movements set to the sounds of traditional Polynesian drum beats fused with funky Reggae music, resulting in a modern, hip fitness workout! ​
classes.name: Hot Hula Fitness

description: Kula Yoga Center is a welcoming community and a beautiful oasis in Lakewood, CO. They offer a variety of yoga classes for all levels so everyone can deepen their practice.

featured_reviews.review: LeeAnn had her dog there, which I enjoyed, but just fyi in case someone has allergies, fear of dogs, or is looking for minimal distractions. LeeAnn is very down to earth and keeps it real and light-hearted! Fun flow!

classes.description: An creatively sequence vinyasa class that is based on alignment. This challenging class uses unique transitions between postures, that will bring an awareness to your core while creating a deeper connection with yourself.
classes.name: All Level Flow

classes.description: Been working on a computer all day? Sore from living that good Colorado outdoors life? Get deep into your body with this relaxing yet challenging stretch class that focusses on opening hamstrings, hips and lower back.
classes.name: Pure Stretch

description: FIT Broadway Boot Camp,  over 4,000 square feet of workout space and more all sitting right in the heart of Denver, CO.

featured_reviews.review: Alle was a great instructor, made good adjustments and very encouraging. The class was as expected, but always disappointed that they have zero cool down or ending stretch.

classes.description: Think CrossFit without the heavy weight, or a bootcamp style workout using every toy a CrossFit gym has as its disposal.
classes.name: F.I.T.

description: Rise Nation has redefined fitness with its effective, efficient, and safe workouts. It's about climbing training. A workout to burn calories. Just bring a water bottle, closed toed athletic shoes and clothes you are ready to sweat in! If it’s your first time, chances are you have never been on a VersaClimber before.Please make sure you arrive at least 15 minutes early and notify the front desk you are a first-timer to ensure that you get properly set up on your climber.

featured_reviews.review: Ange is AMAZING ❤️

classes.description: This class features more in-depth instruction on climbing, proper form and movement execution. It is highly recommended for first-timers to help acclimate to our workout, but intensity can be scaled for those returning climbers too!
classes.name: The Ascent - L1

classes.description: This class is choreographed to higher tempo music, features a wide variety of moves, and focuses on utilizing the beat of the music to motivate you through your climb.
classes.name: The Climb - L2

description:
Studio Classes - Strength, Mind/Body, Cardio, Dance & More
28,000 Sq. Ft. across Two Floors of best in class fitness in the heart of Cherry Creek!
Multiple Studios:  Yoga, Cycle, Cross-Functional Turf, Dance, Barre, Strength
Best in class group workout equipment- SmartBars & Weights, TechnoGym SkillMills, SmartSteps & More...
Babysitting, Towel Service, Full Amenity Locker Rooms

featured_reviews.review: The gym was huge, clean, and beautiful. Bring a padlock if you want a locker. Parking is on the street only so leave a little bit of extra time to find a spot. The class was a really good workout and I'd love to do it again.

classes.description: In the mood for some solo time on the treadmill, elliptical, or weight machines? Reserve one hour of open gym time!
classes.name: Gym Time

classes.description: This class is a guided indoor cycling experience that uses upbeat music to achieve ridiculous results. Perfect for the fitness enthusiast, recreational cyclist or serious racer. All levels are welcome.
classes.name: Cycle

classes.description: Until you have tried a Power Yoga, you may not even know the level of physical capacity that you are capable of obtaining.  This practice will warm you up gradually and safely, then lead you through a faster paced Yoga practice that adds an extra element of core and upper body strength with cardiovascular conditioning.
classes.name: Power Yoga

classes.description: REB3L Groove is an intense dance cardio format. We use music that you can feel rush through you. When heart pumping, recognizable music is mixed with easy to follow, intense choreography the result is a kick ass class that leaves you wanting more. We don’t waste your time, before you know it you’ve burned 700-1000 calories in an hour. This is a journey to reclaim, renew and reshape your life. Become stronger today than you were yesterday, in body and mind. It’s sweat with intention, an awakening. You’ve got this!!
classes.name: REB3L Groove

classes.description: TRU>ZONE is a TRU KICKA** interval workout! Workout changes EVERY TIME for maximum RESULTS. Cardio, Strength & Endurance!
classes.name: TRU>ZONE

description: The Bar Method Denver - Cherry Creek is a barre based workout that is designed by a physical therapist to make the workout more effective and safe. Although many of The Bar Method's exercises take place at the ballet bar, the program is only partially inspired by the long, lean musculature of ballet dancers. Created by Burr Leonard, the workouts also incorporate the brief, fat-burning bursts of activity known as interval training and the muscle-shaping techniques of isometrics. Combine all this with the science of physical therapy and you get The Bar Method: an intense yet safely designed approach to exercise meant to cinch the silhouette, increase muscle definition and boost energy all day long.
