featured_reviews.review: Very welcoming studio and good workout. Jenny gave great instructions and feedback on form. Lots of mats and pads to get used to so get there early. Kind of hard to hear over the music so definitely need to focus.

classes.description: Barre Express is inspired by our classic Bar Method class and designed to offers fat-burning, muscle-building benefits in a convenient 45-minute session for those on the go. This class is suitable for all levels.Benefits:A well-rounded full body workout in 45-minutesSimilar benefits to our classic Bar Method classRecommended for:Those who are on the goSuitable for all levels
classes.name: Barre Express (45 minutes)

classes.description: Barre Method is our most effective full-body, low-impact class that delivers the classic Bar Method experience. This hour-long interval training class will help you lose inches by sculpting muscles while simultaneously burning body fat. The class focuses on isometric movements that increase strength and endurance in your muscles, followed by stretching intervals designed to reshape and transform your body. You will leave feeling stronger, aligned and renewed. This class welcomes all levels.Benefits:Transforms and reshapes muscles with unique interval format while burning fatLow impact exercises safely build strength throughout entire body without bulking upEffectively stretches muscles for increased flexibility and long term healthImproves metabolism, balance, sleep, mental tenacity and emotional well-beingRecommended for:EveryoneAnyone looking for full-body transformation & optimal fat burning workouts
classes.name: Barre Method

description:
Serving Denver and surrounding areas, Live Love Lash provides personalized and professional beauty treatments to a local and world wide clientele. Live Love Lash specializes in day spa services including: Xtreme eyelash extensions, Lash Lifts, Permanent Makeup, Mircoblading, custom facials, massage, waxing and professional make-up artistry. Services are performed by an advanced certified lash stylist and trainer and award winning make-up artists and aestheticians in a relaxing studio atmosphere. 

Live Love Lash is a premier ClassPass Wellness venue. See their class descriptions for more information on the services they provide. Gratuity is not included in the cost of your reservation. Please remember to tip based on the full amount of the service reserved.

featured_reviews.review: Hands down best massage I've ever gotten through classpass. Jenny was intuitive, knowledgeable, and "checked in" the perfect amount of times. I'll definitely come back here. The only downside is you can hear everything going on in the neighboring "cubicles" from the room/cubicle we were in... I didn't mind bc the massage itself was so amazing! But something to consider.

classes.description:
Please note for tanning appointments:
Pre-Tan Instructions- Arrive showered, shaved, and exfoliated. Don't wear any lotion or deodorant. Bring loose clothes to leave in. The tan will take 6-8 hours to develop so be prepared not to get wet/shower for at least that long. 

Post-Tan Instructions- After the 6-8 hours you are free to shower. Avoid using harshly scented soaps as this tends to strip the color and can cause an uneven tan. In order to make your tan last, be sure to stay moisturized and limit exfoliation. To guarantee a consistent and even appearance of your spray tan, your technician will provide you with options for recommended aftercare products.
classes.name: Spray Tanning

description: Fitrition is not only a gym but a fast growing fitness community. They have taken the popular and effective boutique fitness concept to another level by combining multiple boutique fitness concepts under one roof: Buti Barre (Barre), FitLab (Functional Fitness / HIIT), HIIT Factory (Kickboxing), and the evolution of studio cycle... HelixCycle! Whether you have serious fitness goals, are interested in diversify your workouts, or are looking to be a part of a growing fitness community, Fitrition is for you.

featured_reviews.review: This place is super cool ! Loved that they have shakes after class . I do Buti yoga regularly and was expecting some Buti element in this class but it was just a regular barre class. The name should be changed . It was a great class however !

classes.description: Fit Lab is a 1 hour High Intensity Interval Training group class. Each class is uniquely designed to give you the perfect balance of strength and cardiovascular training. This total body workout hits on every aspect of functional fitness, never giving you the same sweat session twice!
classes.name: Fit Lab

classes.description: Combination of yoga, dance, ballet and Pilates. This class consists of low impact movements and pulsing motions. You will strengthen and lengthen with light weights. Flow and Glow variation class offered
classes.name: Buti Barre

classes.description: Suitable for all levels of students, Yin Yoga is a perfect complement to the dynamic and muscular (yang) styles of yoga and exercise that emphasize internal heat, and the lengthening and contracting of our muscles. This class also incorporates breathing exercises also known as pranayama, meditation, aromatherapy, and gentle hands on assistance.
classes.name: Deep Stretch/Yin Yang Yoga

description:
Professional Pilates with a personal touch! Bringing Affordable Pilates to the Denver area for over 18 Years!

Built on care and compassion, The Studio is the perfect spot for all ages and skill levels, no matter your goals.

featured_reviews.review: Joi was awesome, class was small which allowed me the ability to learn and really get time with the instructor. I would definitely recommend this class for anyone newer to Pilates.

classes.description:
The reformer provides finely tuned exercise resistance that allows one to work very precisely to develop good alignment, core strength and flexibility. By using body weight and resistance of the springs to push and pull the carriage, you will train a variety of body parts. 

This reformer Pilates class is ideal for all levels because the pace is adjusted for those in the class. Instructors cater to your group so everybody gets the best workout possible.

Class time is 55 minutes to help with transitions.

If you have never taken Reformer Pilates before, or have suffered a recent injury,  please call to confirm the selected class would work for you.
classes.name: All Levels Reformer Pilates

description: Balance.Yoga.Barre. opened in 2013 with a commitment to creating and developing a well-designed workout program incorporating the principles of Yoga, Ballet and Pilates. Their philosophy is simple: they believe exercise is a basic need for all humans, regardless of age, fitness level or health goals. Their promise is to promote wellness and deliver workouts that inspire people to be their best.

featured_reviews.review: Fantastic class! Shelby was great with getting the class properly set up for each exercise and correcting alignment. I never felt lost which sometimes happens in other barre classes. I found her laid-back personality comforting and her funny jokes helped distract me from my burning and shaking legs! Booty burn for sure! I’ll definitely be back to her class.

classes.description: This class is based on the elements of Ballet, Yoga and Pilates. The movements consists of high energy, low impact and fat burning exercises. With a emphasis in Ballet posture and technique we create long lean muscle. Participating in Ballet Barre creates a new found awareness of the body, and an appreciation for smart movement.
classes.name: Barre

classes.description: Flow through a series of postures that are drawn from a variety of yoga styles linking movement with the breath as you improve strength, flexibility and balance. The calories will burn away as you sweat and move through each of the poses. This class is for all levels.
classes.name: Hot Yoga Flow 1,2

description: OUTLAW Yoga Littleton is their flagship studio! They are honored to share their beautiful space with you right in the heart of downtown Littleton.  As you step into the studio, they invite you to make yourself at home – have a seat on the big white couch and make a new friend – don’t worry, the yoga will come soon enough.  It is their intention that you leave each class having taken one step closer to unleashing your inner OUTLAW!  They provide a safe, welcoming, and fun environment to practice in, and their highly-qualified and knowledgeable teachers will help guide you through the hour.  There are classes for all levels, there's live music, and free meditation hours!   You’re an OUTLAW now…choose boldness, not blandness.

featured_reviews.review: Challenging and sweaty! Good way to clear your head!

classes.description: Outlaw 1 is an all levels power vinyasa – technically simple and physically challenging.
classes.name: Outlaw 1

classes.description: Beginner 101 is designed for you to build your yoga foundation.
classes.name: Beginner 101

classes.activities: Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Yoga, Strength Training
classes.description: Outlaw X combines the mobility of yoga with the strength building of free weights.  The class follows a 45 minute format.
classes.name: Outlaw X

classes.description: Gentle Flow combines a vinyasa with deep stretches and calming holds followed by a 15 minute yoga nidra session. Yoga Nidra utilizes a series of visualizations and deep relaxation techniques to effectively release tension, anxiety, unwanted habits, and self-limiting beliefs.
classes.name: Gentle Flow/Nidra

description:
Youfit Health Clubs offer state of the art facilities and a wide variety of classes. Youfit is dedicated to helping you on your fitness journey!

For class times see here: https://www.youfit.com/gym/arvada-52nd-ave-7756

classes.description:
With open gym, you can drop into the gym to take a class or get in your own workout gym-style. Whether you want to hop on a treadmill, elliptical, stairmaster or sculpt and tone with free weights or machines, you can find it all at Youfit. Arrive at any time during your reservation window and stay for 10 minutes up to 2 hours — you do you.

For class times see here: https://www.youfit.com/gym/arvada-52nd-ave-7756
classes.name: Open Gym

description:
The Pure Barre technique is low-impact, protecting your joints by avoiding any bouncing or jumping. Each strength section of the workout is followed by a stretching section in order to create long, lean muscles without bulk. The technique works to defy gravity by tapering everything in and lifting it up!

Please be aware classes start on time and clients should arrive 15 minutes early. Doors will lock at the start of class. Socks are required!

featured_reviews.review: Nicest PB studio I have visited so far! Welcoming staff and great teacher!

classes.description: The Original. Rooted in our classic technique, Pure Barre is the fastest, most effective full-body workout. You’ll be guided through a series low-impact, high intensity movements that are designed to strengthen and tone your body in ways that no other technique can. Give us 50 minutes and we’ll give you the best of barre - long and lean muscle tone without the bulk.
classes.name: Pure Barre (50 Mins)

description: Yoga High Denver offers many styles of yoga, including Flow, Acroyoga, Sivananda, Ashtanga, Tribal, Yin and free meditation classes. They also offer many styles of massage, including deep tissue, raindrop therapy, Swedish, cranial-sacral, Thai and Reiki.

featured_reviews.review: Class opened with a short meditation relevant to daily life. The instructor asked what we needed and tailored the class based on our requests. On this particular day we focused on stretching and restorative poses with a small amount of flow to warm up.

classes.description: This class will be different every time, leading you through a variety of poses that will flow into each other. Flow classes are great for all levels.
classes.name: Flow Yoga

classes.description: Move through poses slowly, taking time to build heat and strength. Good for beginners and seasoned practitioners alike.

description: Maha Soul is downtown Littleton's soulful yoga studio, healing center and fun, funky retail store.

featured_reviews.review: Like the acupressure points but wanted some more pressure. Pretty intense poses, but good.

classes.description: Using the sweetness of flow, this vinyasa class is for those who are looking for movement and breath, and a connection with mind, body and soul. This class welcomes those who are new to yoga along with experienced yogis.
classes.name: Vinyasa Flow (Level 2)

classes.description: Restorative yoga is a delicious way to support the mind and body with open poses and the gentle help of bolsters, pillows and blankets. Restorative yoga is sometimes referred to as "closest to taking a nap" yoga. Very helpful for stressful lifestyles, injury recovery and overall nurturing. Add in the beautiful healing of reiki energy and you will float right out of the studio. We welcome you to your most relaxed self.
classes.name: Reiki Restorative (Level 1)

classes.description: Join us for three magical nights under the beautiful Colorado sky. Bring your yoga mat and be ready to have your heart and mind nourished with ceremony. Each month we will concentrate on the energy and essence of that particular full moon. The yoga style will be gentle and everyone is welcome. Details on location and exact time will be sent upon registration. (We will be about a 10 minute drive from the studio.) Three dates offered: Monday, June 17 Tuesday, July 16 Thursday, August 15 $30 per full moon xoxo
classes.name: Full Moon Celestial Magic

classes.description: The first half of class will be a Yin practice with low to the ground stretching; which stimulates and targets connective tissues by working gently into the edge of your postures through long holds of about 2-5 minutes. This is a meditative practice allowing you to go inward, focus on your breath and release tension & stress. Then we will move into Yoga Nidra for the 2nd half of class. While lying in Savasana, you will be guided through a series of visualizations and relaxation techniques designed to help you move beyond the conditioned mind into a state of expanded self-awareness. By entering into this deep rest state, you can more effectively release tension, anxiety, unwanted habits and beliefs that no longer serve you----leaving more open space to create the life you desire. {all levels)
classes.name: Yin & Yoga Nidra

description: A strength focused studio, offering a wide range of classes including HIIT, strength, barre, pilates, and yoga! A welcoming environment and community, fun and caring trainers, alo and beyond yoga athletic wear, all at an actually affordable rate, making fitness accessible for everyone at any level!

featured_reviews.review: Nice mellow HIIT class that worked me out but didn't make me feel like I was going to die. Plenty of options to make it more difficult if needed. Nice instructor who gave good direction! I'll definitely go back!

classes.description:
This is by far our favorite and most popular class style! It covers all your bases,
- strengthening
- tone and sculpt
- lose weight (for the long term)
- increase your metabolism
- cardio
- quick.
Errythaaang!

description: CrossFit LoDo is a CrossFit gym located in the heart of downtown Denver! They offer several classes throughout the day, and also have certain class times available for beginners. They use a series of constantly varied, high-intensity, functional movements executed in a supportive, encouraging group setting with individualized attention from their fun and knowledgeable coaches. Come join them to learn and grow in your fitness journey!

classes.description: Constantly varied, functional movements performed at high-intensity. Our classes incorporate gymnastics, Olympic Weightlifting, and plyometrics!
classes.name: CrossFit

description:
Studio Barre is a premier fitness boutique offering an exceptionally effective and personalized barre workout for all fitness levels. Their results-focused barre exercises incorporate the ballet barre, your own body weight, resistance bands, exercise balls, and light hand weights to tone, shape and sculpt your body. The 60-minute workout digs deep physically while the music and happy "Barretenders" keep you mentally in the moment and push you toward your best.

Studio Barre's talented instructors (aka Barretenders) are highly trained to ensure you receive personalized, quality instruction designed to challenge you. Expect to be motivated in their musically driven, dance studio inspired barre classes. Studio Barre delivers a workout that is sassy, effective and a whole bunch of fun.

featured_reviews.review: Great workout with a very encouraging great instructor!

classes.description: Barre is an intense full body workout that uses small isolated movements while incorporating cardio and stretching to define your body and lift your seat.
classes.name: Barre

classes.description: Same great Studio Barre Workout, only compressed to 45 minutes! Studio Barre offers a specialized barre class that focuses on building core strength, improving posture, and creating the ultimate dancer-like body. With this workout, you can create a more confident, exquisite, and poised you.

description: From a high-intensity workout to a centering yoga class, Duality offers it all. Their classes are anything but comfortable, and they are proud of that. Why? Because comfort means stagnation. They promote constant growth. Development. Evolution. Expand your abilities and turn your fitness routine into a ritual. They are your new destination for mindful workouts that build both your physical and heart strength.

featured_reviews.review: Really nice modern studio! This class was challenging and I felt very accomplished after. They have a variety of different styles and the instructors are great

classes.description: At Duality, they offer heated, power vinyasa yoga classes for varying levels of practitioners to help teach a more mindful approach to physical well-being. DualityFlow classes are heated to 95 degrees.

classes.description: Experience a physically invigorating circuit-based class designed to improve your strength, power, and endurance while increasing your metabolic rate. DualityCircuit combines kettlebells, TRX, SkiErg rowers, treadmills, resistance bands, and plyo boxes, you will redefine your limits. Duality is the proud home of the SkillRun treadmill, one of the top tools Olympic athletes use to train. From fitness enthusiasts to elite athletes, all students will enjoy the seamless blend of cardio and power training on this machine.
classes.name: DualityCircuit

classes.description: ResCon classes will be held in the yoga studio on your yoga mat. You will begin with an upbeat, dynamic warm-up and then combine the use of resistance bands, dumbbells, and cardio exercises for a full-body, 60-minute workout geared toward all fitness levels. The studio will be heated up to 85 degrees.

description: Mudra Yoga Studio's mission is to make yoga accessible for anyone while also offering an opportunity for a deep, transformative experience.

featured_reviews.review: Lovely presence. She always asks what you want from the class so it could be more restorative or more movement depending on the class.

classes.description: Center the mind & body by using breathing exercises and physical poses (asanas) to circulate the blood & gain flexibility and strength, coupled with using relaxation poses to restore the body and promote well-being. Hatha is a classical yoga system that focuses on creating a healthy body and peaceful mind. Hatha 1 is appropriate for beginners as well as for more experienced practitioners looking for a deep dive into the fundamentals.
classes.name: Hatha 1

classes.description: Join us for these special Kundalini Full Moon Meditations. Class will start with a short kundalini yoga set to prepare the body for meditation. Following the warm up, you'll be guided through a 31-minute Kundalini chanting meditation. Class will end with deep relaxation to allow full integration of the effects of the meditation. These special meditations are to be done only during the full moon, so join us for this unique opportunity!
classes.name: Full Moon Kundalini Meditation

classes.description: Flow classes use consistent and steady breathing to link a series of poses together in a fluid manner, encouraging the body to move as nature intended. Flow classes tone and strengthen the body while lengthening the muscle tissue to improve overall flexibility. Within the first few practice sessions you will feel strong and calm, more energized and alive, and in time you will awaken in a whole new body. As your practice deepens, you may notice that the physical changes are a by-product of a more empowering purpose. Perhaps you'll notice that lifelong fears start to dissipate, blocked emotions are released, the mind gets quiet and gains startling clarity, and you experience mental shifts that free you from old thought patterns. Flow All classes are well-rounded and are appropriate to all levels of ability, from the beginner to the experienced yogi.
classes.name: Flow All Levels

description: Broadway Cryo is a wellness center offering whole body Cryotherapy in their Impact Cryo Chamber. Treatments last from one to three minutes on three different levels based on user needs. Cryo is a great addition to workout routines for recovery and to reduce inflammation and pain. It is great to do before or after a workout, or at any time in your day!  A lot of people have incorporated cryo intol their overall wellness routine because there are other benefits ranging from mood boost, metabolism boost, and better sleep at night! Broadway Cryo also offers Normatec Compression packages for legs, hips, and arms. Normatec is a pulse compression massage that aids muscle recovery and increases circulation to the targeted areas.

featured_reviews.review: Great first cryo experience! Very helpful staff and I felt amazing afterward. I'm excited to see the benefits after repeated visits.

classes.description: This cryotherapy service is a dry, cold air therapy designed to activate the body's organic healing process and reduce inflammation and pain. The therapy works by standing inside a cryotherapy chamber for a treatment session that lasts 2-3 minutes.
classes.name: Whole Body Cryotherapy

description: APEX Human Performance is focused on full mind-body optimization, pioneering what it means to live to one’s fullest human potential. This means they focus not only on building physical potential but also on how the mind ultimately grows the former. They believe that the right exercise plan, diet, supplements, and mind-body experiences are necessary to reach optimal human potential. This is why APEX Human Performance is the perfect place for any health or fitness enthusiast to join. They believe they are able to give each and every member of APEX Human Performance the opportunity to reach for and attain their highest achievements. By offering classes at peak hours along with individually designed programs, APEX Human Performance is the perfect place for you!

featured_reviews.review: CrossFit style workout with multiple circuits mixing strength and cardio. Austin is a great coach and corrects poor form on the spot while motivating you to push yourself. Great workout, I’ll be back!

Benefits from attending the classes include increasing your core and back strength, increasing your flexibility, detoxing, total body conditioning, reconnecting with your breath, improving your sleep pattern, and much more.

featured_reviews.review: Nice studio. Class was the first Zen at this studio and from my past experience was good. Grounding was the theme so a lot of positions on your back, would have been nice to have a little more diversity in poses.

featured_reviews.review: Noelle was amazing! This was my first flow class and it was so relaxing and nice. I loved her use of the breath and the pauses in between asanas. My meditative and calming. Highly recommend!

classes.description: Literally translated from Sanskrit, Vinyasa means “connection.” Vinyasa Yoga synchronizes movement with breath which helps the practitioner develop a greater sense of self­ awareness, balance, and harmony with themselves and their environment. Vinyasa classes typically include smoothly flowing movements between poses guided by the force of inhales and exhales. Each class is unique, but may include the many variations of Sun Salutations as well as standing postures, inversions, backbends, twists, forward bends and deep relaxation.
classes.name: Vinyasa Flow

classes.description: These classes are designed for those who want and need to fill themselves back up. Life on the outside can be pretty stress-filled these days. Restorative Yoga helps you remember how to find the calm in the storm, have strength from within and revitalize yourself so that you feel whole again. Go and enjoy this restful yoga practice to help bring balance and peace back into your life again.

Gave great constructive feedback on posture and was social with new people which isn't something I encounter often after attending over 80 classes on class pass around the US. The facility can be a little tricky to find. The Front desk staff could use a reminder to inform new people of where basic things are such as bathrooms, cubbies/ lockers, and water fountains.

description:
Welcome to MOVE Studios, where the study, training and practice of movement improvement is a fine and fun art!  We are a very small studio focused on training students to improve their movement abilities for Pilates and Beyond.   The great workout you get here is from working smarter, not harder. 
 Great form = increased difficulty = efficient/effective movement.  We are known for really changing people's movement patterns, reducing pain issues, and improving their out-of-the-studio pursuits - whether that's biking, hiking, skiing, golfing, tennis, or just picking up the kids, gardening, and cleaning the house.  In our classes you'll learn the right movement, using the right muscles,  in the right way: Movement Efficiency.  And THAT's the Art of Movement Improvement!

featured_reviews.review: LOVE Ashley’s class! She provides solid instruction, specific corrections to improve your form, and takes an interest in your issues/goals. Her knowledge and use of props makes the class both approachable and challenging. Probably the most knowledgeable instructor I’ve met in over 10 years of doing Pilates.

classes.description: Level 3 of CoreAlign is a highly challenging class for individuals who have mastered the basics, spent significant time on the CoreAlign and are ready for difficult, advanced work. Prerequisites for the class are CoreAlign 1&2, and/or permission of the instructor. If you have studied CoreAlign at another studio and would like to request consideration for joining this class, please contact the studio.

classes.description: Ongoing CoreAlign class for students at the beginning level who have completed the 4-class intro, or who have completed basic CoreAlign training in private sessions.

description: White Lotus Therapeutics was conceived during a discussion of the state of wellness in society and out of a genuine desire to want to help people find true balance in their lives. Is White Lotus Therapeutics the only business taking on this endeavor? Thankfully not. But what sets them apart from other therapeutic businesses is their dedication to empowering clients to take their health into their own hands. Educating, leading by example, and motivating to create true and lasting change. We believe in personalizing treatment based on exactly what each individual needs. We believe in tested and proven modalities that blend eastern and western therapeutic ideals.

featured_reviews.review: Amber is amazing. I had a 90 minute massage with her and she met with me before hand and listened to my areas of concern and also gave me great stretching tips I could use afterwards. Highly recommend her. This was one of the best massages I’ve ever gotten (and I go frequently).

classes.description: Shower 2 - 4 hours after being sprayed. The only difference between Standard and Express is shower time. Both solutions have the ability to be as light or as dark as you desire and they both last for the same amount of time.It is important to note that after you your shower off the Express tan, you will feel quite a bit lighter due to the fact that the dark makeup will be gone and your tan will only be 1-4 hours into development. The tan will then continue to develop for 8-20 hours after your shower.
classes.name: Express Tan

classes.description: Shower 8+ hours after being sprayed.The only difference is shower time. Both solutions have the ability to be as light or as dark as you desire and they both last for the same amount of time. With the Standard solution, the tan will darken until you shower (anytime after 8 hours). You will then wash off the makeup layer and instantly become a shade lighter. The color that you see when you finish showering off the Standard tan will be the actual color of your tan.
classes.name: Standard Tan

Live Love Lash specializes in day spa services including: Xtreme eyelash extensions, Lash Lifts, Permanent Makeup, Mircoblading, custom facials, massage, waxing and professional make-up artistry. featured_reviews.review: Wow that was a great massage! Already booked for another one next week. Thank you Jenny!

classes.description:
Please note:
Pre-Tan Instructions- Arrive showered, shaved, and exfoliated. Don't wear any lotion or deodorant. Bring loose clothes to leave in. The tan will take 6-8 hours to develop so be prepared not to get wet/shower for at least that long. 

Post-Tan Instructions- After the 6-8 hours you are free to shower. Avoid using harshly scented soaps as this tends to strip the color and can cause an uneven tan. In order to make your tan last, be sure to stay moisturized and limit exfoliation. To guarantee a consistent and even appearance of your spray tan, your technician will provide you with options for recommended aftercare products.
classes.name: Spray Tanning

description: Fluid Fusion is one stop shop! They offer Reformer Pilates, Mat Pilates & Barre group classes.  Fluid teaches 50-60 minute regular group Reformer equipment classes and 45 minute express classes.  Group classes are 5 people and based on safe, fun learning of the practice.  Barre classes range from cardio to strengthening and stretching. Barre classes fill at 10 people and Reformer fills at 5 people so you always get personalized attention even in a group.  Join us for an energetic workout on the Reformer, on the mat, or at the Barre!

featured_reviews.review: Great friendly and funny instructor. She was so informative! Ive done all kinds of Pilates from NYC and is amazed at how different cities have new and other cool techniques. The studio is well air conditioned, so doing breathing exercises was literally a breath of fresh air. My tummy is also looking real fly, thank you!!

classes.description: This class is taught in a classical format to the work and teachings of Joseph Pilates. Real Pilates done the Real way as it has been taught for decades. You will feel the work in your core! Motions are not watered down but can be slightly modified to fit anybody! This class will really challenge your core and lengthen and strengthen your whole body. If you cannot do a "cat" or "c" curve position or a "swan"/"cobra" position due to spinal injury please do not take this class as these are common core elements of Jospeh Pilates Classical Work. PLEASE NO PREGNANCY OR NEW AND PAINFUL INJURY.
classes.name: Total Body Classical Pilates Reformer

classes.description: Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced Power Reformer class with a cardio core twist! Really exciting reformer workout may sometimes use bootcamp workout core reformer moves. This is a fitness based workout class that moves at a friendly but exciting pace. Get a strong core and have fun on reformer! This class is not for injury or pregnancy. It will require an understanding of regular basic reformer skills. We ask that you have taken a regular reformer class (either with us or at another studio) prior to trying this class.
classes.name: Total Body Power Pilates: Reformer

description: X7Fit aim’s to make clients feel like family, and like family, they’ll push you to reach your full potential. Once you’re in their amazing environment, you won’t want to leave. X7Fit is open to all levels of fitness. They offer a selection of fitness classes that will challenge, inspire and motivate you to take your fitness journey to the next level. Ground yourself in a Yoga class, amp up your cardio in Spin/Core, or sweat it out during a Boxing session. After all, if you’re going to work hard, you might as well work towards the results you want!

featured_reviews.review: Don has created an amazing facility. He offers great bootcamp classes, very challenging, and top of the line equipment. He is a patient instructor, motivating the group and cheering us on. The facility has a beautiful, private yoga studio, a dedicated cycle room, and an abundance of boxing equipment. We will be back.

classes.description: Are you ready to burn fat, reduce stress and tone up by punching and kicking real heavy bags? Whether you are prepping for competition, learning about self defense or just want to learn more about Kickboxing, this delivers a full-body workout designed for any fitness level. It’s time to break out of your boring fitness routine and discover the possibility of a fun, high-energy and rewarding workout.

Yoga is about a healthy lifestyle, peace and tranquility.

classes.description: Mindfulness and Food Ever finish a meal and realize you didn’t really savor it? Are you eating too fast? Do you sometimes make the wrong food choice and regret it later? The practice of mindful eating rewires the brain and restores intuitive wisdom around eating, making the experience enjoyable. In this 1 hour class we"ll discusses mindless eating, what mindful eating is, why it is beneficial, and steps to take to create a mindful eating practice. There will be an exercise in mindful eating. Minimum 3 Students Any Single Class Before 5/1 $20 After 5/1 $25

description:
Youfit Health Clubs offer state of the art facilities and a wide variety of classes. Youfit is dedicated to helping you on your fitness journey!

For class times at Littleton, follow this link and select the gym location: https://www.youfit.com/yougx-schedules

classes.description:
With open gym, you can drop into the gym to take a class or get in your own workout gym-style. Whether you want to hop on a treadmill, elliptical, stairmaster or sculpt and tone with free weights or machines, you can find it all at YouFit. Arrive at any time during your reservation window and stay for 10 minutes up to 2 hours — you do you.

For class times at Littleton, follow this link and select the gym location: https://www.youfit.com/yougx-schedules

description: Motion Fitness is a small studio that offers fun and challenging workouts to keep you enjoying the workout as much as the results. Join them for a small group class (10 people or less). They offer TRX, Bootcamps, kickboxing and strength training classes.

featured_reviews.review: This class was great!! Small and personal, with a very attendant instructor. The moves were tough, but doable. I felt like I got a great workout in and wasnt going to injure myself !

classes.description: Bootcamp often makes you think of a drill sergeant yelling in your face to work harder, but NOT HERE! At Motion Fitness, our instructors will encourage you to push yourself but we do it with a (usually sweaty) smile! We understand that an enthusiastic group to interact with can help you conquer some of the toughest challenges using a variety of obstacles and equipment, and that it’s equally important to listen to your own body and take breaks whenever you need to. You can be confident that you will never need to memorize part of a routine, and that bootcamp will ALWAYS be a different workout to keep you and your body interested and inspired! Our classes are often formatted to have you with a partner or team, or in a circuit to better allow for 1-1 coaching and modifications. We often design the class using HIIT (High intensity interval training). This is achieved by mixing high intensity cardio intervals into a strength workout. HIIT training is proven to burn calories at a higher rate and give you the most bang for your buck. Plus, it’s fun! What to wear: Wear comfortable workout clothes and tennis shoes for this class.http://motionfitnessdenver.com/classes/bootcamp/
classes.name: Indoor bootcamp

description: The Pilates Studio offers certified instruction, quality equipment & unique sessions, located in the Wash Park neighborhood of Denver.

featured_reviews.review: The instructor was SO welcoming and did a great job of making sure my form was correct so I could get the best workout!

classes.description: A session offered for those feeling strong in their practice, but not quite ready for the faster paced flow of a p.s.II. This session is the perfect in-between. Stay forever or use as a stepping stone to another level. Remember, a half can feel like a whole lot more :)

classes.description: The perfect Pilates class. Maintain your Pilates practice with this intermediate level class. Achieve a full-body workout inside and out, from head to toe, no class being exactly alike. Pre-requisite: Prior Pilates experience or previous attendance in p.s. Fundamentals and/or p.s. I

description: We are a small studio that offers fun and challenging workouts to keep you enjoying the workout as much as the results. Join us for a small group class (10 people or less).

featured_reviews.review: Jessica was awesome, helpful and friendly. The class was difficult and I got a great workout. Will definitely go back.

classes.description: This bodyweight intensive class will leave you feeling strong, accomplished and sweaty by incorporating low weight, high rep and high intensity training. All levels are welcome. This class is a full body workout.

description:
Pound 4 Pound Fitness offers every athlete the highest level of instruction available. On their mats you’ll find individuals with a variety of personal fitness goals: sports enthusiasts looking to take their game to the next level, new mothers wanting to lose a few pounds, business executives seeking stress relief, seniors working to improve mobility — even professional athletes training for their next fight!

At Pound 4 Pound, they know success stems from both physical and mental toughness. You will be more than just a number and their instructors design their kickboxing and boot camp classes to make every athlete stronger — both in and outside of the gym.

Pound for pound, they offer world class instruction, classes, community and total life transformation.

featured_reviews.review: Fantastic cardio workout! great variety in rounds to keep the workout exciting and you on your toes. All of my body hurts :-)

classes.description: Kickboxing is a blend of boxing, kickboxing, martial arts, cardiovascular exercise and functional fitness. Gloves and wraps are required.

description: The Circus Collective is here to help you extend the limits of your human potential through expanding what can be achieved through your workout. They are expanding the perception of art to include human movement. They offer a unique fitness training experience available to anyone and everyone!

featured_reviews.review: Technical class to learn the basics of aerial. The instructor was very hands on and attentive!

classes.description: In this class we will learn the essential beginner hula hoop tricks that will help you build your own flow. You will be taught techniques and concepts that go into creating your own unique style of hoop dance, while giving attention to elegance and form. Tricks such as, waist hooping, hooping in lasso, isolations, passing around the body, hand tosses, jump throughs, escalators, lift ups, and an introduction to dancing with your hoop will be incorporated.

classes.description: AcroYoga is a playful practice that combines the wisdom of Yoga, the excitement of Acrobatics and the healing elements of Thai Massage. AcroYoga is the practice of "building community through Divine Play." This class does not use aerial apparatuses. Come learn to fly, base and spot with us!

description:
Resilience Recovery is a comprehensive health and wellness center offering cutting-edge modalities including hot and cold tubs, SwissWing, Infrared sauna, compression therapy and much more. Think of us like a sports spa! 
First-time clients can expect to work with one of Resilience Recovery's providers to determine the best recovery experience specifically for you. Whether you're seeking relief from pain, inflammation, soreness or stress, Resilience Recovery has got you covered! 
 Let us help you understand the importance of rest and recovery,  sign up today!

featured_reviews.review: I enjoyed trying out the infrared sauna. The instructor helps guide you through certain equipment, most of which I had never used before.

description: We offer various Jazzercise class formats, including the original Dance Mixx (dance cardio w/ strength and stretching at the end), Fusion and Interval Fusion (cardio alternating with strength), Interval Dance Mixx (a cardio rollercoaster ride with strength & stretching at the end), Strength45 (all strength, 45-min class) and Express (30-min, mostly cardio with some strength at the end.) Instructors cue the moves ahead and demonstrate low impact and other modifications. Current, top-40 music and fun dance moves keep you distracted from the burn. Stop working out...start working it!

featured_reviews.review: The instructor was great! And the people in the class SUPER friendly!!

classes.description: Torch fat, sculpt lean muscle and crush calories with this high intensity workout that mixes dance-based cardio with strength training. Fresh pulse-pounding music and body-blasting moves bring the intensity to transform your body, boost your mood and ignite your energy.

description:
At Moyer Total Wellness our knowledgeable and friendly experts empower every client to take an active role in mind and body wellness.  This journey begins with one of their award-winning signature massages.
Moyer Total Wellness offers traditional practices like Swedish, Deep Tissue, Prenatal and Sports massage; but also expand to new modalities such as: Myofacial Muscle Massage, Yoga-ssage, and Thai massage.  
Each session begins with a consultation to discover the client’s needs and long-term wellness goals.  The therapist will customize and use a variety of techniques during the hour and end the session with a specific massage plan, advice on at-home care, and even additional treatments that will continue your path to wellness.

featured_reviews.review: First great massage at moyer. Therapist understood my request for deep tissue and it was deeply relaxing as well as therapeutic. Finally didnt have to keep asking for more pressure which is much appreciated.

classes.description: The Moyer Total Wellness massage offers a range of techniques from Swedish and Deep Tissue to Post-Injury Rehabilitation, Prenatal, and Sports Myofacial Muscle recovery.  The massage begins with a pre-consultation that highlights the clients needs, goals and benefits you want to achieve.  The massage therapists employ different techniques and utilize different tactics  to customize each massage.  Each session is booked for a full 60-minute massage to gain optimum results, leaving clients feeling exhilarated, refreshed and relieved.  Moyer Total Wellness offers chiropractic, acupuncture, nutrition consultations and more after class to provide the care you need.  Massages at Moyer Total Wellness have won awards and accolades due to the active engagement they take in providing a full-circle health and wellness plan.  Start your journey to full mind and body wellness today with Denver's Best Massage.
classes.name: 1 Hr Signature Massage

description: Catalyst's HIIT classes are different every session. Our total body workout classes start & end on time while keeping you moving throughout the entire session. Tap into the community and experience the incredible energy and motivation that every session will give you.

featured_reviews.review: It reminded me of the exercises I would do to train for softball! Loved the partner workouts too.

classes.description: Catalyst’s HIIT classes are different every session. Our total body workout classes start & end on time while keeping you moving throughout the entire session. Tap into the community and experience the incredible energy and motivation that every session will give you. The best workout in Denver bar none. A unique feature about Catalyst is that all classes are done on our artificial turf surface. Not only are we able take advantage of this feature with specific workouts that can only be done on our field turf, but our sessions give clients the feeling that they’re bringing their outdoor workout inside.
classes.name: Catalyst Fitness Class

description: FIT36 is an intense 36 minute workout that can burn more calories than your current workout while you tone and build muscle throughout your entire body – without the risk of injury you see with so many of the other group fitness classes. FIT36 employs Full Intensity Interval Training along with unique equipment, motivating coaches and calorie blasting, muscle-toning, 36 minute circuits, a FIT36 workout will challenge your mind and body every session.

featured_reviews.review: I was the only person in the class and basically got a personal training session. Great workout-I was gassed at the end!

classes.description: Power workouts are the foundation of the FIT36 program. Alternating between "push" and "pull" movements, they will challenge you to increase your strength and cardio conditioning through dynamic functional movements that challenge opposing muscles. Your trainer will help you master the correct form before motivating you to increase weight or repetitions, helping enable you to safely and effectively power your fitness to the next level.
classes.name: POWER Push

description: A Soul Tree is one that penetrates its roots into the earth to grow stronger.  It entwines its roots with all the other trees to be supported by, and to support the collective.  The Soul Tree draws nutrients from the earth to heal and ultimately reach out to inspire and support the surrounding environment from an integrated foundation. Soul Tree Yoga is a welcoming space for Lafayette to practice the art of yoga and grow stronger in all areas of their lives. Stop by today!

featured_reviews.review: My first time taking this class, I really enjoyed the class and Susan, is a great instructor. I will definitely continue taking more classes.

classes.description: Vinyasa can translate as "to place in a sacred or special way". This class rides the breath to yogic bliss by moving in that sacred & special way through thoughtful sequences. Incorporating heat building breath to movement, deepening into holding poses and possibly exploring challenging peaks amongst breath awareness & yogic teachings. The primary focus here lays in the physical practice of asana and alignment to ideally bring depth and evolution to your practice All levels, as plenty of variations are offered throughout. Each teacher brings their unique style to the practice. (Brand new beginners will benefit from a beginners yoga prior to attending flow.)
classes.name: Vinyasa Flow

classes.description:
This one hour class begins with gentle yin or restorative poses to prepare the body, some mindful breathing to still the mind and follows with about 35 – 40 minutes of blissfully relaxing Yoga Nidra.
The ancient practice of Yoga Nidra, or Yogic Sleep is the state of relaxation your body and mind enter during this deep meditation. In the restorative posture of Svasana you are led past wakefulness and the dream state into the state of deep sleep, all while remaining conscious and aware. It is an incredibly healing practice, good for creating ease in the body and stillness and insight in the mind. The benefits of a regular Yoga Nidra practice are numerous and can be especially helpful to counteract the effects of stress and anxiety that are prevalent in our modern, busy culture.
classes.name: Yoga Nidra

description: Studio B is a community driven yoga studio in the beautiful Colorado mountains, with daily classes and workshops to nurture your heart, mind and body.

featured_reviews.review: Friendly community studio

classes.description: The gentle class focuses on the body, mind, spirit connection through easy to follow flow sequences and gentle stretches. This class is for everyone who wishes a head to toe refresher while finding that inner sense of ease and well-being. Release the tension of the week and rejuvenate all of you.
classes.name: Mindful Flow

classes.description: An all-levels outdoor class. Practice mindfulness, meditation and yoga postures while in nature. Meet at Studio B and carpool to nearby trails for this one-of-a-kind experience. Please note, pre-registration is required! Head over to our schedule to sign up for the date you will attend. JUNE DATES: Friday June 22nd, 5:30pm-7:30p Wednesday June 27th, 9:00am-11:00a Thursday June 28th, 5:30pm-7:30p JULY DATES: July 3rd 5:30pm-7:30p Wednesday July 11th, 9:00am-11:00a Thursday July 12th, 5:30pm-7:30p Tuesday July 17th, 5:30pm-7:00p Wednesday July 25th, 9:00am-11:00a Thursday July 26th, 5:30pm-7:30p Tues July 31st, 5:30pm-7p AUGUST & SEPTEMBER Dates TBA

classes.description: A series of movements designed to deeply stretch the body. The benefits of deep stretching include pain relief, greater blood circulation and better range of motion. You will find increased energy levels, flexibility, and better posture from a regular stretching routine. The poses are supported by yoga bolsters, blocks and blankets. The time spent in these postures is much like time spent in meditation. A great class for beginners and seasoned practitioners.
classes.name: Hatha Deep Stretch

description: The Fitwall program is a full body workout designed to fulfill all of your fitness needs. Every workout is a blend of strength, cardio and flexibility training. Each day of the week is a different workout delivering a well rounded program. We use technology to inspire, guide, monitor and track progress. We utilize our piece of equipment, the Fitwall, along with bodyweight drills, dumbbells, resistance bands and other tools to offer an effective, comprehensive, safe and fun workout. Every workout has a specifically curated custom music mix designed to push you further than you could go alone. All of our workouts are 40 minutes long. It's the perfect amount of time for an efficient, effective workout that fits into your day.

featured_reviews.review: I thought this was the coolest way to workout, so creative and a great tool! It was nice to have video screens showing the movements/with timers, but the instructor was also great at demonstrating. He had a lot of energy! The studio had very nice amenities as well (towels, shampoo, lotion, etc).

classes.description: The first 66% of this workout focuses on slower and bigger movements to build a big base of strength for their clients. Strength is what allows you to do more things in life and keeps you healthy and builds muscle which is responsible for burning fat and keeping you lean. The final 33% of the workout are short, high-intensity efforts mixed with rest. The high intensity sprints are very effective at promoting afterburn (fat burning for up to 72 hours post workout).
classes.name: Power. Strength Emphasis

description:
Maitri Yoga is a place to come together as friends and balance out the state of the world today. They are here to bring people together as friends, fully loving and accepting ourselves and others just as they are in this moment. Together Maitri Yoga can uplift and inspire. You belong as a friend from your first visit. All of this is manifested through the beautiful, multi-faceted practice of yoga.

Friendly. Healthy. Living.

This studio has been fully refinished with lots of beautiful natural wood (Colorado Beetle Kill Pine to be precise), rich colors and murals to inspire.

The main class room is called the “Lakshmi Studio” to draw in abundance and all good things for each who enters.  

Located at the NE corner of 64th and Ward in Arvada across the parking lot from the Egg & I.

classes.description: Move through creative yet simple sequences of foundational, common postures designed to create a mindful practice of held poses. Combining a sweet balance between slow stretching and deep awareness, this class grounds and steadies us. Hatha I incorporates breathing (pranayama), philosophy, and asana, including 3-5 minutes of meditation.
classes.name: Hatha I

classes.description: This class is perfect for women who are at any stage of pregnancy. It offers space to enjoy a slower paced mindful practice focusing on graceful movements, breath work, short meditations and getting in touch with your body, mind, spirit (and baby). Prenatal Yoga calms the mind and prepares the body to carry your baby with greater ease. It is helpful at delivery time because you will know how to use your body, breath, and mind together to relax during the birthing process. Plus, you get to know other wonderful mamas that are like minded in body, mind and spirit. low intensity – simple – slow pace
classes.name: Prenatal

classes.description: Energy travels through channels or meridians in the body that are specifically targeted in Yin yoga by finding the edge of sensations in the body, dropping into stillness and holding postures for a time. Yin classes offer deep stretches by dropping into long-held poses (up to 3-5 minutes) and extending moments of awareness to practice meditation and witnessing while experiencing moderate sensation. The Yin practice includes powerful mental and emotional benefits as we become quiet, still and mindful of the present moment. medium intensity – simple – slow pace
classes.name: Yin

classes.description: This class is designed specifically for all moms, especially those with new babies and youngsters. We come together in community to share and support one another, which is vital as you head down this path of motherhood. Whether you are going through good times or tough times this class is here to support you and help you regain a sense of balance and wholeness. You are not alone.The yoga practice is nourishing which helps to restore your energy and feel more centered. This class is developed to bring harmony to and alignment back to the body and mind which can be caused by the stresses of mothering. We practice feel good postures that will focus on the chest, shoulders, neck, back, and hips. Nourish your body, mind, and spirit with this supportive and inviting class. Babies are welcome to join us, yet it is late enough to encourage the moms to leave the baby at home with dad. (He'll do just fine.;0)low to medium intensity – simple – slow pace
classes.name: Mom's Yoga

description:
Yoga Loft is a place where you can nourish your body and spirit while enjoying the uplifting elements of your favorite yoga classes. If you currently have a yoga practice you know why yoga is much more than just great exercise; and you know that having a great yoga studio to practice in is part of the fun!

Yoga Loft is an upper level yoga studio with open views on three sides. Their yoga classes celebrate the diversity of their yoga teachers and students by combining safe alignment, thoughtful sequencing through a nourishing blend of yoga asana. Yoga is both practice and goal. While always enjoying the benefits of greater flexibility, strength and overall health, yoga also gently reminds us of a Oneness shared by all. As such, kindness is our guide.

featured_reviews.review: I'm so happy the Gunbarrel location is now on ClassPass! this was my first Yin style class and I'll definitely be back to center and bring calm to combat all the brain chatter of the day!

classes.description:
Avita Yoga uses shapes and movements to identify restrictions impeding the body’s natural potential for freedom of movement. It’s a practice that brings more freedom and joy to your life so you can enjoy all the other things you love to do in your life.

While Avita is well designed for the newcomer, don't underestimate the slower pace of the class as being "too easy." Restrictions and limitations are resolved in a manner that are adaptable to each student. Avita is sometimes passive, sometimes active and sometimes quite demanding. It’s a practice that accesses the deep healing power of the mind, putting the focus on you and your process..
classes.name: Avita Yoga

description: Palangi Fit aims to offer you the most supportive and motivational workout environment you've ever stepped foot in. Palangi Fit is on a mission to make the world a happier, healthier, more conscious place—one workout at a time.

featured_reviews.review: I actually attended the kickboxing class. it was awesome! the teacher took the time to show me the moves and was very patient. A challenging class that doesn't kill you. will be back.

If you're not sure, ask one of our coaches if this class is right for you!

description: Iyengar Yoga Center offers a full schedule of quality Iyengar yoga classes for students of all levels.

featured_reviews.review: A great way to kick off the new year -- beautiful, warm studio. Laura was very welcoming and had a great sense of humor. Would recommend!

description: Inspiration Fitness is a fitness studio in Golden, CO, with a reputation for its fun, enthusiastic, and supportive environment.  We are the studio where every BODY fits.  We have a very welcoming environment.  All of our instructors are personal trainers so don't fret if you have special needs, we can help you modify to get the best workout you can.

featured_reviews.review: Amazing. Just amazing. My favorite Class Pass Class to date! Kris and her drumming are my new favorite things!

classes.description: Ditch the workout and join the party! Barre is gentle on the body, accommodates for injuries, enhances balance, and improves flexibility. It's a highly efficient whole-body workout. Light weights, mats, tubing, bands, bender balls and gliders are used.  No ballet or dance experience required.

description:
Enter into a body-renewing, fitness experience at Pilates Denver ~ where we specialize in Pilates and Mind Body elements. Our beautiful Studio is complete with a full system Pilates Studio, a Mind Body Movement Studio and a serene Massage Therapy Room as well as additional service amenities.

Our Pilates Studio offers an extensive range of Pilates services taught by its highly educated, Certified and friendly staff. In our Mind Body Movement Studio, a diverse schedule of classes take place including Pilates Mat, Barre & Yoga classes. Pilates Denver also offers the BASI Pilates® Teacher Training Programs.

At Pilates Denver, we strive to give you a personal and comfortable experience while learning these amazing methods of body conditioning.

featured_reviews.review: The class seems like it will be simple but was actually a solid strength workout. My abs are sore today.

classes.activities: Cardio, Flexibility, Balance, Core, Abs, Pilates
classes.description: A great fusion of Pilates Mat exercises combined with fun and invigorating cardio intervals for added challenge and stimulate your heart!

description: We created our YogaSpa with your self care in mind.  Take an active role in your own well-being and happiness and make time to get to know yourself  better. Nourish your physical body, your emotions and your spirit!  A massage after a class where you have moved your body into postures that stretch and tone your muscles will take your Savasana right on to the massage table.   A Restorative class where you are fully supported by bolsters and pampered with blankets pairs nicely after a relaxing massage so your entire experience ends in Savasana.   Our Mission is to create a Community of Care for every guest to feel supported on their personal journey.  Whether you are joining us for a yoga class, therapeutic massage, workshop or event, we invite you to let each moment unfold as it should.

featured_reviews.review: I love this class, David is a fantastic instructor. Always leave feeling challenged and refreshed. Highly recommend!

classes.description: Gentle yoga introduces you to various Hatha Yoga postures. Time is spent learning about the breath and finding your own comfort level in each pose. Modifications are encouraged and props may be used to facilitate alignment as you learn to recognize what your body needs in that moment.

When you visit Vérité Skin & Lash studio, it's all about you. They believe that the beauty is already there: their job is to help you see it by offering customized facials for your skin type, microdermabrasion, HydroPlus, dermaplane, wax services, eyelash/brow tinting and lash extensions. Vérité Skin and Lash is a premier ClassPass Wellness venue. See their class descriptions for more information on the services they provide. Gratuity is not included in the cost of your reservation. Please remember to tip based on the full amount of the service reserved.

featured_reviews.review: I absolutely love the work Laura did with my brows and her studio space is very cozy and relaxing, plus her friendly attitude put me immediately at ease!

Inward Fitness is an upscale fitness studio with a community culture that delivers an environment full of energy, personal attention and motivation to help each participant have a unique class experience. Students will learn basic skills including quadrupedal movement, landings, rolls, basic gymnastics, jumps, cat leaps, vaults, underbars, tic tacs, wall runs, and basic freerunning tricks. Additionally, students will apply these skills to complete longer movement combinations and obstacle courses.You must complete the Intro to Parkour course before participating in other movement classes. description:
CycleBar is not your average cycling class—it’s a mind-blowing, heart-pumping party on a bike. Every ride is led by an elite CycleStar Instructor, each with their own style and vibe. No two rides are alike; from the music to the intensity to the overall vibe, instructors keep it fresh and keep you motivated every single class.

When you ride with them, you ride in style in the CycleTheatre, a fully-loaded, epic cycling space. With high-performance custom bikes, amphitheater seating, enhanced lighting, concert-quality sound and two massive high-def flat screens, they set the scene for an immersive, exhilarating experience. Every bike comes with built-in CycleStats technology, so you can track calories burned, RPMs, watts and class rank.

Whether you want to start your day strong or melt away the stress of the day, once the lights go down and the music goes up, you’ll leave the outside world behind.

featured_reviews.review: Jess is THE BEST instructor!! She is motivating and inspiring. Her dedications are always so profound! She leads you through a killer workout and leaves you with food for thought. A fulfilling class in more ways than one.

classes.description: The CycleBar Classic is our primary ride and 45 minutes of pure intoxication. As the lights dim, your CycleStar instructor pumps up the volume on a wildly energetic cardio jam and upper body workout. Our state-of-the-art Cycle Theatre features mind-blowing video, heart-pounding audio and leading-edge technology CycleStats so you can track your performance in real time.

description: A Soul Tree is one that penetrates its roots into the earth to grow stronger.  It entwines its roots with all the other trees to be supported by, and to support the collective.  The Soul Tree draws nutrients from the earth to heal and ultimately reach out to inspire and support the surrounding environment from an integrated foundation. Soul Tree Yoga is a welcoming space for Lafayette to practice the art of yoga and grow stronger in all areas of their lives. Stop by today!

featured_reviews.review: The instructor was so welcoming and encouraging, this class absolutely made my day. Truly and body or ability level would feel welcomed in this class.

classes.description: Release & Restore is a class designed to warm up the muscles and deep tissue through gentle yoga. From there you we will be releasing the deep tissues system/fascia by utilizing different props in a safe and gentle manner. Fascia is the deep tissue that runs throughout our whole body...holding our muscles and bones in place. Sometimes this tissue hardens...usually caused by lack of blood flow, stuck energy and working against it, instead of with it. When the fascia hardens it can cause lack of mobility and injuries. Think of this class experience as an exploration of the body and a deep tissue massage.
classes.name: Release & Restore

classes.description: Unwind with a gentle, all-levels yoga class to help release tension in the body & mind. This class will gently move your body to relax, melt away stress, and create peace.

classes.description: Yin Yoga was founded on the Taoist theory of yin and yang – opposite concepts that, together, represent balance. Yin is stable and passive, while yang is changing and active. Yin is the feminine, dark, passive, receptive, reflective, withdrawn, cool, introspective aspects of life. Yin yoga was developed to penetrate deep into connective tissue expanding flexibility while invigorating the energy centers of the body to release The yin poses, therefore, are passive and are held with the muscles fully relaxed, allowing time and gravity to deepen the stretch and target the fascia. The practice is very meditative as the poses are held for a long period of time (typically three to five minutes or longer).
classes.name: Yin Yoga with Reiki

description:
Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan is considered the most comprehensive of yoga traditions, combining meditation, mantra, physical exercises and breathing techniques; it is a Raj Yoga, encompassing the eight limbs of yoga into a singular practice of excellence and ecstasy. Kundalini Yoga is also known as the Yoga of awareness; its focus is on self-awareness and delivering an experience of your highest consciousness.

The primary focus of kundalini yoga is to awaken the full potential of human awareness in each individual; that is, recognize your awareness, refine that awareness, and expand that awareness to your unlimited Self. It also helps clear any inner duality, create the power to deeply listen, cultivate inner stillness, help you prosper and deliver excellence in all that you do.

featured_reviews.review: Kundalini is the spiritual practice you need. I love this place. I am so tired of power vinyasa that doesn’t help me shed my layers or open up. Kundalini is hard. It’s mental. It’s spiritual growth. It’s everything you need.

classes.activities: Relaxation, Flexibility, Balance, Arms, Meditation, Yoga
classes.description:
Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan is considered the most comprehensive of yoga traditions, combining meditation, mantra, physical exercises and breathing techniques; it is a Raj Yoga, encompassing the eight limbs of yoga into a singular practice of excellence and ecstasy. Kundalini Yoga is also known as the Yoga of Awareness; its focus is on self-awareness and delivering an experience of your highest consciousness.

“Kundalini” literally means “the curl of the lock of hair of the beloved.” This poetic metaphor alludes to the flow of energy and consciousness that exists within everyone, and enables you to merge with – or “yoke” – the universal Self. Fusing individual and universal consciousness creates a divine union, called “yoga.” They awaken the kundalini in order to be able to call upon the full potential of the nervous and glandular systems and to balance the subtle system of chakras and meridians within the body.

The primary focus of kundalini yoga is to awaken the full potential of human awareness in each individual; that is, recognize your awareness, refine that awareness, and expand that awareness to your unlimited Self. It also helps clear any inner duality, create the power to deeply listen, cultivate inner stillness, help you prosper and deliver excellence in all that you do.
classes.name: Kundalini Yoga

With options for beginner yogis to advanced practitioners, their classes are designed to improve your skill sets and challenge you along the way. They want their students to achieve a greater sense of presence or the “flow state”. Through their Philosophy and Science their students will reduce stress, build strength, and increase flexibility.

classes.description:
This class will be geared towards beginning adult ballet enthusiasts.  No previous experience necessary.  Students will learn basic traditional ballet terminology, positions and steps.
*IF THERE ARE NEW STUDENTS JOINING THE CLASS, THE FIRST 15 MINUTES OF EVERY CLASS WILL BE AN INTRODUCTION TO BALLET TO CATCH THEM UP!
Uniform:
WOMEN - (Form fitted is best.)
Solid colored leotard, any style
Tights (prefer full-footed) or Leggings
Ballet shoes (Pink or Black, leather or canvas)
Ballet skirts are optional (Pink, Black, Grey or White)
Hair should be tied back in a bun with no loose pieces in the face.
No jewelry or watches. Stud earrings o.k.
Dance bag with band-aids, baby wipes, tissues, extra hair supplies and a water bottle.
MEN - 
Solid colored tank top or t-shirt (Black, Grey or White)
Black ballet shoes (leather or canvas)
Black opaque tights, capri pants, athletic pants, jazz pants or sweat pants
No jewelry or watches. Stud earrings o.k.
Dance bag with band-aids, baby wipes, tissues, and a water bottle.

Palango! is a SIMPLE, FUN, INTENSE cardio-toning and endurance group exercise class that combines the best of  Latin music and movements with powerful fitness moves from boxing, Capoeira kick boxing, Muay Thai and other elements of traditional martial arts. Class pace is fast but welcoming all fitness levels.  Palango!Fitness was is FUN!!

Each choreographed song has only 3 to 4 simple steps that are easily executed, and precisely integrated to keep you moving, and burning calories and fat.  Palango! is not your traditional dance class, this is a super-fun fat-burning workout. 

Palango! Fitness offer 4 different program as follows: Palango! Boxing, Palango! Bootcamp, Palango! Fuerza . check all of them in our website palangofitness.com.

featured_reviews.review: Loved this class so much! The teacher was fantastic and the owner was helpful and friendly. This will be one of my favorites, for sure! Intense, fun, and time went by so fast!!

Palango! Fitness is a simple, fun, and intense combination of 100% Latin music, original Latin-dance inspired choreography, and other powerful fitness moves. Every choreographed song has only 3 to 4 simple steps that are easily executed, and precisely integrated to keep you moving, and burning calories and fat. This is not your traditional dance class, this is a super-fun fat-burning workout.

Palango! Barre

Palango! Bootcamo
Palango! Circuit Training 42M (opne December 1, 2017)

featured_reviews.review: New favorite place on ClassPass! Small class size, super friendly people and great workout! Definitely will be back.

classes.description: In this class you will work hard at your level alternating between intense bursts of activity and less-intense bursts of activity. It is a really efficient way to burn calories, lose fat while maintaining muscle, train your heart to stronger and improve your metabolism. Get ready to sweat and get stronger in one of the best and most efficient workouts around! Classes are limited to 6 people, so participants will get the support they need to learn new movements, work hard to be successful, and have lots of fun, too!

description:
MJ Fit is a boutique-style studio exclusively for women and children right near DTC.  The classes remain small to allow MJ to provide individualized attention and form correction. The classes won't be easy, but modifications can be made to accommodate all ability levels. 

Bootcamp: The class is fast-paced and circuit-style

HIIT: A fast, effective, and variety filled, high intensity interval training (HIIT) workout.

Yoga: This moderate yoga class is designed to promote a nurturing environment for practitioners

Classes at MJ Fit are for women only.

featured_reviews.review: Great workout with MJ! Love that she keeps classes smaller so they feel more individualized. Easy to customize based on your abilities and she really pushes you!

classes.description:
The class is fast-paced and circuit-style to provide a full body workout. It is for anyone looking to gain strength, endurance and agility. The workouts won't be easy, but MJ works with clients who have never stepped foot in a gym, all the way up to college athletes, so she will be sure to provide modifications if needed.
Backed by the science of Excess Post-Exercise Oxygen Consumption (or EPOC), MJ Fit’s training is designed to maintain a target zone that stimulates metabolism and increases energy.
classes.name: Bootcamp

description:
NoCoast CrossFit believes every person can be the best version of themselves with a little structure, a lot of discipline and a community that supports them. They believe being fit makes life richer at work, at home and at play. They believe anyone can reach their greatest level of fitness right now no matter age, color, creed, or fitness experience.

Their purpose is to support lasting growth and change in people's overall health, provide quality service and develop a meaningful community.

featured_reviews.review: Great gym!

classes.description:
The Workout of the Day (WOD) is for experienced CrossFitters or LiftOne graduates. 

This one hour class will provide one-on-one coaching with a small group. They value quality coaching, similar to personal training. That is why they offer a closed class system, requiring all athletes to sign up for classes they plan to attend. Their coaches will guide you through a warm up, skill work, any relevant mobility exercises, and the workout.

*If you do not have experience with CrossFit please contact the studio at 720-663-1080 and they will get you set up with a Fundamentals (LiftOne) Class.

Alpine CrossFit's program and coaches transform their members through intense training. Their goal is to instill confidence in all members, aspire them towards excellence, and celebrate all of their successes.

Alpine works with everyone from elite athletes to recreational athletes, from stay at home moms to desk junkies, and from children to grandparents to redefine their notions of health, fitness, and athleticism via CrossFit methods.

classes.description: In this group CrossFit class, participants will be lead by expert coaches through several phases of fitness: a dynamic warm-up, mobility & skill drills, a strength portion comprised of olympic or powerlifting, and the workout of the day “WOD”. The practice moves from centering to more complex postures through a series of sun salutations, standing balance poses and strength work. Concluding with a relaxing cooldown.

The other key is having the right tools that will give you the results that you are specifically looking for. 5280Fit has spent the past 19yrs learning the tools that can help anyone achieve the fitness goals that they are trying to accomplish. They want to give you the tools & more through the classes, accountability & support that they offer through their programs. So what do you have to lose other then inches?

featured_reviews.review: Great!

description:
They welcome students of all levels, ages, sizes, shapes, abilities and backgrounds, who come with an interest to learn.

rating_message: Not enough ratings yet. Be one of the first.

classes.description:
1) General warm up: instructors will stretch you out and put you through some basic movements to warm you up for the work ahead.

​

2) Skill/strength: after the warm up we will take an allotted amount of time to work on a strength component or to improve a chosen skill for the day.

​

3) WOD: this is where the magic happens. a high intensity constantly varied workout.

 

4) Cool down: after each class you will have some time to collect yourself and stretch before entering back into the grind of the real world.

Their intention is to build fitness programming that can be applied to your day to day living.

class.name: Workout of the Day Functional Fitness
Workout of the Day Functional Fitness
Workout of the Day Functional Fitness

Their goal is not to just make you strong in the gym but strong both physically and mentally in your day to day life by using functional fitness.

description:
Stop. Breathe. Relax. Step into this Downtown Denver refuge, in the heart of historic LoDo, and leave the world outside. Let the scent of soothing aromatherapy, a comforting warm neck wrap and gentle music envelope you as Elixir's experienced team of estheticians and massage therapists care for you. Elixir's company culture supports their guest’s healthy lifestyle and the unique menu of facial and massage services provides provides a powerful link between feeling good and being well. 

Elixir Mind Body Massage is a premier ClassPass Wellness venue. See their class descriptions for more information on the services they provide. Gratuity is not included in the cost of your reservation. Please remember to tip based on the full amount of the service reserved.

class.name: Organic Enzyme Peel or Instant Lift and Firm Facial

classes.description:
Choose from an Organic Enzyme Peel or Instant Lift and Firm Facial. A private consultation is included with each service to determine your skin type and to address your primary skin concern.

Organic Enzyme Peel Facial
The Big Reveal: Providing excellent cellular renewal for sun damaged, aged and dull looking skin. This activating yet soothing treatment cleanses and restores your skin to its natural and beautiful balance. Organic fruit enzymes dissolve dead skin and cleanse pores, thereby stimulating the dermis to manufacture more collagen and elastin. Regular Organic Enzyme Peels continue to help your body to produce new, strong, healthier and younger looking skin, without the harsh side effects of a chemical peel. Experience the ARCONA glow.

All skin types except clients undergoing Retin-A therapy

Instant Lift And Firm Facial
