classes.description:
Whole Body Cryotherapy is designed to significantly reduce musculoskeletal pain and inflammation. The treatment works by standing inside the chamber for 2-3 minutes at temps of -166℉ to -220℉, causing a "vascular flush" of inflammation and toxins. Once the cryotherapy session is complete, newly oxygenated blood comes flowing back to your extremities with renewed energy! 

Brand, new technology provides for the safest cryotherapy experience at The Movement Project. Our Cryotherapy Chamber was named the safest unit in the industry and has earned the Air Products HAZOP approval. Our Cryo Arctic filters out the nitrogen gases before pushing the cold air into the chamber, allowing the client to breathe in pure (cold!) oxygen during the session. The chamber is also the ONLY one in Denver that encloses your whole body, including your head and shoulders, for maximum results. 

Clients will be able to choose from multiple cryotherapy treatment options, and safety clothing is provided. Cryotherapy has many amazing health & wellness benefits; come try it out!
classes.name: Cryo Arctic Whole Body Cryotherapy

featured_reviews.review: Such a wonderful place , was really nice that the girl at the front desk came out to find me since the place can be a bit hard to find so nice of her , mary gave a wonderful message , they let u pick the music and the senct of lotion you want wich is an added bonus.

classes.description:
At Exclusively Yours Massage every massage starts with a short consultation with your Massage Therapist and the Therapist, using various massage techniques, designs your massage to make it Exclusively Yours. The modalities that they include but are not limited to are: 

Swedish – Light to Firm fluid movements that gently stretch muscles and relieve tension. Increases circulation and lymph movement and decreases stress related conditions and chronic pain.

Therapeutic – Deep corrective massage releases muscle tension and toxins from the body. Deeper pressure is beneficial in releasing chronic muscle tension.

Sports – A customized massage including deep tissue, trigger point and stretching to sooth strained muscles.

Senior Touch – Designed to address the specific needs of the more mature generation. Can be especially helpful for maintaining and improving overall health.

Reflexology – Gentle but firm pressure techniques on the feet. Works powerfully with the nervous system throughout the body to help open energy to blocked areas and restore the body’s natural and inherent intelligence to balance itself.

Reiki – An ancient Japanese energy work designed to ease physical pain and pain attributed to depression, Reiki can also provide relief from anxiety and nausea. This practice is commonly used to prepare the body for healing before and after surgery.

classes.description: Each week in the Body Mechanics class we will be taking a different part of the body or specific chain of the body and discuss how to properly take care of it. We will also be working mobility drills and impact drills, when applicable, to increase one's ability in both mobility and strength in the area. This class will help those who are healthy stay healthy, prevent injury and gain strength and mobility they may not have had or haven wanted. This will also help those who have or have had injuries to gain knowledge on how to rebuild and strengthen the injured area as well as strengthen the surrounding areas to help prevent further injury in the future. This class will go over;Proper Warm UpsStretchingFoam RollingAssisted Rolling (partner rolling with Tiger tail or similar roller)PT for strengthPT for mobilityBasic and intermediate parkour and/or athletic skills to help isolate and understand what muscles function when doing specific thingsWorkouts to further build strength and mobility

classes.description:
Reflexology is a non-intrusive form of alternative therapy involving application of pressure to the feet and hands with specific thumb, finger and hand techniques. It is based on a system of zones and reflex areas that reflect an image of the body on the feet and hands. It is believed that applying pressure to specific points can affect other areas of the body and stimulate healing by stimulating the nerve pathways.

At the core of reflexology is vitalism, the popular concept which explains that our bodies are governed by an innate intelligence that monitors and promotes self-healing.

Class/service/experience descriptions are provided by our partners. ClassPass does not represent or warrant that the descriptions are complete, accurate, reliable, or current.
classes.name: 30 Min Reflexology

classes.description:
The Ion Cleanse Foot Detox is a non-invasive detox method.

How ionCleanse works:
AC Electricity is converted to low power DC electricity which flows through a patented electrode system (called the ‘array’) in the foot bath. The electricity and the metal combine to split the water molecule into H+ and OH-ions. 

An ion is a charged atom that has gained or lost an electron which creates a magnetic field capable of attaching to and neutralizing oppositely charged particles. These ions travel through the body, neutralize oppositely charged particles and through powerful osmotic pressure, pull those neutralized particles out of the body through whatever skin surface is in contact with the water, in this case the feet. 

This treatment session lasts 20 or 30 minutes depending on the array used.

Class/service/experience descriptions are provided by our partners. ClassPass does not represent or warrant that the descriptions are complete, accurate, reliable, or current.
classes.name: Ion Cleanse Foot Detox

description: Golden Yoga Therapy is unlike anything you've seen before, because instead of doing fancy pretzel positions like most yoga, they use very simple, basic movements to straighten out the whole body. That's why Yoga Therapy is so good at fixing the pain, even chronic pain, and restoring energy because it opens up the whole body, not just one part. Yoga therapy uses safe, smart exercises to address the root causes of pain and fatigue. When the body is out of whack, crooked, you're going to feel pain. And when you straighten the body out a lot of pain disappears. Their classes and private lessons fix pain and fatigue through better alignment. You won't find any pretzel positions here just proven,  simple exercises anyone can do. Join them in the studio for a session and find out what a difference their method can make for your health and happiness.
